story:
Hi, my name is Reyhan Sofraci, creative designer and founder of Qiss Qiss...

I have always dreamed of creating my own line of swimwear. I have spent the last years thinking about it and now the adventure restarts with Qiss Qiss.

Qiss Qiss is a contemporary swimwear brand that we want to establish as a lifestyle of its own.

This year we would love to enter the Swim Week in Miami to showcase our new Qiss Qiss collection.

We have many rewards to offer, just look at the column on your right! Here's a photo of our sexy Qiss Qiss tank top!

 

 

This event is the most important fashion week for the swim industry in North America, anyone and everyone in the swim industry is there. Attending this event would be a great opportunity to meet with great stylists and buyers and get our stuff out there!

We feel that a swim culture in this category is missing.  We all love to be flirtatious and have a joie de vivre and who better to share that feeling with other than other swim and life lovers like ourselves. Running on the beach, jumping into the sand, dancing with the fun sounds of famous DJ's on great catamarans, lakes and beaches, laughing, loving, remembering why we are alive, that's what its all about. . .

Launching a new line of swimwear requires a lot of work... from designing the swimsuits to doing the photo shoots and most importantly preparing for the fashion show presentations in July... All we have achieved until today has only been made possible with the support of our family, friends, colleagues and all the people believing in our projects. I have always believed that achieving great projects can only be done with a team.

    

Now the only way for us to get the new Qiss Qiss collection up on the catwalk and give birth to this whole lifestyle, is with your help to make it happen! Being featured at the Miami Swim Week 2012 is a great way for the world to see we exist and make people aware of the life and culture we represent!

It would be so awesome if you could join us in this adventure by supporting the Qiss Qiss brand! It is the people that make life so amazing and  interesting and now we need as much support from everyone as we can get! Let’s take Qiss Qiss to the Swim Week in Miami together! Come join us and become a part of the Qiss Qiss adventure!

Qiss Qiss is a very special brand as it has been specifically designed to appeal to girls who simply love life! ¨Cheeky, Flirty & Fun¨, our mission is to appeal to them and connect everyone! One smile can lead to another and together our network can be a bubble of joy and be invincible!

Our suits are all mix and match so you can create your individual style from our large selection of sexyfun bikinis.  There is something for all body types - We're not all physically the same, and have different likes and needs. We want you to have fun with us!

    

Launching these brands, I have realised that it is the relationship and links you build with people that make the strength of the brand and ensure the projects success. I’ve worked with models, fabric suppliers, photographers, web designers, marketers, you name it, and now we’re gonna hopefully work together on this new project with you! There is no team in I and it is with you that we can make this happen.  Let’s take Qiss Qiss to the Swim Week in Miami together! Let’s make it real!

story:
Available NOW on WWW.JAMESLUCY.COM

 

Use code IGG20 at checkout for 20% off

 

 

 

 

The Watches

The 'JL1' (plain face) -RRP £99.99. Here on IGG for just £59 (with a leather strap):

 

'JL2' (with date movement) -RRP £109.99. Here on IGG for just £59 (with a leather strap):

 

'JL3' (with second hand dial) -RRP £119.99. Here on IGG for just £59 (with a leather strap):

The James Lucy watch range consists of three affordable, minimalist, classic styles - all of which are shown above.

Each watches case is 40mm across, deemed to be a unisex size and suit most wrist sizes.

These core watches will retail at just £100 - £120, including a leather strap, making them affordable, whilst giving you a classic look that can be worn anywhere. The watches can only be bought here exclusively on IndieGoGo for £59 each!

Each watch comes in a choice of three case colours:

'Gold', 'Silver', and 'Bronze', giving a total of nine designs to choose from.

 

The Straps

All straps can be interchanged between any James Lucy watch in just a few seconds:

 
 

To add an extra strap, simply complete the purchase of your chosen JL watch, then go back to the campaign page, and choose the 'add a strap' perk of your favourite strap. All of your information should have been saved for a quick and easy checkout.

 

The Gaucho Straps

Inspired by the belts worn by Gauchos in Argentina, and now worn casually all over the world, the 'Gaucho Straps' are the very first of their kind to be seen and are unique to James Lucy. Initially available in 3 different colours:

 

The Leather Straps

 

The Wool Straps

 

The Nato Straps

 

 
 

 

                                        

Our customers and ambassadors will have the chance to apply to be a #TimeGiver. Whereby using their network, 50% of the profit from the sales they generate will be donated directly to any charity of their choice, in their name. If you are interested in becoming a #TimeGiver, please contact us via one of our social media handles:

 

Facebook  -   Twitter   -   Instagram

 

 

 

The Combos

The watch and strap options available from launch provide a massive 108 possible combinations, guaranteeing you will find an option that suits you and your style, in any situation. As we hit our stretch goals, more options will be opened up, increasing the combinations you can choose:

Click here to see the combinations on offer from Day 1

 

Every Backer Gets The Option Of

Having Their 'Name On The Wall'..!

Every backer of our campaign, will have the option of having their name on our website forever on our "Thank You Wall" to all of those who helped launch our business..!

(you can of course remain anonymous if you wish too)

Risks & Challenges

We have already done a small test run of the watches, so the factory has been proven for quality and timeframes, and both are excellent. The only issue we foresee is if the campaign goes through the roof and the volumes we need to make far exceed the levels we had envisaged. This is a great problem to have should it arise, and we will keep on top of the factory daily to keep up with the extra demand should this occur and try to minimise any delays wherever possible.

We have run the numbers thoroughly, and we are confident of delivering all of our promises, on time. Having worked on CrowdFunding campaigns in the past, we know how to account for all of the usual unforeseen expenses, time-sappers and issues, and thus we believe that the whole journey should go without a hitch.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please spread the word on social media on the links further up (or just search @JamesLucyLondon on your favourite social media handle), to help us hit our stretch goals and give yourself even more options for the perfect look!
  • Please contact us through social media if you want to become a #TimeGiver
  • Use IndieGoGo's awesome share function to be in with a chance of getting the awesome referral perks above!
  • If you own or know of any brands that you think we could collaborate with, please let us know :-)

Video Credits:

Videographer: Stefan Lee of Native Pixel (www.nativepixel.co.uk)

Actors: Dean Coach and Lauren Offin

Music: Endless Motion - BenSound.Com

story:
As you may, or may not know, my name is Sindy ... with an S and I am super excited to announce that I will be heading to Orlando, Florida on Aug 4th to compete at World's Perfect Pageant as Northeast's Perfect Miss!


Honestly, I can write down a long detailed story about my life, what pageants have done for me and why I'm competing etc etc, but I know you won't read the whole thing. I will keep this short and go straight to the point.

As this is an International Level Pageant and in Orlando, Florida, the expenses can be quite high.  Normally, I would find sponsors to support my journey to World's, but this year, as I was on a certain reality TV show (wink face), I was:
a) unsure if I was able to compete
b) I am now short on time to secure my sponsors

This is where you come in - Any contribution will help tremendously!  This is the first time that I have gone to the public for support and I hope you all believe in me! 

I cannot thank you enough, just for reading this, and I do hope that I can make you proud!

story:
"DCS: MiG-21Bis Fishbed" will be the first independent 3rd party module for the best DCS simulator game. This new module development is based on the new 3rd party License agreement/support that was previously announced by TFC/Eagle Dynamics. I plan to release MiG-21Bis later in 2012.

The MiG-21Bis is considered a third-generation, supersonic, jet fighter. It's avionics equipment ensures day and night operations in fair and poor weather conditions. Some 50 countries over four continents have flown the MiG-21, and it still serves many nations a half-century after its maiden flight. The MiG-21 broke a number of aviation records and it is still the most produced supersonic jet aircraft in aviation history.

"DCS: MiG-21Bis Fishbed" includes both Air-to-Air and Air-to-Ground capabilities that includes various conventional weapons like missiles, rockets, bombs, and a built in 23mm cannon. "DCS: MiG-21Bis Fishbed" will also use less widely known weapons such as some advanced air-to-surface guided missiles, retarded and general purpose bombs, and some special devices.


Features of the "DCS: MiG-21Bis Fishbed":

• Highly detailed six-degrees-of-freedom cockpit with dynamic shadows. Interact with cockpit controls with your mouse like previous DCS products.
• Accurate airframe and realistic 3D cockpit model.
• Detailed modeling of the MiG-21Bis instruments, navigation, electrical, radar, engine, fuel, and weapon systems.
• Russian and English cockpit texts and hints

• Improved and more realistic airplane behaviors that are based on real MiG-21Bis pilot tests and instruction.
• More than a twenty high detailed aircraft skin with unique stencil texts.
• More than a dozen new deliverable weapon.

"DCS: MiG-21Bis Fishbed” is developed by Laszlo 'beczl' Becz in association with The Fighter Collection and Eagle Dynamics. Further information will be provided as development progresses.

You can find further info on the Project Webpage.

 

The Project in good state if you can check the project webpage above but I'm a one man team so all of these things made only by me without any supporter. This cause to I need some additional fund to finalize the project. I need a fund to pay the DRM protection, video and sound producing also need to pay a better texture artist than me to improve the airplane presence and outer and inner textures as well.

 

P.S: The paypal transer changed from my account to my wife account due paypal frozen my account. They need to be check to identity to comply with European Union Anti-Money Laundering regulations.

story:
How does it work ?

At the heart of the DAHU ski boot is a flexible molded polyurethane boot, fitted with a waterproof membrane and a real rubber sole, making them exceptionally comfortable for your feet. Boots that you can wear all day long in the ski resort for walking, hiking, driving, shopping and even clubbing. A stylish boot that combines both urban and ski resort looks.
As you arrive on the slopes, you just need to slip on the exoskeleton, an external shell with a rigid sole combined with two articulated spoilers: one at the rear that grips your heel and the other at the front that you close around your foot. The two spoilers clip together and lock perfectly using a system with two buckles. You get the same performance as a traditional ski boot, but DAHU combines this with vastly superior comfort and perfect control over your skis.


The DAHU Ski boots

  • Performance : Available in two different flex patterns (medium and hard) and with various interfaces between the snow boots and hard exoskeletons, the DAHU ski boots give you the same performance as your traditional ski boots.
  • Comfort : Equipped with a waterproof and breathable membrane and Primaloft's thermal insulation, your feet will finally feel comfortable in ski boots. Your feet are not imprisoned in a rigid shell and breathe better and the inner Sidas sole can even be replaced by an orthopedic one for high-end customization.
  • Fashion : DAHU's microfiber and exoskeleton offers great possibilities in terms of design keeping up with fashion on the high street and on the slopes
  • Weight : With an average weight of 2.2 kg per boot, DAHU offers some of the lightest boots on the market
  • Cost : Buying separate ski boots and snow boots of the same quality will cost you approximately 715€, that is 125€ more than DAHU Ski boots

What's inside ?

  • Grilamid L Polyamide 12 used for the exoskeletons
  • Microfiber with high reistance to flexing, abrasion and water
  • Waterproof and breathable membrane
  • Primaloft ECO FOOTWEAR thermal insulation
  • PU memory foam for optimized comfort inside the boots
  • Sidas inner soles specially designed for winter sports
  • Real vulcanized rubber soles

Already 3 highly coveted Awards : ISPO & Red Dot

  • ISPO Award - Product of the Year 2014/15

"Even though modern ski boots have become high-tech products with many fascinating functional solutions, many people are unhappy about these bulky and stiff hardshells on their feet when it comes to general comfort – especially when walking or standing once the skis are taken off. The DAHU boot is a hybrid between a plastic ski boot and a soft winter boot. The soft boot can be used for all kinds of winter activities, and once it is inserted into the exoskeleton, the DAHU becomes a ski boot meeting all requirements of the ski industry, delivering full performance on the slope. All parts and functions as well as the interface connection are very well designed and crafted – and easy to operate. The jury agreed that DAHU deserves to be the Overall Winner with this very sophisticated and fully developed product that has the potential to revolutionize the ski boot market." Wolfgang Greiner, Publisher SkiPresse Germany & Member of the ISPO Jury
  • Red Dot Award - Product Design 2014
  • Top 100 Swiss Start-ups : 28th rank 


What professionals say about DAHU ?

"When I first saw this ski boot at the ISPO Winter Show 2013, I was convinced that this product has a bright future ahead of it. A revolutionary product, that combines a high performance skiing experience with all other winter activities such as snowshoe hiking, sledding or such a little walk through the village after a nice skiing day. All that, without having to change shoes and with great comfort. I have tried these shoes on personally, and it feels amazing. Technically the concept works perfectly, and I can’t feel any difference to other shoes in its range regarding its stiffness and quality. For people who are looking for high level of comfort while skiing, but who don’t want to miss out on performance, I can strongly recommend this new innovative ski boot." Hans-Martin Heierling  (Coming from a family with over 125 years of experience in the ski boot industry and today the oldest ski boot manufacture worldwide, Hans-Martin Heierling is today one of the best known ski boot fitting specialists. Many World Cup Stars such as Didier Cuche, Bode Miller, Ivica Kostelic, Lindsey Vonn or Tina Maze already used his expertise and knowledge to enhance their performance on the snow.)  http://www.heierling.ch

Press releases :
  • Skieur Magazine (France) : original article in french, english translation
  • Le Monde (France) : original article in french
  • freepresse.com (France) : original article in french, english translation
  • Open Mag (Switzerland) : french/english/german version
For press inquiries, please contact us at : contact@dahu.pro


How it all began ?

What is a skier's life really like today? Don't say that your feet have never suffered after being squashed all day inside your ski boots with their tough shell.

We have all dreamed of taking off our ski boots, if only a moment when they stop for lunch, go shopping at the end of the day or to go for a drink after the slopes, and only to put them back on if they really had to? Everybody or almost everybody has been there, including Nicolas Frey, the founder of DAHU Sports Company.

DAHU's story began in 2009 when the wife of Nicolas Frey could not find any ski boots that did not hurt her feet, even after trying top of the line injected boots that were molded to fit them. But, where most of us accept defeat, he saw an opportunity to develop something different, something revolutionary: "We needed to completely rethink the design of modern ski boots." he explains. He started to design the first prototypes on paper and to put them together in his garage.

A trained designer with a passion for winter sports, he began the task with no preconceptions and followed his instinct. However, the task proved to be far from simple. Trying to find the right compromise between rigidity and flexibility, safety and comfort, performance and style... Reinventing something whose design has not changed for 40 years. A real hunt for the ideal ski boot began until the goal was reached after four long years of development. The legend became a reality!

What was once just a dream became a vision; and from this vision the dream took shape: DAHU was brought to life!


Why the name "DAHU" ?

DAHU... is the name of a wild animal that is said to have evolved shorter legs on one side to suit the slopes of the Swiss mountains...

Of course, this is nothing but a legend...

Now, DAHU is also the name of the perfect ski boots, so advanced and innovative that they offer high performance on your skis, are comfortable, stylish and suited for walking, hiking, driving and much more.

And this is the reality...


What is DAHU's vision ?

DAHU's vision is to shake and change the ski market forever, exactly like carving skis did in the 1990s.

The time is over now when skiers had to suffer to practice their favorite sport and leisure. All together, we can put a term to this ignominy and give a new youth to winter sports.

After selling almost 1'000 pairs in Europe during last Winter 2013/14, we need your help to grow more and offer the first ski boots bringing together performance and comfort.


Why DAHU is looking for funds on Indiegogo ?

Today, we are expecting to gather 500'000 € in order to cover our operational costs during this second season on the market and if, our target is exceeded, to already start the developments of new innovative products that we have in mind.


How can I help ?

To help us, you can buy the following products which can all be shipped worldwide without extra costs.

  1. Beanie : 25€

  2. T-Shirt for Ladies : 45€

    Zoom on the back : 

  3. T-Shirt for Gentlemen : 45€

    Zoom on the back : 

  4. Hoodie : 90€

  5. Backpack designed to carry the DAHU exoskeletons : 130€
  6. Coupon "30% off" : 165€  (perfect for birthday or Christmas gifts)
  7. Coupon "50% off" : 280€ (perfect for birthday or Christmas gifts)
  8. Joe & Jane (unisex / medium flex) : 590€

  9. Lady O (ladies / medium flex) : 590€

  10. Doc D (genlemen / medium flex) : 590€
  11. Miss A (ladies / hard flex) : 620€

  12. Monsieur Ed (gentlemen / hard flex) : 620€

  13. Couple pack : two pairs of DAHU ski boots selected among the collection for 1'000 €
  14. Premium leather edition : for 2'000 €, you'll get the DAHU Ski Boots re-visited in leather with high-end finitions. This limited edition will be a must in terms of elegance on slopes.
  15. Your personalised DAHU Ski Boots : for 4'000€, we will invite you at DAHU's office in Fribourg (Switzerland) and give you the opportunity to design your own pair of DAHU ski boots, picking the colors and materials of your choice within reasonable limits.
  16. A Professional Pack of 25 personalised DAHU ski boots with your brand and logo on it, ideal for companies, schools and associations : 10'000€

Besides, if you like DAHU, don't forget to tell about us to your friends or on social networks ?


Boots Sizes Chart & How to find your DAHU boots size ?

To help you pick the correct boots sizes, please refer to the following sizes chart:

  Mondopoint           EU          UK          US  
24.0 36       3 ½             4 ½      
24.5       36 ¾     4 5
25.0 37 ½ 4 ½ 5 ½
25.5 38 ¼ 5 6
26.0 39 5 ⅔ 6 ⅔
26.5 39 ¾ 6 ⅓ 7 ⅓

Who's behind DAHU ?

Nicolas Frey, Chief Executive Officer & Chairman Founder, nfrey@dahu.pro

With a background in Design and Marketing, Nicolas has worked more than 10 years in product design and project management in the luxury industry. Nicolas  managed the development of products and marketing concepts from scratch to production in the USA, Hong Kong and Europe.


Maxime Thenus, Financial & Administrative Director, mthenus@dahu.pro

With degrees in Sport Management and Information Technology, Maxime has worked for 8 years as engineer, team leader and business analyst in multinational companies and international sport federations.


Antoine Massy, Sr R&D & Production Manager

Clément Rozier, Events Manager

Tamara Berger, PR & Community Manager

Joelle Gillieron, Sales Manager

Chris Johnson, Sales Representative


DAHU's Advisors

Aline Bonjour (FIS Profile)

As a professional skier (slalom, giant, super G, downhill) from the Swiss team with several participations in FIS World Cups, Aline brought her expertise in product development and testing and also assisted with the Public Relations.


Peter Mahrer (LinkedIn Profile)

After a long career as Head of Footwear and Ski Boots Department at Intersport International Corp., Senior Vice President at adidas-Salomon AG, Head of Int. Sales at Puma AG and President EMEA at Under Armour USA, Peter is now Member of the Supervisory Board of Arena. Recently and recently came to the board of DAHU to help on business strategy.


I have questions/remarks. How do I contact someone on the DAHU team?

The simplest way is for you to post your question/remark on this Indiegogo page and we wil answer you as soon as possible.

If you want to learn more about us, visit our website.

You can also leave us a message using the form or directly send an e-mail to contact@dahu.pro
story_txt:
How does it work ?

At the heart of the DAHU ski boot is a flexible molded polyurethane boot, fitted with a waterproof membrane and a real rubber sole, making them exceptionally comfortable for your feet. Boots that you can wear all day long in the ski resort for walking, hiking, driving, shopping and even clubbing. A stylish boot that combines both urban and ski resort looks.
As you arrive on the slopes, you just need to slip on the exoskeleton, an external shell with a rigid sole combined with two articulated spoilers: one at the rear that grips your heel and the other at the front that you close around your foot. The two spoilers clip together and lock perfectly using a system with two buckles. You get the same performance as a traditional ski boot, but DAHU combines this with vastly superior comfort and perfect control over your skis.





The DAHU Ski boots



Performance : Available in two different flex patterns (medium and hard) and with various interfaces between the snow boots and hard exoskeletons, the DAHU ski boots give you the same performance as your traditional ski boots.

Comfort : Equipped with a waterproof and breathable membrane and Primaloft's thermal insulation, your feet will finally feel comfortable in ski boots. Your feet are not imprisoned in a rigid shell and breathe better and the inner Sidas sole can even be replaced by an orthopedic one for high-end customization.

Fashion : DAHU's microfiber and exoskeleton offers great possibilities in terms of design keeping up with fashion on the high street and on the slopes

Weight : With an average weight of 2.2 kg per boot, DAHU offers some of the lightest boots on the market

Cost : Buying separate ski boots and snow boots of the same quality will cost you approximately 715€, that is 125€ more than DAHU Ski boots



What's inside ?



Grilamid L Polyamide 12 used for the exoskeletons
Microfiber with high reistance to flexing, abrasion and water
Waterproof and breathable membrane
Primaloft ECO FOOTWEAR thermal insulation

PU memory foam for optimized comfort inside the boots

Sidas inner soles specially designed for winter sports
Real vulcanized rubber soles



Already 3 highly coveted Awards : ISPO & Red Dot

ISPO Award - Product of the Year 2014/15

"Even though modern ski boots have become high-tech products with many fascinating functional solutions, many people are unhappy about these bulky and stiff hardshells on their feet when it comes to general comfort – especially when walking or standing once the skis are taken off. The DAHU boot is a hybrid between a plastic ski boot and a soft winter boot. The soft boot can be used for all kinds of winter activities, and once it is inserted into the exoskeleton, the DAHU becomes a ski boot meeting all requirements of the ski industry, delivering full performance on the slope. All parts and functions as well as the interface connection are very well designed and crafted – and easy to operate. The jury agreed that DAHU deserves to be the Overall Winner with this very sophisticated and fully developed product that has the potential to revolutionize the ski boot market." Wolfgang Greiner, Publisher SkiPresse Germany & Member of the ISPO Jury


Red Dot Award - Product Design 2014

Top 100 Swiss Start-ups : 28th rank 









What professionals say about DAHU ?

"When I first saw this ski boot at the ISPO Winter Show 2013, I was convinced that this product has a bright future ahead of it. A revolutionary product, that combines a high performance skiing experience with all other winter activities such as snowshoe hiking, sledding or such a little walk through the village after a nice skiing day. All that, without having to change shoes and with great comfort. I have tried these shoes on personally, and it feels amazing. Technically the concept works perfectly, and I can’t feel any difference to other shoes in its range regarding its stiffness and quality. For people who are looking for high level of comfort while skiing, but who don’t want to miss out on performance, I can strongly recommend this new innovative ski boot." Hans-Martin Heierling  (Coming from a family with over 125 years of experience in the ski boot industry and today the oldest ski boot manufacture worldwide, Hans-Martin Heierling is today one of the best known ski boot fitting specialists. Many World Cup Stars such as Didier Cuche, Bode Miller, Ivica Kostelic, Lindsey Vonn or Tina Maze already used his expertise and knowledge to enhance their performance on the snow.)  http://www.heierling.ch


Press releases :


Skieur Magazine (France) : original article in french, english translation

Le Monde (France) : original article in french
freepresse.com (France) : original article in french, english translation


Open Mag (Switzerland) : french/english/german version



For press inquiries, please contact us at : contact@dahu.pro



How it all began ?

What is a skier's life really like today? Don't say that your feet have never suffered after being squashed all day inside your ski boots with their tough shell.
We have all dreamed of taking off our ski boots, if only a moment when they stop for lunch, go shopping at the end of the day or to go for a drink after the slopes, and only to put them back on if they really had to? Everybody or almost everybody has been there, including Nicolas Frey, the founder of DAHU Sports Company.
DAHU's story began in 2009 when the wife of Nicolas Frey could not find any ski boots that did not hurt her feet, even after trying top of the line injected boots that were molded to fit them. But, where most of us accept defeat, he saw an opportunity to develop something different, something revolutionary: "We needed to completely rethink the design of modern ski boots." he explains. He started to design the first prototypes on paper and to put them together in his garage.
A trained designer with a passion for winter sports, he began the task with no preconceptions and followed his instinct. However, the task proved to be far from simple. Trying to find the right compromise between rigidity and flexibility, safety and comfort, performance and style... Reinventing something whose design has not changed for 40 years. A real hunt for the ideal ski boot began until the goal was reached after four long years of development. The legend became a reality!
What was once just a dream became a vision; and from this vision the dream took shape: DAHU was brought to life!


Why the name "DAHU" ?

DAHU... is the name of a wild animal that is said to have evolved shorter legs on one side to suit the slopes of the Swiss mountains...
Of course, this is nothing but a legend...
Now, DAHU is also the name of the perfect ski boots, so advanced and innovative that they offer high performance on your skis, are comfortable, stylish and suited for walking, hiking, driving and much more.
And this is the reality...


What is DAHU's vision ?
DAHU's vision is to shake and change the ski market forever, exactly like carving skis did in the 1990s.
The time is over now when skiers had to suffer to practice their favorite sport and leisure. All together, we can put a term to this ignominy and give a new youth to winter sports.
After selling almost 1'000 pairs in Europe during last Winter 2013/14, we need your help to grow more and offer the first ski boots bringing together performance and comfort.





Why DAHU is looking for funds on Indiegogo ?

Today, we are expecting to gather 500'000 € in order to cover our operational costs during this second season on the market and if, our target is exceeded, to already start the developments of new innovative products that we have in mind.

How can I help ?

To help us, you can buy the following products which can all be shipped worldwide without extra costs.
Beanie : 25€

T-Shirt for Ladies : 45€
Zoom on the back : 

T-Shirt for Gentlemen : 45€
Zoom on the back :

Backpack designed to carry the DAHU exoskeletons : 130€

Coupon "30% off" : 165€  (perfect for birthday or Christmas gifts)
Coupon "50% off" : 280€ (perfect for birthday or Christmas gifts)

Couple pack : two pairs of DAHU ski boots selected among the collection for 1'000 €

Premium leather edition : for 2'000 €, you'll get the DAHU Ski Boots re-visited in leather with high-end finitions. This limited edition will be a must in terms of elegance on slopes.
Your personalised DAHU Ski Boots : for 4'000€, we will invite you at DAHU's office in Fribourg (Switzerland) and give you the opportunity to design your own pair of DAHU ski boots, picking the colors and materials of your choice within reasonable limits.

A Professional Pack of 25 personalised DAHU ski boots with your brand and logo on it, ideal for companies, schools and associations : 10'000€

story:
Having to take trains and buses everyday and walk the last mile to destination has always made us wonder, what if we can also be on wheels for that last part of the journey? This has lead us to look into various means of lightweight personal wheels.

Aren't there already electric scooters out in the market? Yes there are. However, we have all 3 very important attributes that would make a scooter really desirable. If you do not want to embarass yourself by dragging a heavy, unsightly scooter to work, with the battery depleting halfway during your trip, our GP Board is the solution. It is:

1) Lightweight - Being lightweight and compact, it folds up effortlessly, while being durable for everyday use.

2) One charge - One charge brings you 10 km, easily to your nearest station and back. Just charge every night after getting home and you'll be ready for your next ride.

3) Responsive - Accelerator and brake buttons right at your fingertips to allow for faster response to situations, ensuring a safe ride!

Manufacturing this scooter is expensive, especially when we demand the best quality for our product. Also, we understand the pain of walking to train stations in the morning when we are barely even awake. 

Therefore, alleviate your morning blues by waking up later, enjoying a nutritious breakfast, scooting your way to the train station or bus stops quickly and stylishly,and of course get to your destination punctually.

Your pledges will help in making joyous mornings possible for you and others!

And now... the product that makes travelling a fun one

Powered by a brushless motor and li-ion battery pack
Foldable to bring up to a train or buses.


How bad can a weekday be when even what you step on looks so cool?

The previous design

The design started off pretty simple like these:


Earlier versions design

What's our progression now?

We are working on making GP Board's towards production ready. We will update you once we're finalized! 


The Team

Manny G (The dreamer)

Manny always dream of wanky and futurist designs that leads to the final iteration. Manny is also well versed with mechanical and electrical designs.


Michael S (the nuts and bolts man)

He is super quick on his CAD and CNC machining.


Richie W (the buzz man)

Richie designs various control boards and electrical circuits.


To Production!

This is our targeted timeline to provide gpboard to the world:

Nov 13: Finalise testing and design (by the team)

Dec 13: Begin manufacture of 1st batch of 100 sets (Michael S will oversee)

Feb 13: Begin manufacture in full scale (by the team)

Production will be done by a Singapore company, HOPE Manufacturing which has years of experience in electronics and hardware manufacturing.

story:
Australian women’s wear designed specifically for you, crowd-sourced and delivered without the expensive price tag!

Here's our story:

We’ve spent many frustrating years looking for garments that fit our body types. We didn’t think we were alone, so we asked many women what they found the most frustrating when buying clothing. It seemed unanimous, FIT.  

After listening to Women everywhere, we created a way to fit women of various body types with garments we love.  We wanted to get closer to the people who buy them, and sell them at an affordable price.

Here’s how we're doing it:

Australian Designed with Sizing Variations

For the last six months, we have been working tirelessly to redefine standard women’s sizes. We started with the sizing, developing a range of bust sizes and height variations and then followed with the design to ensure that our sizing system would work with each garment to give the best fit possible. With a core range of classic basics to build a solid base for your wardrobe, we are offering you the Classic Annie Business Shirt for just $99.00. 

Crowd-sourced

Other fashion brands guess what their customers want, we’re letting you decide. We have designed a complete collection from the perfectly fitted shirt to suiting and dresses and you have the ultimate word in what gets produced.  If we can raise the capital we need, we will produce the shirts and with further funding we will be able to produce the suiting and dresses.

Delivered to you at wholesale

Most quality shirts cost around $150.00 and sometimes you even have to have these altered to fit properly. We are selling our designed-to-fit Classic Annie Shirt for $99.00, shipped directly to you. International orders will incur an additional $10.00 shipping fee and this can be paid via the $1 perk by changing the amount to $10.00. To expedite orders, please use the paypal option for your contribution. 

We're creating something totally new. Join us!

We can't wait to see where ALL MYN goes with your support and believe that taking the guess work out of fitting is the future of clothing! 

Awesome. How can I be part of it?

We are starting with Indiegogo, so that you have a say in what we produce.

To support us, click ‘contribute’ or select one of the great 'Perks' to the right. As we receive funding for each item, we will release more perks! 

When we've raised $25K, we can buy all the materials and have the Classic Annie Shirt made in 9 variations of each size. At $50K we will be able to make 15 variations in each size.  At $75k we can start to produce the collection, starting with the suiting, to compliment your beautiful Classic Annie Shirt. There will be nothing better than going to work knowing you are tailored from head to toe! 

Our Experience

We have thought about this project for over five and half years, trying different brands and sizes everywhere and have spent the last six months working closely with our design team and factories.  It has been hard work and many prototypes later we have a beautiful product that we want to share with you.

Our Commitment

Fashion has been a labour of love. We wanted clothes that fitted us.  We wanted clothing that was going to make us look and feel good, regardless of our frame. We found that we were not alone and expanded our ideas and created our unique sizing system. Enabling more people to have the same experience of designed-to-fit clothing with off the shelf pricing. Nothing will change, that because it’s the brand we’ve built.

In the fashion industry it’s all about The 3 F’s: Fit, Fabric, Finish. Get these right and you have the perfect garment that people will want time and again. 

Fit - At ALL MYN we design only what we like to wear. The Classic Annie shirt is the perfect office shirt with elegant styling, a tapered waist and French cuffs.  Not too tight and not too loose, a timeless cut that will never go out of style.

Fabric – For all of our shirts we are using fine cottons and cotton blends that are durable and breathable. We have sourced fabrics from all over the world to give you a quality garment that is soft against the skin and easy to maintain.

Finish -  We've been working with an amazing team with great attention to detail. With all the effort we put into the fit and fabric, we followed through to our amazing finish, including custom buttons and detailed top stitching.


I'm in. What sizes are you making?

Other companies put sizing in the too hard basket and give a generic size range. We are making four main sizes of AUS 8,10,12 and 14 with 9 variations each size for the smaller production order. If we can raise over $50k we will be able to produce 15 variations for each size. This is what sets us apart from every other fashion brand, so that is a LOT of choice to get a great FIT! 

Shirts, Tops and dresses:

There are 5 bust sizes and 3 length measurements for every size bracket. 

Measure your waist and hips and find your size bracket. (e.g. 8,10,12,14 etc)

Then measure your bust and work across the table in your size bracket to match up your measurement. (e.g. perky, curvy, curvaceous, voluptuous, very voluptuous)

Then measure your arm length from shoulder tip to wrist bone with a bent elbow and select your closest arm length measurement. (e.g. short, regular, long)

What you will end up with is three pieces of information:

E.g.  Size bracket: 12      Bust: Curvy      Arm length: Short

You now have your ALL MYN tailored size for shirts, tops and dresses! 

For Trousers and Skirts: 

Measure your waist and hips and find your size bracket. (e.g. 8,10,12,14 etc)

Then measure your inner leg length. If you find this difficult, measure a pair of pants you have already had altered. Then move to the last three columns in the size table and select the closest leg length measurement. 

What you will end up with is two pieces of information:

E.g.  Size bracket: 12     Leg length: Short

You now have your ALL MYN tailored trouser and skirt size! 

(Once we have skirts in production, you can also select longer lengths in the shorter skirt styles, perfect for those that prefer a little more coverage) 

Anything I can do to help?

After you support us, we would love if you helped spread the word. If you have had similar experiences to us, we know that you would want to tell friends and family about us too. Email, Facebook, Twitter - whatever you prefer!

We can be found on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+ and Youtube. 

Don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@allmyn.net

Delivery

All delivery within Australia is included in the perk of your choice. International shipping will cost an additional $10.00. Once our Indiegogo campaign closes, production will start and we hope to be delivering by the end of November. 

FAQ

Do you ship internationally? 

Yes, we ship internationally, just add the extra $10.00 for shipping using the $1.00 perk. 

Why do you use centimetres, I'm only familiar with inches? 

As we have a large range of sizes, centimetres allows us to be more precise with our measurements. Most measuring tapes will have centimetres and inches, use the centimetre measurement and refer to the size table. If you are still not sure, use one of the many conversion sites available on the web. 

Why do you refer to AUS sizes?

We are an Australian brand and use the AUS sizes as a standard measurement but don't let this deter you! Because our sizing is unique, we suggest that you re-measure yourself right now and refer to the table measurements, ensuring you get the best possible fit. 

I'm not sure what my size is, can you help me? 

Yes, we can help you select the best sizing option for your body type! This is our goal and the reason why we started ALL MYN. Simply measure yourself and send the details to support@allmyn.net and we will let you know the best fit for you. 

Do you make smaller sizes than AUS 8 and larger than AUS 16?

We hope to produce AUS size 6 up to AUS 18 at full production. To do this, we need to raise over $150,000. You may ask why? This is because production at this level of variations, over a larger range of sizes, increases the minimum order quantities. (A major reason why most brands don't offer such choice!) Once we raise enough funds, we will advise you that these have become available.  

Where do I provide my sizing and shipping information? 

Measure yourself and go to the size chart below and select the closest sizes to your perfect fit. If you are between sizes, choose the next size bracket and corresponding bust and height measurements. Provide this with your shipping information during the checkout process on Indiegogo or email to support@allmyn.net with your contact details.  

What happens if you don't reach your goal? 

We really hope that we do! :)

If we don't, we will fill the orders as best we can with the 9 variations of the smaller production run. If you are not within this size range, we can offer you a voucher to use on our website at a later date. As we are unable to refund from our Indiegogo campaign, in the event that vouchers are issued they are not transferrable or redeemable for cash.

PLEASE USE THE LINKS ON THE RIGHT TO CONTRIBUTE OR CHOOSE ONE OF THE PERKS TO PURCHASE ONE OF OUR AMAZING PRODUCTS AND THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING OUR LAUNCH! 


THE TEAM OF ALL MYN THANKS YOU FOR MAKING THIS A REALITY!!

sizes everywhere and have spent the last six months working closely with our
design team and factories.  It has been hard work and many prototypes
later we have a beautiful product that we want to share with you.
Our
Commitment
Fashion has
been a labour of love. We wanted clothes that fitted us.  We wanted
clothing that was going to make us look and feel good, regardless of our frame.
We found that we were not alone and expanded our ideas and created our unique
sizing system. Enabling more people to have the same experience of
designed-to-fit clothing with off the shelf pricing. Nothing will change, that
because it’s the brand we’ve built.
In the
fashion industry it’s all about The 3 F’s: Fit, Fabric, Finish. Get these right
and you have the perfect garment that people will want time and again. 
Fit - At ALL MYN we design only what we like to
wear. The Classic Annie shirt is the perfect office shirt with elegant styling,
a tapered waist and French cuffs.  Not too tight and not too loose, a
timeless cut that will never go out of style.
Fabric – For all of our shirts we are using fine
cottons and cotton blends that are durable and breathable. We have sourced
fabrics from all over the world to give you a quality garment that is soft
against the skin and easy to maintain.
Finish -  We've been working with an amazing
team with great attention to detail. With all the effort we put into the fit
and fabric, we followed through to our amazing finish, including custom buttons
and detailed top stitching.



I'm
in. What sizes are you making?
Other
companies put sizing in the too hard basket and give a generic size
range. We are making four main sizes of AUS 8,10,12 and 14 with 9
variations each size for the smaller production order. If we can raise over
$50k we will be able to produce 15 variations for each size. This is what sets
us apart from every other fashion brand, so that is a LOT of choice to get a
great FIT! 


Shirts, Tops and dresses:There are 5 bust sizes and 3 length measurements for every size bracket. 
Measure your waist and hips and find your size bracket. (e.g. 8,10,12,14 etc)
Then measure your bust and work across the table in your size bracket to match up your measurement. (e.g. perky, curvy, curvaceous, voluptuous, very voluptuous)
Then measure your arm length from shoulder tip to wrist bone with a bent elbow and select your closest arm length measurement. (e.g. short, regular, long)
What you will end up with is three pieces of information:
E.g.  Size bracket: 12      Bust: Curvy      Arm length: Short
You now have your ALL MYN tailored size for shirts, tops and dresses! 
For Trousers and Skirts: 
Measure your waist and hips and find your size bracket. (e.g. 8,10,12,14 etc)
Then measure your inner leg length. If you find this difficult, measure a pair of pants you have already had altered. Then move to the last three columns in the size table and select the closest leg length measurement. 

What you will end up with is two pieces of information:
E.g.  Size bracket: 12     Leg length: Short
You now have your ALL MYN tailored trouser and skirt size! 
(Once we have skirts in production, you can also select longer lengths in the shorter skirt styles, perfect for those that prefer a little more coverage) 
Anything
I can do to help?
After you
support us, we would love if you helped spread the word. If you have had
similar experiences to us, we know that you would want to tell friends and
family about us too. Email, Facebook, Twitter - whatever you prefer!
We can be
found on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+ and Youtube. 
Don't
hesitate to reach out to us at support@allmyn.net
Delivery
All delivery
within Australia is included in the perk of your choice. International shipping
will cost an additional $10.00. Once our Indiegogo campaign closes, production
will start and we hope to be delivering by the end of November. 
FAQ
Do
you ship internationally? 
Yes, we ship
internationally, just add the extra $10.00 for shipping using the $1.00
perk. 
Why
do you use centimetres, I'm only familiar with inches? 
As we have a
large range of sizes, centimetres allows us to be more precise with our
measurements. Most measuring tapes will have centimetres and inches, use the
centimetre measurement and refer to the size table. If you are still not sure,
use one of the many conversion sites available on the web. 
Why
do you refer to AUS sizes?
We are an
Australian brand and use the AUS sizes as a standard measurement but don't let
this deter you! Because our sizing is unique, we suggest that you re-measure
yourself right now and refer to the table measurements, ensuring you get the
best possible fit. 
I'm
not sure what my size is, can you help me? 
Yes, we can
help you select the best sizing option for your body type! This is our goal and
the reason why we started ALL MYN. Simply measure yourself and send the details
to support@allmyn.net and we will let you know the best fit for you. 
Do
you make smaller sizes than AUS 8 and larger than AUS 16?
We hope to
produce AUS size 6 up to AUS 18 at full production. To do this, we need to
raise over $150,000. You may ask why? This is because production at this level
of variations, over a larger range of sizes, increases the minimum order
quantities. (A major reason why most brands don't offer such choice!) Once we
raise enough funds, we will advise you that these have become available.  
Where
do I provide my sizing and shipping information? 
Measure
yourself and go to the size chart below and select the closest sizes to your
perfect fit. If you are between sizes, choose the next size bracket and
corresponding bust and height measurements. Provide this with your shipping
information during the checkout process on Indiegogo or email to
support@allmyn.net with your contact details.  
What
happens if you don't reach your goal? 
We really
hope that we do! :)
If we don't,
we will fill the orders as best we can with the 9 variations of the smaller
production run. If you are not within this size range, we can offer you a
voucher to use on our website at a later date. As we are unable to refund from
our Indiegogo campaign, in the event that vouchers are issued they are not
transferrable or redeemable for cash. 
PLEASE
USE THE LINKS ON THE RIGHT TO CONTRIBUTE OR CHOOSE ONE OF THE PERKS TO PURCHASE
ONE OF OUR AMAZING PRODUCTS AND THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING OUR LAUNCH! 


THE TEAM OF
ALL MYN THANKS YOU FOR MAKING THIS A REALITY!!

story:
WHO AM I?

So here's the low down. My name is Irene Fonda Varkis aka FONDA. I received my Masters Degree in Fashion Design from The Istituto Marangoni in Milan, Italy. After graduating I continued to travel and work abroad as a freelance designer. After I did this, that and the other, I returned home to Florida to begin my work on/as FONDA.

Fast-forward to today and I have a screen-printing shop and design studio with my partner. What can I say? I love the message tee.

WHAT AM I DOING?

I plan to present my first collection this year for FONDA.                               

Abierta  Spring / Summer 2014

The word Abierta means open in Spanish and pretty simply that is what I am now.

      Abierta~Just a street girl with an old world soul.   

WHAT IS FONDA?

FONDA is a womens ready-to-wear label that will show collections that specialize in attire for warmer climate locations. ~Imagine Resort wear year round.

WHAT IS FONDA ALL ABOUT?

FONDA is urban chic with a rush of femininity. Prints that make you feel like you're on vacation and fabrics that blend luxury and comfort. Pieces that not only look great but are also easy to wear, lightweight and breathable. Perfect for year-round tropical climate. ~We're talking Pima Cottons & Linen blends.

WHAT DO I NEED?

I'm doing this project for two reasons. To raise funding to help with the production of my samples and to make new friends. A simple like or follow is great help too! Like FONDA on Facebook, Follow @ivfonda on Twitter, and check out FONDA on Tumblr at biglovefonda.tumblr.com

HOW MUCH FUNDING DO I NEED AND WHERE WILL IT GO?

I'm asking for $4000.00 and it's pretty simple where it's going. Here's the breakdown-

  • $2850    Sampling Materials ~Specifically Custom Printed Fabrics.
  • $750      Cost of products for Limited Edition Weekender Collection.
  • $350      Indiegogo Fee.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?   

The Limited Edition Weekender Collection~

This is FONDAs weekend ready collection for the summer! Full of vaca-state of mind messages and awesome graphics. A little taste of what FONDA is all about. These are all Limited Edition designs that will only be available now for this special collection. All of which are printed here in Southwest Florida in our shop.

THE PIECES

BIGLOVE Bumper Sticker ~ FONDAs #1 message to the masses! Easy peel sticker 11.5"x3" Black on White backround.

 

YOU ARE HERE NOW Poster ~ Because sometimes we can't make it to the beach. Full color print on heavy stock paper. 17"x11"

YES SEX Denim Mesh Back Cap ~ Embroidered print. One size structured unisex cap. Snap closure.

 

WEEKENDER Bag ~ This bag is strictly for the weekend people. Classic style barrel duffel. Single zipper main opening. Zippered side pocket. Detachable/adjustable shoulder strap. Denier Polyester/Made with 50% Recycled material. 18"x10"x10"

LADIES TEES  The tease tees ~ a flowy, boxy tee perfect for fun in the sun! (65%polyester 35%viscose) 3.5oz Extremely Lightweight. Available in sizes S-XL  

1 for $25 / 2 for $45 / 3 for $60

EVIL EYE TEE

CHILLAX TEE

HI BOYS! TEE

 

Beach cover up or pool party? Either way, these dresses work! Available in sizes S-XL.

1 for $30 / 2 for $50

FONDA CAM Jersey Cotton Tank Dress 4.2oz white (100% combed & ring-spun cotton)

BIKINI BLOCK TOP Short Sleeve Dress 3.8oz soft pink (55% combed & ring-spun cotton/45% polyester)

 

GENTS TEES Crewneck tee with a retro cut and finish. ~ Washed retro cotton jersey, features a 2x1 ribbed neck cut on the bias and blindstitching on the sleeves and bottom hem. (100% cotton jersey) 4oz Available in sizes S-XL.

1 for $35 / 2 for $60 / 3 for $80

SON OF A BEACH TEE

CHILLAX TEE

SHARISE TEE (Yes that's her name, any lady on a t-shirt should have a name.)

 

 

 

AVAILABLE FOR PRE-ORDER FROM THE ABIERTA COLLECTION

ABIERTA Spring/Summer 2014 MOOD BOARD POSTER  Full color print on heavy stock paper. 17"x11"

QUE PASA? TEE  Ultra Ligthweight tee, white sheer jersey. Laundered for a softer hand. Features a slim fit and long cut. Deep V-Neck. (100% cotton) 3.8oz Available in sizes S-XL 

 MADE IN LA/USA  Screen Printed right here in Southwest Florida.

LET'S FLY AWAY TEE  Ultra Ligthweight tee, white sheer jersey. Laundered for a softer hand. Features a slim fit and long cut. Deep V-Neck. (100% cotton) 3.8oz Available in sizes S-XL 

MADE IN LA/USA  Screen Printed right here in Southwest Florida.

 

LADIES HEXAGON PRINT VICE BLAZER  Custom Printed Linen-Cotton blend (55% linen/45% cotton) Fully Lined with Pima Cotton Batiste. One button closure with side openings on sleeves. Side pockets & left pocket detail.  Available in sizes S-XL.

MADE IN USA, Right here in Southwest Florida.

 

~Check out some other pieces from the collection.~

 

 

WHAT WILL I DO AFTER THE MONEY IS SPENT?

Once my samples are made I will begin the hunt! This is where I start approaching specialty shops and boutiques to carry my collection. I've even got a few eagerly waiting for a preview. I'll also be holding viewing parties and attending trade shows.

WHAT HAPPENS TO YOU?

I promise to keep in touch if you do too. Like I said earlier, this project isn't just about raising necessary funds, it's also about FONDA making new friends! And Indiegogo is a great platform to do so!  Like FONDA on Facebook, follow @ivfonda on Twitter, and check out FONDA on Tumblr at biglovefonda.tumblr.com

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I have been working in the realm of design and production for a while now- so luckily I understand how this process works. I know there will be many last minute details, unexpected delays, expenses and obstacles. I will rely on my commitment to my work, my experience and the strong community I have built with fellow creatives.      

Our primary risk is meeting the timeline for shipping orders. If we significantly exceed our funding expectations we wil bring in the necessary resources to expedite the production and shipping process. And we will keep you informed of our progress if unexpected delays are encountered.

DANKE  SHOEN  /Thank you in German

Man...If you just read through everything and you don't even know me. Seriously, Thank you. And if you do know me, Thank you as well. You're a good friend.       

Thank you to Old Sparky Productions         www.oldsparkyproductions.com

Thank you to Blueprint                               Printmatic.net

Thank you to Wind N' Breeze                    www.youtube.com/watch?v=csooEEALwu4

Thank you to Dub Ekoms                          www.facebook.com/dub.ekoms.9

story:
In a land far, far away, on the shores of a great lake, in the shadows of majestic pines, where only the warm-hearted survive the frigid air, bearded men asked one woman one question, "Do you sell beard oil?" 

And the woman turned man after man away because the answer was "No." Until one day, she decided to give the men what they desired, and worked tirelessly until her recipe was perfected. 

"Ah, but it needs a name," the woman thought.  And -ka-thunk- blue tax dropped into her head, a gift from the muses. And BLUE TAX was born.

PLEASE NOTE THAT INDIEGOGO FUNDS WILL BE USED TO BRAND AND BUILD BLUE TAX AND WILL NOT BE DONATED TO ANY CHARITY OR CAUSE. YOUR SUPPORT OF THE BLUE TAX  INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN  WILL HELP US GROW TO MEET OUR MISSION AND HAVE A WIDER IMAPCT.

 

CLICK ON PERK BOX FOR MORE DETAILED INFORMATION.

 

 

 

This is a low risk project for backers- if you pledge, you get to enjoy a great product below the cost of current retail value.

BLUE TAX is my #1 priority now. My previous body product business, rōn for your life, is not producing new product or selling online, so I can focus on BLUE TAX.

The best possible challenge for BLUE TAX would be if interest and pledges exceed my dining room table manufacturing capacity. I have already begun researching equipment and locations to support increased production. Additionally I have also begun researching manufacturing facilities I could potentially contract with. With my previous business, I learned how to formulate recipes that are scalable, and made sure BLUE TAX product recipes could keep up with my ambition to make BLUE TAX big.

The most unpredictable challenge right now is COVID-19. I am aware of my suppliers' inventory for my ingredients and materials, as well as extended shipping and delivery times. I have set reward delivery times with this in mind and will plan ahead to ensure on time delivery of rewards. And, of course, I will keep my backers informed of any changes that may happen along our journey together.

story:
WHO AM I?

My name is Joshua Christensen.  I am a clothing designer with a focus on technology in menswear design, based in Los Angeles, CA. I was also a designer on Season 9 of Project Runway.  I have been able to accomplish so much in a short amount of time and this is who I am, and designing is what I do. I am working everyday to be part of the future of fashion.

THE CAMPAIGN

This campaign is to raise funds to create and launch the Spring/Summer 2014 Collection to be shown in fashion weeks this next fall, and to be shown to buyers and stores for wider distribution, which will then perpetuate company growth.  These funds will also be used to plan and execute fashion show events in both LA and NYC.  I am working and collaborating with successful professionals in various sectors of the industry to guide and assist me to ensure maximum success via this campaign. 

WHO ARE YOU?

You are part of the creative process. The future of fashion and design depends on you as you lend a hand in supporting the Joshua Christensen brand.  With your help, support, and donation I will work to create a fully comprehensive Spring/Summer collection that will be "the New Beginning" of the Joshua Christensen brand.  Your role in all of this is to lift the brand into a future company, providing quality and inspiring clothes to the masses season after season.  By helping to lay the foundation of the Joshua Christensen brand you are giving rise to new and exciting possibilities in fashion.  This is the greatness you possess and the incredible nature of this campaign.
 
$15,000 is a healthy minimum amount to start and fully complete every aspect of the collection and presentation, but with every dollar more, the more awesome and powerful the results will be.  Your generosity will set into motion a series of events that will allow the Joshua Christensen brand to become available to a worldwide audience.  You're contribution will lift us off the ground and give way to a new and exciting business.  The funds will go towards fabrics, trims, machines, work space, a full business plan, assistants, venues for showing, and all other basic business needs.
 
NO GOOD DEED GOES UNNOTICED

As part of the Joshua Christensen Campaign you will receive rewards for your donations.  Beyond my eternal gratitude I will offer up rewards such as custom t-shirts, clothing from the collection, and special invites to my shows and presentations.  You are special to me and I look forward to giving back for your generous donations.
 
If you can't donate, 'tis all good. I'm glad you saw this campaign and if you can see how important this is to me, please, share it will your friends via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, your blog, or by any other communication means.  Let's bring this campaign to light and let as many as would like, participate in the success of the Joshua Christensen cause.

HOW I GOT HERE

I grew up in Seattle, WA after being adopted by my incredible parents, raised alongside my amazing brothers and sisters, and with a feeling that anything is possible.  I have always felt like there is more for me in the world. A way to positively affect people and make a difference.
 
I served a two year mission in South America and then came back to study at Brigham Young University where I majored in Humanities and Art History Studies and minored in Spanish.  All the while working in banking and finance.  I knew I had to do something different with my life. I looked into may creative careers and found fashion to be the answer.  Fashion is something we all partake in and it can generate the same level of awe and happiness as any piece of art in a museum. 
 
I wanted to create and share a product with people that would inspire them, give them a voice, and make the everyday a little bit better. I left Utah and moved to Los Angeles and started my design career at the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising.  After finishing the program and my first couple collections I was accepted into the advanced design program, but had a six month break before starting. A friend suggested I apply to Project Runway on Facebook and posted the application on my Facebook page.  I filled it out, made a DVD and sent it in. I had no idea I would make it to NYC and on to the 9th season of the show.  It was a whirlwind of incredible times with the bestest of friends.  I may not have won but I was voted back on by my peers whom I love very much.
 
After the show, I returned to LA and started the advanced design program all the while creating multiple collections and attending fashion weeks all over the country. I have since been working for major design companies and now know I have something unique and special to offer the world.
 
A MILLION THANK YOUS
 
Thank you for believing in me, for giving me hope and for being a supportive friend.  You mean the world to me and I will never forget the generosity of others.  To give back is one of the greatest gifts and I hope to give back all the days of my life.
 
Best,
Joshua Christensen

$15,000 is a healthy minimum amount to start and fully complete every aspect of the collection and presentation, but with every dollar more, the more awesome and powerful the results will be.  Your generosity will set into motion a series of events that will allow the Joshua Christensen brand to become available to a worldwide audience.  You're contribution will lift us off the ground and give way to a new and exciting business.  The funds will go towards fabrics, trims, machines, work space, a full business plan, assistants, venues for showing, and all other basic business needs.
 
NO GOOD DEED GOES UNNOTICED

As part of the Joshua Christensen Campaign you will receive rewards for your donations.  Beyond my eternal gratitude I will offer up rewards such as custom t-shirts, clothing from the collection, and special invites to my shows and presentations.  You are special to me and I look forward to giving back for your generous donations.
 

If you can't donate, 'tis all good. I'm glad you saw this campaign and if you can see how important this is to me, please, share it will your friends via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, your blog, or by any other communication means.  Let's bring this campaign to light and let as many as would like, participate in the success of the Joshua Christensen cause.
HOW I GOT HERE
I grew up in Seattle, WA after being adopted by my incredible parents, raised alongside my amazing brothers and sisters, and with a feeling that anything is possible.  I have always felt like there is more for me in the world. A way to positively affect people and make a difference.
 
I served a two year mission in South America and then came back to study at Brigham Young University where I majored in Humanities and Art History Studies and minored in Spanish.  All the while working in banking and finance.  I knew I had to do something different with my life. I looked into may creative careers and found fashion to be the answer.  Fashion is something we all partake in and it can generate the same level of awe and happiness as any piece of art in a museum. 
 
I wanted to create and share a product with people that would inspire them, give them a voice, and make the everyday a little bit better. I left Utah and moved to Los Angeles and started my design career at the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising.  After finishing the program and my first couple collections I was accepted into the advanced design program, but had a six month break before starting. A friend suggested I apply to Project Runway on Facebook and posted the application on my Facebook page.  I filled it out, made a DVD and sent it in. I had no idea I would make it to NYC and on to the 9th season of the show.  It was a whirlwind of incredible times with the bestest of friends.  I may not have won but I was voted back on by my peers whom I love very much.
 
After the show, I returned to LA and started the advanced design program all the while creating multiple collections and attending fashion weeks all over the country. I have since been working for major design companies and now know I have something unique and special to offer the world.
 
A MILLION THANK YOUS
 
Thank you for believing in me, for giving me hope and for being a supportive friend.  You mean the world to me and I will never forget the generosity of others.  To give back is one of the greatest gifts and I hope to give back all the days of my life.
 
Best,
Joshua Christensen

story:
Our mission is “Sanitation is every child’s birthright”. Help us launch by grabbing a perk.

We are Abhati Suisse, a Swiss-Indian collaboration.

Abhati natural products are developed with our minds on the earth, an eye for beauty, and our hearts in the right place, to improve health, sanitation, and education.

Our initial product launch is One Hand Washes the Other.

One Hand Washes the Other is developed with nature in mind, from the ingredients to the packaging and ultimately to the environment and the people it sustains.

Indian herbology meets Swiss refinement: The rich recipe combines traditional remedies like anti-oxidizing moringa oil from India and soothing, antimicrobial Swiss Alpine edelweiss, along with other natural extracts. Our formula purifies, balances, and regenerates, while leaving skin velvety and refreshingly fragrant. Our products do not contain artificial colorants and are free of chemical preservatives, petroleum derivatives, and sulfates. Abhati packaging is green and environmentally friendly.

Your skin will be cleansed, pampered, and receive “peak” protection from the herbal extracts of plants native to the Indian Himalayas and the Swiss Alps.

Your donation will help launch this product.

Your product purchase will help buy toilets for schools that have none.

The dirty facts on poor sanitation

·  4 out of 10 people worldwide or 2.5 billion, have no proper place to poop

·  public defecation leads to disease, epidemics and social exclusion

·  diarrhea, a result of poor sanitation, causes 1 death every 20 seconds

·  sanitation can reduce contamination and resulting deaths by 37.5%

·  hand washing alone reduces deaths by 35%

Our first product

Since proper hand washing promotes hygiene and health, we thought it appropriate to launch the Abhati “Beauty with Dignity” campaign with our hand wash solution One Hand Washes the Other. Your donation is needed to kick start our first production batch run and distribution.

Our progress so far

Besides the R&D for the most awesome skin care line in bi-cultural cooperation, we are currently in talks with a major international retail chain in Switzerland to distribute our first product. Contacts have also been established to a few other potential retail chains abroad, which have shown interest in supporting Abhati.

FAQ Abhati Suisse: Background and Future

Who is the founder and what's her motivation?

My name is Anju Rupal. I was born in London to parents of Indian heritage. Raised in the UK, with an Indian-British upbringing, I first went to India at the age of 22. That was more than 20 years ago; I was walking on the streets of Mumbai, when a young
woman named Sita, with 2 children, nudged me from behind on the shoulder. When
I turned to her, she looked at me with shame in her eyes and asked me, in her urgency, to look after her two children while she sought a quiet place to go to the toilet.
This moment and the expression on that woman’s face have stayed with me ever
since, It has been my inspiration in founding Abhati.

I worked many years as a policy and social worker with victims of domestic violence in the UK & Switzerland. As an entrepreneur, I can look back on more than 10 years of experience. I'm a global citizen; a Swiss wife and mother of 2. And I recently founded an emergency walk-in clinic for children in Zurich Bahnhofstrasse and was on the board of an NGO called Weforest.

Who else is involved?

Divya Kalra, Campaign Manager, brings 8 years of project management & supply chain optimization experience to the table. She has an IT background and holds an MBA. She is well connected in India and Switzerland. Her commitment to Abhati is a matter of heart and soul.

Belinda Fleischmann, Focuses on building strategic alliances between commercial, philanthropic and NGO communities. She specializes in the fields of water, health, education and clean energy. Belinda serves as an Advisor for the World Toilet Organization, which focuses on health, dignity and well-being for all through sustainable sanitation. She holds an MSc in Urbanization & Development from the London School of Economics & Political Science.

What is the meaning of Abhati?

Abhati is an old Sanskrit (Ancient Indian language) word, which means "shine" or "illuminate your soul". 

Our Supporters 

Abhati Suisse has succeeded in attracting followers with pertinent skills to join the Abhati movement!

From the cosmetic industry, design company, lawyers, entrepreneurs, universities, and thought leaders.

                                     

 

 

                        

   

            

What is unique about Abhati's approach?

To create awareness and break taboos.

Education:

Our “One Hand Washes the Other” school curriculum will outline the way to effective hand washing and its benefits in preventing disease and deaths. The goal here is to inspire a change in behavior towards ending public defecation and creating good hand washing practices.

Installation:

We partner with trusted NGO's like Sulabh International to install the toilets needed in schools. Our strategy is to create local partnerships, community ownership, and long-term infrastructure maintenance.

Which schools is Abhati targeting for Sanitation?

We have targeted schools in India for phase one.

Unnati Vidyalaya School caters to children from families considered as lower caste.

Nootan Gujarati Mishra School has a high drop out rate of girls leaving school.

SANITATION + GIRLS = EDUCATION + EMPOWERMENT
