story:
"When women thrive, all of society benefits, and succeeding generations are given a better start in life." - Kofi Annan


We Are Salila Rising

Namaste and welcome! Here is your opportunity to make the world a better place for vulnerable women and children in India! We are Salila Rising: Threads for Freedom, a new trade-fair fashion line blossoming through a collaboration of 7 young women from non-profit STOP India and US based Ethical Business Jewel and Lotus started by Ashira and Andy! We are providing safe, dignified, meaningful and fun work for young women who are survivors of human trafficking and other women who are struggling in India.

India is considered one of the most dangerous countries to be born female. Girls are discriminated against before birth. They often suffer their whole lives through injustices such as: gendercide (killing babies before birth due to their sex), poverty, neglect, domestic abuse, rape, child marriages, dowry demands, human trafficking and more. 

Salila Rising was created as a means to support women and stop the cycle of trafficking, poverty and violence through economic empowerment. The more women are given equal opportunity and feel empowered, the more society stands to benefit! With financial support and independence, women can make decisions for themselves, which almost always leads to investing in the safety and welfare of their children and families. When a woman rises she lifts others with her! The benefits then expand from family, to community, to society. Through supporting women and creating economic opportunities, Salila Rising is effectively engaging in the eradication of human trafficking in India and the freedom and empowerment of women... one thread at a time.  


'Salila' is the feminine Sanskrit word for 'flowing water' and all over the world we can see that women and the feminine are RISING! Salila Rising is a  movement of empowerment! Our mission is to support WOMEN in RISING above oppression, violence and slavery to find healing, forgiveness, strength and freedom. We are a business, but also an expression of the power within every woman and a voice for the betterment of women's rights in India and around the world. 

With your support, we can provide Salila Rising with the necessary means to reach its fullest potential! 


What We Need

We need your support to help us solidify the foundation of Salila Rising and then grow to our next level of potential. Your support will allow us to:

  • Hire a full-time fashion design teacher for one year (after one year the position will become self-sustaining). $5,000
  • Provide fashion design and skill trainings in two slum communities that STOP currently works with (Bawana and Tughlakabad). This also includes maintenance of sewing machines and sewing materials. $1,000
  • Purchase & production expenses. This includes the purchase and shipment of raw materials, the cost of labor to pay the girls, and the cost of shipping from India to US. $7,000
  • Create an updated branding & marketing campaign. This includes product tags, web development, and various forms of media marketing campaigns. This also include outreach expenses to acquire new business opportunities. $2,500
  • Travel expenses to oversee the project. This includes travel to India and travel within India to purchase fabric. $2,500

7 Girls from STOP India who are the co-creators of Salila Rising: Threads for   Freedom 

Gifts for Giving

Support Salila Rising at different donation levels and enjoy one of the many perks we have to offer for your valuable donation. Some of the many things you may enjoy include:

  • Social Media Shout Outs
  • Handkerchiefs
  • 'Rasa' Napkin Sets
  • 'Bold Living' Aprons
  • 'Be Free' Skirts
  • Hand Beaded Clutch
  • Rebel Divine Batik T-Shirt
  • Hemp and Nettle Computer Bag
  • Custom Made Salwar Kurta 
Salila Rising 'Be Free' Wrap Around Skirt being modeled by Antonia Alvarez (left) and Aurora Leonard (right) in Central Park, NY. Photo by Xiao Li Tan  

    The Impact

    We are offering opportunities for women to empower themselves with dignified and creative work with fair wages, flexible hours and lots of benefits! We are supporting female survivors of human trafficking in becoming confident women who speak their truths, know their worth and know that they can do great things with their lives. With the support of this campaign, we will expand Salila Rising into two slum communities where STOP India currently works. Our Fashion Design Teacher will offer training and support to women who are looking to earn an income. This will give the women more power and respect in their families. They will have the freedom to leave unsafe or abusive situations because they will have the economic means to do so. They will also be less likely to sell their children and exploit them out of desperation.


    Why We Will Succeed

    • We have women that are excited about the work, we have good sewing machines, we have proven interest and success in our products and we have the desire, power and potential to create something sustainable, transformative and beautiful together! 
    • Ashira has been working with STOP India for 8 years and is an integral member of the STOP Family and Organization. She has developed a deep trust with the STOP girls and the founder Roma Debabrata. 
    • Andy has a business background and the tools required to help us prosper.
    • Roma Debabrata wants Salila Rising to succeed!
    • STOP India already works in Bawana and Tughlakabad and they have 300+ sewing machines (donated) that are waiting to be put to use!
    • We have successfully produced and sold over 500 Salila Rising Napkin Sets, Aprons and Skirts! 

    Risks & Challenges

    Working in India is Challenging! 

    Some of the challenges include:

    • Quality Control - making sure the products are well made, which means teaching the girls how to identify mistakes, how to fix them and why it's important. This is why it is so important to have a full-time fashion design teacher employed by Salila Rising. 
    • Good Fabric - We have found it suprisingly difficult to find good fabric in India - meaning from a good source, that's organic and with a variety of styles. So far we have found a good source for Organic Cotton in Gujarat, but we would like to find a business that believes in Salila Rising and wants to have a long term relationship. We will continue to build relationships with vendors and this will be a primary focus of our time in India this winter. We also have several leads that we will follow-up with once we arrive back in India.
    • Fashion Design Teacher/ Director- Finding a kind, well trained Fashion Design Teacher that has sensitivity to work with the girls and women, who is motivated, a good communicator and wants to have a long term relationship and employment with Salila Rising. We have a specific criteria and will continue to use our resources at STOP to help us find the right individual(s). This process has already begun and candidates are already being reviewed.
    • Staying Healthy while in India! India is a difficult place to stay healthy, especially for westerners who aren't accustomed to the bacteria and pollution. We will continue to do our best to stay healthy so we can do the best work possible! 
    • The continued support of consumers is paramount to our success. We have made some great connections and Salila Rising products are now in a few retail stores. We are hoping to get Salila Rising products involved in a large retail outlet, such as Whole Foods Market. This will help ensure the sustainability of our project. We are working to offer retail and wholesale options online as well. More specific information is available at www.SalilaRising.com.
    • India is a difficult place to work and there will be challenges, but we have 100% confidence that we will be successful by having patience, diligence and perseverance. Our primary intention and motivation is to better the lives of the girls as well as women and children in India! We have the full support of STOP India and they are helping us in all aspects i.e. finding the right Fashion Design Teacher, investing in sewing machines, finding a good fabric source and taking the best possible care of us when we are in India. Salila Rising is our collective dream and now it's becoming a reality. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • Spread the word! Share our campaign! Tell our Story! #ThreadsForFreedom
      • Host a Salila Rising Fundraiser!
      • Connect us with businesses that might be interested in carrying Salila Rising Products!

      Gifts for Giving Reference:

      *We will email you at the end of the campaign to find out the colors you would like for your napkins, aprons, clutches, and or skirts. The pictures below are just used for reference*

      Rebel Divine Batik T-shirt being worn by original artist Alpha Bah (Rebel Divine) and then made into a Batik T-shirt by Suman Pariyar in Pokhara, Nepal. 

      Salila Rising 'Rasa' Napkin Designs

      Hemp and Nettle Computer Bag made by Sunti Purja and her Social Business, Rhitu Saugat in Pokhara, Nepal.  

      Salila Rising 'Rasa' Napkin Designs

      Salila Rising Hand-Beaded Clutch 

      Salila Rising 'Be Free' Wrap-Around Skirt, modeled by Krista Donargo

      Domestic Shipping and International Shipping:

      Do I have to pay for Domestic Shipping? Domestic shipping costs are already included in your campaign contribution perks.

      Where do I add money for international shipping? When you select a contribution level, you're prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people that want international shipping.

      What if I forgot to add international shipping? After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor with an international address.  If you didn't add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.

      Special Thank You:

      A special thanks to our dear friends and extended families whose support makes this all possible.
      • STOP India
      • Roma & Deb Debabrata
      • Shankhamala Sen
      • Conor Provenzano
      • John Harris
      • Xiao Li Tan
      • Kristen Leonard
      • Mark Miller
      • Linda Katz
      • Alpha Bah
      • Indiegogo
      • Thunderclap
      • Salila Rising Girls
      • Andy & Ashira
      • And all of you for your incredible support of Salila Rising

Domestic shipping costs are already included in your campaign contribution perks.Where do I add money for international shipping? When you select a contribution level, you're prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people that want international shipping.What if I forgot to add international shipping? After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor with an international address.  If you didn't add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.Special Thank You:A special thanks to our dear friends and extended families whose support makes this all possible.

story:
Leo's Wisdom. Profound, designer jewelry …for him.

As a man, it's been difficult finding the type of jewelry truly reflective of the style and character I feel accurately portrays the innermost me. I was constantly searching for more aggressive, more attractive, more meaningful representations of who I am and want to be, to no avail. Frustration led me to start sketching and designing in pursuit of my perfect piece.

I wanted a piece that screamed, "I am Strong! I am Wise! I am Powerful!" Being a Leo, a Lion served as the perfect symbol of strength and power. My wife, strangely being named, Wisdom, served as my inspiration to sculpt a strong, seductive female guardian. Together, they embodied the idea, Leo's Wisdom, which stands for Kingship, Power, and Wisdom.

I hand-built my prototypes, carved my samples, and combined the perfect balance of precious stone, precious metals, and Earth to create the first Leo's Wisdom necklace, The Guarded Sovereign.

Surprisingly, my ideas and unique style garnered overwhelming responses. Whether I went to the gym, for a jog, or even to the supermarket, I was constantly flagged down by men and women alike asking me the same questions:

  • Where on Earth did you find such a piece?
  • How can I get one myself?

I designed a few more pieces for myself and, though they were never intended for sale, ended up selling them right off my neck. We realized there was a strong desire for such powerful and reflective jewelry. Each creation had strong meaning and significance in relation to music, truth, spirituality, and expression. Every Leo's Wisdom piece exudes its own personality while embodying yours. Leo's Wisdom is a King in its own domain.

The Issue

Leo's Wisdom is comprised of fine gems, Sterling Silver, and stones straight from the Earth. Owning a Leo's Wisdom piece is an instantly gratifying source of pride. It's like wearing a crown around your neck. Realizing this, I decided to offer my pieces to the world. But there was a big problem. I only had one of each design because I was making them by hand in my tiny shop in the attic of my home. I had no way to replicate my one-of-a-kind prototypes, and it takes an incredible amount of time, resources, and money to generate just one piece. This not only drives up cost, it also drives down the ability to offer my designs on more than a first-come, first-served basis.

The Goal

We started this campaign to help complete our first Leo's Wisdom Signature line. We offer Men's jewelry and now also offer Unisex versions, upon request. Your contribution will help us create molds from our hand-made prototypes for our signature Leo's Wisdom piece to cast them in Sterling Silver and other precious metals. By helping to produce these designs, we can offer more designs and keep costs of these expensive pieces of art as low as possible. And this just in! We've just been invited to participate in our first trade show -- an immense honor, indeed -- and as good as they may look, we can't go in there with sketches.
 

The Rewards - Leo's Wisdom Stimulus Packages

We're offering some incredible, Limited Edition rewards lovingly referred to as the Stimulus Packs. These packages were created exclusively for Indiegogo Supporters! Some of them are displayed; others will be a surprise. If you can contribute to the cause, there won't be enough words for the sincere gratitude we will have for you, so we'll do our best to say it with rewards!

Stickers & Stuff

Leo's Wisdom was built by humble hands, and we need your help to bring it to life. It is important to us that we keep as much business in the States as we can in order to do our part in rebuilding our economy, and we take pride in leaving the smallest footprint on the environment as possible by maintaining Green, eco-conscious standards and practices. You should be proud that you've supported such endeavors. Flaunt it! We've created Indiegogo edition stickers, like the ones to the left, to help illustrate your pride.
 

Ltd. Ed. Leo's Wisdom Rebel Yell T-Shirt

We've also designed a ferocious, Limited Edition Leo's Wisdom Rebel Yell Graphic T-shirt, an incredible value, available only to those of you who contribute through Indiegogo! You will command attention as soon as you walk into (and out of) any room, guaranteed! Pronounced, strong badging appears on the back as well, so walk tall and know you have a one-of-a-kind design hand-illustrated by Leo & Wisdom.
 
But let's keep it real. Leo's Wisdom is about the jewelry, and we want nothing more than to adorn you with it. So to top it all off, we've included three of our Signature Leo's Wisdom sets as rewards for your incredible contributions.

The Signature Leo's Wisdom® Guarded Sovereign I™

rosary-styled necklace with bracelet, comprised entirely of Sterling Silver and Onyx. Guarded Sovereign I features our Signature winged lady, double guardian lions with solid ring, metal accent roses, and screaming skull toggle clasp with onyx beads.

 

Leo's Wisdom® Guarded Sovereign II™

special rosary-styled necklace with bracelet, comprised of the finest Grade AA Lapis Lazuli and Sterling Silver. Guarded Sovereign II features our Signature winged lady, double leopard/cheetahs with solid ring encrested with gemstones, metal accent roses, Sterling rings, and regal toggle clasp. This striking combination of blues and strong silvers will compliment anything or stand alone.
 

Leo's Wisdom® Lion's Den™

round necklace with bracelet, comprised also of Sterling Silver and Onyx. Lion's Den features a continuous design with single lion's head, screaming skull toggle clasp, metal accent roses, and a strong hand-carved wave slider bead. Perfect for everyday wear.
 
Matching bracelets not shown.
 
We've also created a GoGo Edition of our Unisex Leo's Wisdom Foundation bracelet, and we would love nothing more than to send out as many as possible to show our love for Indiegogo.

Finally, as we grow, we would like to be the first jewelry company to offer an affordable, attractive option to turn YOUR ideas into designer, wearable art. Leo's Wisdom is empowering. It is authentic. It is for you. Therefore, the final reward we are offering includes a completely custom piece which we will make and name just for you, an epic monument to your incredible support of Leo's Wisdom.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you see the value in what we've created, please help us reach our goal to help build this business and complete our molds for our signature designs.

If you can't contribute monetarily, give us a shout-out on our Facebook pages! LIKE US! Share our campaign and our page with your friends! Word-of-mouth is the highest compliment we can receive so if you appreciate what we've made, tell a friend to tell a friend. We appreciate you even taking the time to look at what we've created, and we will always speak back, personally.

story:
Keep The Swan Swimming II

The original Indiegogo campaign did an amazing job of raising the needed funds for Lawyers, The ID scanner, and fines. We even had enough to pay a few bills, but we have a few more. Rent still needs to be payed, we still need to keep the heat on so the pipes don't freeze, and we need to keep the lights on. Plus alot of you didn't find out about our efforts until the campaign had ended, so here's your chance to help too.
 

PERKS we have a few things left over from the Original Campaign

We aren't asking for something for nothing, we want you to be proud of our local pub, fly the Swan colors, put your name on the bar, curate the jukebox, throw a party, or just have that warm fuzzy feeling of helping out.

  • For a donation of $20, you're invited to a series of Donor Only parties, with some of the best musicians the Hudson Valley has to offer - reggae, blues, jazz, acoustic rock, and more.
  • The Package, You get a limited edition T-shirt, an Invite to the Parties, and your first draft beer, plus the great feeling of keeping a Tivoli Landmark open. All for $50
  • Ever wish your favorite albums were on the Swan's Jukebox? Well here is your chance. Pick your top 20, we'll add them to the Juke for a Month, your top 5 will stay on for a year, maybe longer, or It's cold up here in New York. With that in Mind we are adding a Bat Swan Hoodie, along with an Invite to the Donor only shows, and your first draft beer, once we reopen, as always. $75
  • Dinner for 2, including your first drink, and any one of the great shows the Swan presents throughout the year. The perfect date night. All for $100
  • Are you a REAL music fan? For a minimum donation of $150 you get a pass to see every show, for a year, just flash your pass (and your 21 over ID, we don’t want to go through this again) and you’re in.
  • Want to own a piece of the Swan? For a donation of $250 we’ll put your name or the name of someone you’d like to honor, on a Brass Plaque and mount it on the edge of the bar.
  • Not enough to be a face in the crowd? Do you want to be THE HOST of the party? For $500 you can be the presenter of the night, your choice of a Band or DJ, you introduce them, you get some drink tickets, after expenses, you might even make some money.
  • That sounds good, but you’d rather have a private party for 50 friends, no door charge, a great band or DJ, and a keg of your choice? Donate $1000 and that dream can come true.
  • Trying to plan a wedding, fundraiser, or big birthday or anniversary bash? How about the food, beer and wine, venue, MC/officiator, and lots of other details and expenses? For $5000 we will provide those things for 50 people.

We know a lot of you’ want to just give something back to the place that has given you so much, theses perks are just our way of thanking you for loving us. Unlike many crowd source fund raising, even if we don’t reach our full goal your donations will still help us. We have a few other things we can try to again serve you, but they are last resorts.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I have had the Swan for 8 years now, most businesses of this type fail within the first year or two. We have a huge overhead, many bills, but we are in it because we love our community of friends and think we offer a place that is unique and a place that brings people together. We have faced rough patches before, and we’ve weathered them. Please help us keep swimming, and enjoy the clear skies on the Swan’s patio again this spring and summer. If you can’t help us monetarily, please help by spreading the word of this campaign. Tell your friends that you’ve met at the Swan, or partied with at the Swan. I try to stay in contact with as many of the past and present customers as I am able. If I see a name or face I recognize on Face Book, I send a Friend request, because I believe the people I’ve met through the Swan, and through all of my endeavors are more than just customers, We ARE friends and in many ways, an extended family. Indiegogo has numerous share tools, please take advantage of them and let everyone who might make a difference, no matter how small, know about our campaign. I’d love to thank each of you face to face, until then please accept my heartfelt thanks.

 

Sincerely,

 

Michael

Sincerely,

story:
Help us launch our steampunk style Serpentine & Rebel Jackets.

Our goal is to raise at least $3000 to produce the two jackets of our new collection featured in this campaign. We can not do this with out you!

What is Verillas?

At Verillas, we strive to bring you artisan quality, hand made clothing and boots. We travel the world looking for the best materials, the best craftsmen, and the best quality. We strive to give you clothing and boots that you can proudly wear 10, 20, even 30 years from now. We care about what you wear and we want you to look great and to confidently know that the pair of boots you have on can and will last you for your epic travels and grand adventures.

We at Verillas want to invite you to take part in our creative process by helping to fund the new collection of jackets, the Serpentine jacket for women and the Rebel Jacket for men. Our new collection of Jackets are stylish, comfortable, and flattering, designed to help you look and feel great while displaying your own unique style. By taking part in this campaign, you get special rewards and discounts on our products while at the same time helping us order a new line of Jackets. Without your support, we won't be able to order any more of the garment and you won't be able to enjoy it.

This is the new collection of Jacket in all its glory, which you can own with a pledge of $129 for our Rebels Jacket and $149 for our Serpentine Jacket .


Pledge of $149 gets you our Women's Serpentine Jacket

Our New Ladies Serpentine tail coat Jacket in velvet  classic vintage military cut with faux fur collar and cuffs with classic vintage buttons.

Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL


Pledge of $129 gets you our Mens Rebels Jacket

Our new men's Rebel Jacket is made from a strong heavy canvas in a flattering military cut, loaded with pockets, accent zippers and straps.


Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL Standard US Men's sizing

What do you get? Your perks for helping us are...

$32 Pledge gets you the Steamvial Holster

$50 Pledge gets you the Lock & Key Corset in Cream or Coffee

Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL

$90 Pledge gets you the Imperial Edition Tea Room Jacket

Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL

$149 pledge gets you the Imperial Lady Dining Set. One Imperial Edition Tea Room Jacket + Ruffle Steam Skirt in black or white. Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL .

The Rufflesteam Skirt with a elastic waist and layers of flowing black lace.

$149 pledge gets you the Imperial Lady Adventure Set. One Imperial Edition Tea Room Jacket + Tea Room 3/4 Shorts . Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL .



Help us bring you the Steampunk Fashion you want You help us make our goal, we help you look great in the best clothing out there. Take advantage of the fantastic deals we are offering you here in this campaign to save money and look great. You help us fit the bill so we can order more of the products you love. We help you by saving you money and making you the style icon and envy of wherever you go. Sound good? Will you help us? Will you take advantage of this deal and make yourself look the best you can?
We have stretch goals as well, so if we make more than what we need, those of you who have pledged will end up with even more goodies.

We have stretch goals as well, so if we make more than what we need, those of you who have pledged will end up with even more goodies.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help but don't feel like ordering anything, please share this campaign with as many people you can. Not only will your support and encouragement help make the Jacket Collection possible, but you might help someone else find that garment they've been looking for.



DETAILS:  

What size will I get?  At the end of the campaign, we will email whatever address each customer puts in for their donation requesting your choice of size.  You must reply to this email or we will ship medium by default.  Please do not send us messages in advance, as we must have replies to these emails to keep organized.

US Shipping is FREE.   Shipping outside the US must be purchased as a separate reward in this campaign (It is $43 USD flat rate).  We do not cover any import taxes or fees that might be different country to country.  We declare export values at a low replacement cost of the garment.

US Shipping is FREE.   Shipping outside the US must be purchased as a separate reward in this campaign (It is $43 USD flat rate).  We do not cover any import taxes or fees that might be different country to country.  We declare export values at a low replacement cost of the garment.

story:
Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Why is there an uneven number of socks in a pack?

A: SOLOSOCKS™ come in packs of 5 or 7 single socks that are designed to match. The socks come in an uneven number to underline the fact that there are NO PAIRS. But don’t worry. You will loose a sock eventually, and when you do you will be left with an even number!

Q: I live in Copenhagen. Can I pick up my socks myself?

A: No. However, we will personally deliver them to you and thank you for backing us.

Q: What cotton is used for SOLOSOCKS™?

A: We only use the finest GOTS-certified organic combed cotton. Combed cotton is a specially processed cotton where the short fibers of cotton are eliminated to increase the quality, softness and durability of the cotton. 

Q: What is a hand linked toe seam?

A: The toe part of an ordinary sock is usually sewn by a sewing machine, which normally makes the toe seam thicker and inconvenient. Hand-linking is a demanding technique where each single thread on the toe and the sock foot are linked manually. It makes toe seam totally flat and comfortable. Usually, this work is done by professional workers. The paradox about the manual hand-linking technique is that it can be harmful for the professional worker’s eyes. For SOLOSOCKS™ we have chosen ultra modern Italian machines that provide machinery hand-linking. As such we managed to avoid the harm but kept the hand-linking quality.

Q: Are SOLOSOCKS™ quality controlled? 

A: SOLOSOCKS™ undergo various quality control processes of our own and some external vendors and institutions. We choose only European certified suppliers, which means all production steps from cotton production to yarn and dying processes are periodically controlled by the relevant institutions and authorities.

Q: How should I wash my SOLOSOCKS™?

A: SOLOSOCKS™ are made of finest organic combed cotton. Natural cotton feels more convenient, however, demands careful treatment. Your SOLOSOCKS™ should not be washed with temperature over 40C. 

Q: How and where are SOLOSOCKS™ manufactured? 

A: SOLOSOCKS™ are produced with the state of the art Italian Lonati machines in Istanbul, the sock capital of Europe! Turkey has some of the finest combed cotton, good reliable factories, and is located in Europe. Most of the socks headed for Europe are produced there. 

Q: Who designed SOLOSOCKS™? 

A: The SOLOSOCKS™ have been designed by various talented Danish designers under Anna Sofie Weinell’s leadership. Anna Sofie is an experienced Fashion Designer with a degree from Copenhagen School of Design and Technology. 

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?   

A: No matter how good the quality is, socks will always be socks and eventually they will be worn out. This means that we can’t offer a warranty. We do however have a return policy. 

Q: What is your returns policy?

A: This is the "SOLOSOCKS-promise": We are so confident that you will love your new SOLOSOCKS™ so much, that we offer you a 14 days’ money back guarantee after you have received them (if you are not satisfied).

 

Risks and challenges

Getting a product like this from the mind of the designer into the hands of backers involves a great deal of hard work, planning and coordination between designer, manufacturer, and logistics in order to deliver on schedule.

In recognition of this, we have been working closely with the production personnel for more than three years, refining the specifications and ironing out the technical challenges and complexities involved in transitioning from drawing board ideas to full-scale manufacturing.

We already have two collections out on the market as of now. This means that we have undergone the entire process twice, and so we are well prepared to deal with the complications that can arise in moving products between the factory, warehouse, and the end user.

As a result of this we are confident that once our goal is met, we will be able to deliver on schedule to all our backers.

What Wasted Cru is:

WASTED CRU is an Art and Clothing brand Based in BEACON NY. The main goal is to make wearable clothes that stand out in the trends of today. 

What I Need & What You Get:

What I need is for YOU to help by funding my brand, and by doing so you get stickers and shirts and possibly more. If I make it past my goal I will be getting 5 panels and beanies made! but as of right now this is what I have that you can get!

*You will be emailed about sizing when campaign is over.

WASTED CRU "CRU" TEE

 

STAY RAD TEE

story:
note: Be sure to check our updates frequently!

A Short Introduction

It’s a simple solution to a frustrating problem for parents and caretakers of young children.  It allows you to gain their attention without line of sight, or without shouting out their name; especially in noisy environments where your voice can be quickly drowned out.


What Is It?

The Tapping Bracelet is a small silicone bracelet (in all sorts of fun colors) that can be worn by a child. The bracelet contains a tiny vibrating motor, similar to the one in your cell phone.  The bracelet is paired with a small keychain sized remote control.  When the button on the remote is pressed, it sends a silent vibration to the bracelet, ‘tapping’ them on the wrist from a distance


The Girl Who Inspired The Tapping Bracelet

In the video, I talk about a friend who’s daughter is completely hearing impaired. Her name is Alexah. This is her ;)

She’s a rambunctious young girl who doesn’t let her exceptions keep her from enjoying her childhood to the fullest.


Endlessly Useful

The Tapping Bracelet can be used in lots of ways.  You’re bounded only by your imagination.  Here are just a few ways the Tapping Bracelet can help improve your life:

 

At The Playground

Let your kids play their hearts out on the monkey bars.  When it’s time to go; instead of yelling over the laughter, clanging of the big toy and shouts from other parents, press the button on your remote and silently let your children know to come back.  The other parent’s will think you’re psychic!

 

At The Park

Your kids start to get a little too far away for their own good.  When you realize they’re out of ear shot, you send a vibration to their wrist and let them know to come back a bit.  No more chasing them down!

 

At The Game

It gets noisy at the stadium.  Trying to call out to someone just a few rows away becomes nearly impossible.  A simple way to get someone’s attention is to tap them on the wrist, with the push of a button.  No more stepping on toes to exit your rows!

 

At The Store

You do your own thing while your (older) children do their own thing.  When it's time to go you push the button and they know it's time to meet up at a designated location.    Say goodbye to the cell phone juggling, or text message flurries!


At Home

The kids are outside playing and you want them to come inside, all you have to do is push the button on the remote and it will send a vibration to the bracelet that your child is wearing and they will know that you need them to come inside.   No more yelling out the kitchen window.  Save your breath for the food fights!


How Long Will It Take?

Because we've put in so much of the leg work already for large scale manufacturing, we can start producing bracelets as soon as funding is complete!  We can't wait to put Tapping Bracelets into the hands of those who will benefit from our technology.  


The First Prototype of the Tapping Bracelet

http://www.indiegogo.com/tappingbracelet?c=activity&a=762690

story:
MEET THE LATEST MEMBER OF THE XPAND FAMILY

The creators of the $1.2 million crowdfunding campaign for no-tie shoelaces are back with their latest innovation.

Meet the Urban Belt.

The Urban Belt Helps You Move Smarter!

An interchangeable elastic belt with a fast-adjusting magnetic buckle!

The Problem 

The traditional leather belt is an age-old wardrobe staple. But, anyone who has ever worn one knows it is not without its flaws. The stiff and unforgiving material can dig into and pinch the skin. Plus, you’ll see cracks, ridges, wear and tear within days of use.

At Xpand, we’re all about moving smarter. We believe everyday items should work with you, not against you. That’s why we designed the Urban Belt.

The secret is in the materials. After years of testing elastic fabrics, we’ve found the perfect fit. The belt strap is made from a zero-memory elastic, meaning it won’t sag or lose its tension with wear. The tension and fit will last no matter what the day brings. Plus, you’ll hardly notice the lightweight fabric, so you can focus on what matters most.

 

Materials

Belt Buckle

  • Durable
  •  UV Protection 
  •  Weather Resistant 

Our buckle is made from a premium plastic called, PA66 GF30. To put it simply, it is an amazing material with some awesome abilities. It is a highly durable plastic which we have put to the test to ensure we are providing our backers with nothing but the very best. Our buckle also has UV protection and weather resistant properties. We do understand that plastic is a very valuable source and should not be abused but, we have chosen this material so that your buckle is built to last! Inside the buckle are 2 N64 grade magnets. To simplify, these magnets are highly durable and provide the perfect amount of pressure to secure the buckle and be released at the users choice.

Elastic Belt Straps

  •  Zero-memory elastic 
  •  Machine-washable 
  •  Comfort & Security 

Here at Xpand we have been in the elastics game for a while now so we can tell a good elastic when we see one. The manufacturer and process we are working with are amongst the best we have ever seen and know that the product will not leave any backer feeling disappointed. Our elastic is zero-memory, meaning it will not lose its tension or start to sag after continued and constant usage. The material's stretch provides the perfect combination of security and comfort. This belt strap will blow your mind and leave you feeling like you're wearing your comfiest sweatpants.

Sizing Chart

In Inches

  • Small: 25" - 30"
  • Medium: 30" - 35"
  • Large: 35" - 40"
  • Extra Large: 40" - 45"
  •  2XL: 45" - 55" 

In cm

  • Small: 63 cm - 76 cm
  • Medium: 76 cm - 88 cm
  • Large: 88 cm - 101 cm
  • XL: 101 cm - 114 cm
  • 2XL: 114 cm - 139 cm
 

How it works

The standout feature of the Urban belt is its adjustment system. Using the buckle wings, the elastic belt can be held securely underneath and pulled outwardly to release and adjust in a snap.

To re-secure, simply pinch the strap and pull underneath the wings or wiggle the strap underneath one wing at a time.

The two part magnetic buckle can be separated by sliding the front in an upwards direction or pulling the two parts away from each other.

 

Hidden Mode

Oh and did we mention that there is also a hidden way to wear the belt to avoid seeing the tail of the belt? Threading the belt from the front to the back allows you to hide the excess on the inside offering a super clean look. Also included with the belt is our excess ring which is an optional piece for you to wear to secure the excess even tighter.

Colours

We designed the Urban belt to provide our customer with the ability to separate the buckle from the strap. With five available strap colours to choose from, you’ll find something to suit any outfit or style.

 

The belt straps are available in five colours:

  • Black
  • Cool Gray
  • Brown Stone
  • Navy Blazer
  • Ivy Green

At Xpand we believe that everyone should have the option of creating their own style, so making a belt that the customer can customize was of the utmost importance. This is unlike existing elastic belt companies that force you to buy a whole new belt and buckle if you want a different colour.

Versatility

At Xpand, we believe your everyday products should work harder for you. That’s why we built versatility into the Urban design. Whether you’re headed to a business meeting downtown, working from home, or a hike outside of the city, the Urban is down for the ride.

 Compact Design

Our elastic fabric isn’t just highly wearable, it’s also extremely compact. The Urban folds down 3x smaller than a traditional belt, making it perfect for storage and urban explorers.

How we did it

We started by researching and gathering all the information we could on existing products. We thought about all the ways these products fell short. Then we got to work on making them better. Our mission was simple. Create a quality elastic belt that is designed for everyone to use everyday.

We began exploring standard methods of attachment like male and female clips, or loop and hole style systems but kept running into the same problem. The belt would be difficult to adjust. The project seemed to be nearing an end when our designer made a break through. 

He put two Xpand Original No-Tie Lace Anchors back-to-back to make a double-sided version. He wrapped it around his waist and it worked as a belt. We made an upscaled 3D model and, just like that, we had a proof-of-concept. From there, Xpand’s Urban belt was born.

Pledges

There is truly no time like the present and as a backer of this project you will be getting the best deal around with big savings on bundle deals. Below are all the options you have as a backer. 

At the end of the campaign, you will have the opportunity to select the colours and sizes that you would like.  

FREE worldwide shipping is included with each order.

 At Xpand, we are constantly thinking about the impact our products have on the environment. We are very happy to say that the Urban belt will arrive with a recyclable eco-friendly packaging.

Who are we?

Xpand started when our founder redesigned the shoelace. His out-of-the-box thinking helped raise $1.2 million on Kickstarter and Indiegogo and Xpand was officially born.

Since then, Xpand has grown into a full team dedicated to continuing to execute our founder's vision.

“At Xpand, we look to re-design everyday items to help you move smarter and take back the extra minutes in your life.”

 

Meet the Team

Sizing chart 

FAQ

  • How much is shipping? Do you ship worldwide?

The Urban will be available for Worldwide shipping. Each order comes with FREE worldwide shipping!

  •  What do I do with the excess? 

There is a sliding material ring loop that can be used to help secure the excess. Your pant belt loops are also helpful for this!

  •  What if I'm exactly a size 30, 35 or 40? 

We recommend going for the smaller size as the elastic will stretch. Going for the bigger size will leave you with more excess. For example if you are a 35, go for the medium 30-35 for a perfect fit.

  •  Can I put the belt in the washing machine and dryer? 

We suggest machine washing on a low temperature and leaving out to air dry to avoid shrinking the fabric.

  •  What is the material of the belt buckle? 

The buckle is made from a premium durable plastic called PA66 GF30,  which is extremely durable, water-resistant and includes UV protection.

  •  What is the material of the belt strap? 

The belt strap is made from premium zero-memory elastic, meaning the fabric won’t sag or lose its tension with wear.

  •  How big is the buckle? 

The buckle measures 40mm (1 1/2 inches) in height and 70mm (2 3/4 inches) in length.

  •  How wide is the strap? 

The width of the belt strap is 30 mm (1.2 inches). The length of the strap varies  depending on the size selected. See our sizing chart for more  information on the length.

  • How do I select the color or the size of the belt straps?

At the end of the campaign, we will be sending out BackerKit surveys to your e-mail where you can choose your belt size, belt strap colors, and any additional accessories (buckles, belts, Xpand Laces) you want to add to your order.

 

What's next?

At the end of the campaign, every backer will be sent out a survey to collect information on their backing choice. This will include information about your address and shipping options as well as the size and colour of the belt(s). Additional add-on sales will also be available if you would like to add to your order.

As for us here at Xpand, we will immediately get on with the finalization of quantities and start the manufacturing process. Through the email sign-up and Indiegogo campaign, we will be updating you on our progress and if there are any updates to the project you can find them there.

Since then, Xpand has grown into a full team dedicated to continuing to execute our founder's vision.
“At Xpand, we look to re-design everyday items to help you move smarter and take back the extra minutes in your life.”
Your next essential Meet the Team

Sizing chart 

 

 

They love it!
You will love it too!

FAQ
How much is shipping? Do you ship worldwide?
The Urban will be available for Worldwide shipping. Each order comes with FREE worldwide shipping!
 What do I do with the excess? 
There is a sliding material ring loop that can be used to help secure the excess. Your pant belt loops are also helpful for this!
 What if I'm exactly a size 30, 35 or 40? 
We recommend going for the smaller size as the elastic will stretch. Going for the bigger size will leave you with more excess. For example if you are a 35, go for the medium 30-35 for a perfect fit.
 Can I put the belt in the washing machine and dryer? 
We suggest machine washing on a low temperature and leaving out to air dry to avoid shrinking the fabric.
 What is the material of the belt buckle? 
The buckle is made from a premium durable plastic called PA66 GF30,  which is extremely durable, water-resistant and includes UV protection.
 What is the material of the belt strap? 
The belt strap is made from premium zero-memory elastic, meaning the fabric won’t sag or lose its tension with wear.
 How big is the buckle? 
The buckle measures 40mm (1 1/2 inches) in height and 70mm (2 3/4 inches) in length.
 How wide is the strap? 
The width of the belt strap is 30 mm (1.2 inches). The length of the strap varies  depending on the size selected. See our sizing chart for more  information on the length.
How do I select the color or the size of the belt straps?
At the end of the campaign, we will be sending out BackerKit surveys to your e-mail where you can choose your belt size, belt strap colors, and any additional accessories (buckles, belts, Xpand Laces) you want to add to your order. What's next?
At the end of the campaign, every backer will be sent out a survey to collect information on their backing choice. This will include information about your address and shipping options as well as the size and colour of the belt(s). Additional add-on sales will also be available if you would like to add to your order.
As for us here at Xpand, we will immediately get on with the finalization of quantities and start the manufacturing process. Through the email sign-up and Indiegogo campaign, we will be updating you on our progress and if there are any updates to the project you can find them there.

story:
Summary:

The Project we are looking to start is a new product line for Home Combat Magazine. We are looking to "repurpose," if you will, old Military Duffel bags into new, Every Day Carry book bags. These book bags will be fully functional, and will be a huge asset in your Every Day life, whether it is carrying your lap top and files to and from work, or perhaps your lunch and books to and from school this back pack will be there for you. The bags will feature a pocket for a hydration bladder so you will always have water with you wherever you go. There will be a pocket on each one of the shoulder straps as well so that you can carry credentials right where you need them, and your cell phone too!

Each one of these bags will be unique, and will tell their own tale. Be it a duffel bag that has just come back from Iraq or Afghanistan, or perhaps a duffel that sat away in a veterans clsoet for many years, these bags will tell the tale of those Service Members lives. We hope, that in giving these bags new lives and new purpose, that we can share part of their history with you, and help write them a new one.

**UPDATE!**

We have now added three options for the bags, called the Basic, Standard, and Advanced models! The basic model of the bag will have no flap and side pockets, but will be $20 cheaper than the standard model! The standard model comes with the flap and side pockets, and will be estimated at $80 per bag to start, and the advanced model will have The flap, side pockets, and a hidden compartment for a concealed carry pistol, and will be $20 more than the standard bag.

**UPDATE!**

**UPDATE**

Here is a photo of the completed bag, just without zippers or side pockets.

What We Need & What You Get

We need only a small sum- $750 to get started. This will allow us to purchase enough Duffel Bags, Thread, Buckles, Webbing, and Foam Support to be able to fabricate enough prototypes to send to be reviewed, tested, and ultimately judged. We are seeking to fabricate at least four prototypes to sent out to various soldiers and companies around the United States for their judgement. Once the prototypes are deemed worthy, we will be able to start full time production. As we stated in the video, the cost is very low, but we strive to only provide the best to our readers and customers. If each duffel bag costs us $20 to purchase, and the buckles, webbing, and support are another $30, that is $50 per bag to make.The $750 we seek will allow us the four protoypes, and then six production models ready for sale or donation.

**UPDATE!**

Any donation will get you in our contest! One entry per person, be it that you donate $1, or $100, to ensure that everyone gets the same odds of winning. There are currently FIVE prizes, so that means there will be FIVE winners, and more prizes are being added! Currently our prizes are 1 Next Level Training SIRT Performer Student Training Pistol (MSRP $219)- This is a non-firing laser training pistol designed to help you train your weapons manipulation skills and trigger control 1 Blind Horse Knives Frontier Knive (MSRP $60), Blind Horse Knives hand makes all of their knives, and they are of exceptional quality and crafstmanship. This is a knife that you will be wanting to pass down through the generations. 1 Battle Arms Development Three Lever Selector kit (MSRP $60) for your AR 15 with patch and decal, the selector switches are ergonomically designed and a great improvement over the Selector switches that come standard, 1 Leitner-Wise Manufacturing Battle Shot Shot Glass (MSRP $16), these shot glasses are designed after the AR15 compensator/flash hider. They are certainly very cool and will turn heads anytime you go out with your friends. The quality and craftsmanship on these shot glasses is absolutely outstanding. The last prize is 1 Duffel Back Pack. If you donate even just $1, you could still have the chance to win a Duffel Back Pack! Also, please keep in mind that ALL perks are still valid! If you donate $100, AND win the prize drawing, you will get all of the perks listed, plus whatever the prize is!

The Impact

Your donation will help us get a leg-up on this project. These bags are extremely valuable to you, and our veterans. Once we are able to go into full-time production, the fabrication of these bags will be moved to a Homeless Veterans shelter where they will be making these bags with their own hands. Each one of these bags will be made with love, and each one of these bags tells a different, unique story. We need your help, please, so that we can give these bags new lives, and help make a difference in somebody elses.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help us today with a donation, please at least share this campaign with your friends, family, and loved ones. Please help us spread the word about this campaign so that we can make this dream into a reality. We truly believe that these bags will make a difference, and we believe that you can make a difference as well.

Another way that you can really help is, to donate your old and unused duffel bags. Please E-Mail me at Matt@HomeCombatMag.com to find out how to donate your duffel bag. There will be perks for these donations, as well!

story:
The Story

The iPhone is one of the coolest gadgets ever invented. It’s super-portable, intelligent and really puts the ‘smart’ in smart-phone. Most people who own one never go anywhere without it (and we’re talking about anywhere). The problem is that today’s’ consumer also has a ton of other stuff that they take everywhere they go as well. Cash, credit cards, keys, sunglasses and more. Wouldn’t it be convenient if, when you grabbed your iPhone on the way out of the house, everything else was already attached to it or stored with it? That would sure cut down on forgetting your most important things when you go out, wouldn’t it? That’s why we made the Tigdi, an iPhone wallet that protects your iPhone and holds all your other important stuff at the same time.

Why the Tigdi is better:

 We studied tons of other iPhone wallets to see what we liked, what worked and, most importantly, what was missing. We looked for convenience and protection most of all and, after we were done studying the other iPhone wallets on the market, we designed the Tigdi to do everything they could do and much more.

 

Q: What is a TIGDI 1.0 & a TIGDI 2.0

  A:  The Tigdi 1.0 is a classic wallet+case. Compatible with iPhone 4/4s/5 

          The Tigdi 2.0 is a wallet+sleeve version which you can use like a regular wallet, or add another phone in the back. Compatible with iPhone 4/4s/5 Pictured below if the Tigdi 1.0 and 2.0

Find My iPhone = Find My Wallet=Find My things

  It’s a grab-and-go solution for your iPhone that will keep you organized, cut down on lost items and keep everything in one easy to use and ultra-convenient place.

Easy Access:

Opening up the inner wallet is a one-hand job. Answering a phone call is also a breeze. One finger take out card.

Cash and tickets：

   

There is plenty of room for the storage of cash and is suitable for many country currencies and perfect place to store a ticket,

 The Tigdi of style.

It’s a wallet that looks like no other and a case that keeps your iPhone from looking like everyone else’s.

Supper Fit

The Tigdi case is a very thing fit, but never too thin to easily get lost.

Your phone is safe in a tigdi.

Protect your iPhone between two layers of genuine leather covers.It feels great in your hand.Tigdi 2.0


Material and Manufacuring

   The material is a top-grade leather that has been expertly finished for a soft feel and lasting durability. There are reinforced stitches at specific stress points and the edges have been sealed with a finish coating for added wear protection,durability and a seamless visual effect. The leather will be reinforced in strategic areas for additional structural integrity and the pockets will be lined to enable smooth storage of cards. These are typical characteristics of the finest leather goods, and we are excited to be able to offer these features on the Tigdi.

    We reviewed several different manufacturers until we found one that produces at a very high quality and timely fashion. We have the material designed and ready to go,Now, with your help we can get out the first production run of Tigdi! Your pledge will go directly into the production of the wallets.If you have any suggestions on how we can improve the wallet, or would like to give some feedback, we would love to hear it. Your support is greatly appreciated!!

 

Reasons to support:

  • Using a Tigdi makes your pants fit better.
  • A Tigdi is easy to find in your bag or purse.
  • It's small in your pocket,Cards are easy in, easy out.  
  • It's hard to make your case stand out, but a Tigdi stands out.
  • It's so versatile, use your imagination to decide how you'll use it!
  • Tigdi is the perfect size to carry everything you need.
  • Everyone has two favorite card to use; Tiedi will give you instant access to it.
  • Your clothes will fit better.
  • They can fit in any pocket or purse.
  • They can better organize and distribute business cards.
  • Everyday life can be chaotic. Perhaps this could help make it a bit simpler.
  • Help make loved ones' everyday lives simpler by gifting one.

 

When will I get my TIGDI wallet?

Production of the wallets willtake 15-20 days from the day we give the final go ahead

  • That will give us 3-4 weeks to ship product to our backers.

With your support and backing,we expect to have the wallets in your hands just in. Please share this link:(http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/tigdi-the-best-iphone-wallet-ever/x/1807419)

with any of your friends and family that might be frustrated with their current phone wallet situation; or better yet, gift them a Tigdi.

  

Who we are

  We are love design unique product to solve simple problem.and make people happy with our products. That's all. Thank you for your time and consideration!


 

Faq:

Do things fall out of it?

Nope.  TIGDI is tightenough to keep your cards and cash safe. =)
 

 

How many cards do the wallets carry?

They really are flexible to such a large extent that you could carry asfew as 2 or 3 cards, or as many as 20.  You could go further, of course,but that's not tight. ;)

story:
WE'RE EXPANDING!

Be among the first to get your hands on our LATEST products!! Just in time for summer!

And, while you're getting outfitted with these great new looks, you will be helping us invest in some new display equipment for our sales booth. 

Based on the feedback we've gotten, we think these new items are a great addition to our product line. We hope you agree!


new item --- BELTS ---new item --- BELTS ---  new item

OK Gentlemen, see how great this belt looks on his jeans! Ladies, pair them with white shorts and every bright tank top in your closet this summer! Hey Kids, imagine the possibilities!!

These belts will soon become your favorites.


new item --- HEADBANDS --- new item --- HEADBANDS --- new item

The headbands look great on curly hair, straight hair, wavy hair, short hair, long hair, pinned-up hair… styles with loose bangs, and styles pulled back tightly....They look great from the front, the back, the sides….

You’ll want one for every outfit.


WE USE BANDANAS IN A NEW WAY

Everyone who sees our Bandana Blankets loves the way we construct them. It's our way of giving new life to an old favorite. And we've been doing it a long time so we've perfected the process.

We had a very busy 2013 holiday season and we sold many, many Bandana Blankets as Christmas gifts. Thanks to those of you who bought one of these unique gifts.

Now we’ve added the perfect summer accessories to our lineup. And we’re glad to see that our Original Bandana Blankets have become popular as the ideal Graduation gift.


They are 100% cotton, so you can enjoy yours without worry. USE them and then just toss them in the washer and dryer.

WHAT WE'RE RAISING MONEY FOR

We need some new display equipment to show off these wonderful new products and for our increasing inventory. We really love to set up our booth in arts & craft fairs at outdoor festivals. We hope you'll help us raise the funds for the equipment and then you can stop by and see us!!


perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks! perks!


Early Bird perks include items at discounted prices! Don't miss out!


BANDana BOOSTER CLUB All indiegogo contributors will be notified prior to the launch of our new products and will receive discounts on future purchases. [We’re working on the prototypes for our next items already… yea!!]

BANDANA $5

Choose from more than 30 colors and 3 camouflage patterns.

HEADBANDS $10 and WIDE HEADBANDS $15

The headbands are sewn together using 100% cotton bandanas and have a flexible interfacing to add stability and to maintain shape. They are 2 ½” wide at top center, tapering to a covered elasticized band. This structured design is a refined remake of the old classic bandana scarf.

The Wide headbands (shown in upper right corner of the headband montage) are sewn together using 100% cotton bandanas and are 6” at the top center, pleated into a covered elasticized band. They can be worn open to the fullest width, folded to make a narrower band or folded over to expose both colors. Totally unique!!

Sizes: S, M, L

BELTS $20

The fabric belts are sewn together using 100% cotton bandanas and have a flexible interfacing to add stability and to maintain shape.

Belts are available in 1 color or 2 colors. They are 1 ½ " wide and have heavy metal d-rings.

Sizes: Youth S - Adult XXL

BANDANA BLANKETS $40 - $140

These blankets are made with 100% cotton bandanas and cotton batting. Machine wash and dry. 

Use them for camping, at a ballgame, for a sleepover, in a dorm room, in a crib, for a picnic, as a baby's floor mat, as a sofa-throw, on the beach, on a bed, in the car...

5 sizes....

 

5 Sizes – shown clockwise from upper left:

2x3 Bandana Blanket $40

  • approximately 40”x60”
  • perfect for a child or a crib
  • reversible, solid color on each side

3x3 Bandana Blanket $60

  • approximately 60”x60”
  • covers the lap and legs of a seated person
  • reversible, solid color on each side

3x4 Bandana Blanket $80

  • approximately 60"x80"
  • covers one napping adult
  • fits a twin bed
  • reversible, solid color on each side

4x4 Bandana Blanket $110

  • approximately 80"x80"
  • the size preferred by teenagers and snuggling couples
  • fits a full/queen bed
  • reversible, solid color on each side

4x5 Bandana Blanket $140

  • approximately 80”x100”
  • covers a sofa full of folks watching a scary movie
  • fits a king size bed
  • reversible, solid color on each side

30+ colors…and 3 camos....

Bandanas have long symbolized a free-spirited nature, and your handmade Bandana Bazaar items, with the natural variations in bandanas, will reflect this in style and design.

So…now’s the time to get on the BANDana WAGON like these young people and all of our current customers have done. Thanks for helping us expand our products and our display fixtures at the same time~

BANDANA BLANKETS $40 - $140
These blankets are made with 100% cotton bandanas and cotton batting. Machine
wash and dry. 
Use them for camping, at a ballgame, for a sleepover, in a dorm room, in a
crib, for a picnic, as a baby's floor mat, as a sofa-throw, on the beach, on a
bed, in the car...
5 sizes.... 

5 Sizes – shown clockwise from upper left:
2x3 Bandana Blanket
$40


approximately 40”x60” 
perfect for a child or a crib
reversible, solid color on
     each side



3x3 Bandana Blanket $60


approximately 60”x60”
covers the lap and legs of a
     seated person
reversible, solid color on
     each side



3x4 Bandana Blanket $80


approximately
     60"x80"
covers one napping adult
fits a twin bed
reversible, solid color on
     each side 



4x4 Bandana Blanket $110


approximately
     80"x80"
the size preferred by

fits a full/queen bed
reversible, solid color on

4x5 Bandana Blanket $140


approximately 80”x100”
covers a sofa full of folks
     watching a scary movie
fits a king size bed
reversible, solid color on
     each side




30+ colors…and 3 camos....Bandanas have long symbolized a free-spirited nature, and your handmade Bandana
Bazaar items, with the natural variations in bandanas, will reflect this in style and design. 
So…now’s the time to get on the BANDana WAGON like these young people
and all of our current customers have done. Thanks for helping us expand our products and our display fixtures at the same time~

story:
Outrigger Dream

Hello my name is Lucas Valdes.

I have been paddling in Panama for a few years now, competing in the Ocean To Ocean Race againt very good paddlers since the age of 14. Now I want to compete internationally in Hawaii. Therefore I need an outrigger to achieve that goal of being with the champions.

I am only asking for your help, if you have something extra or willing to donate to complete a man's dream I welcome you to do it.

I will train everyday, in the Panama Outrigger Club, to get in the best conditions as possible. I have been working with some sponsors as: NANO, Banco General (Panama's main bank), Tribunal Electoral (goverment institution), and coming soon, Reebok.

The boat I need is the 22'' by Outrigger Connection, due to the low volume compared to others. The total weight of me and my other crew member is 220 pounds. With the proper boat and training we can fly and win.

I repeat, We are just two lovers of the sport looking for help in completing our dreams.

Any donation counts!

Thanks, Lucas

story:
The Rosie G collection pairs style, comfort and ease all into one garment.  Machine washable and totally inter-changeable fabrics and silhouette’s make Rosie G the perfect collection of dresses, tops, skirts, and bottoms for your little girl aged 2-14.  

Be sure to click the video above!

**If you pledge for a dress or T-shirt and our project gets funded, you will receive an email asking which style and size you would like on September 18th.  The dresses are kids sizes and run 2-14; T-shirts run Small, Medium and Large.


Hi!  My name is Grace Rose and aside from all my ten-year-old activities, I also design clothes.  I was born in New Orleans, Louisiana and moved to L.A. after hurricane Katrina.  I like to say that I'm from New Orleans and go to school in Los Angeles.  Since L.A. is where all my doctors are, it's important that I'm out here for clinics and to be sure that I'm staying healthy.  I have Cystic Fibrosis.

Having CF is no fun.  I want to find a cure for me and all those who have to deal with this.  That's what made me think of creating a clothing line that gives back to Cystic Fibrosis research.  This is how I got the idea for Rosie G!

I created this clothing line based on my love of the two cities I call home.  It's "beach meets bayou".  I designed my first dress when I was just two-years-old with the help of my mom who's also a designer.

These two-panel dresses are great for warm weather and comfort.  I also designed them so you can be unique and choose your own style and mix up the panels - you decide which one goes on top!

The name "Rosie G" came from my alter ego.  When I put on my lip gloss and get dressed up, I like to sing and dance in the mirror and I call this person Rosie G!  My doctors say that singing is really good for my lungs...lucky me!

All my clothes are super comfortable and they're all made here in the USA!


Back my new fashion line and help create a more exciting, colorful and confident world for kids. 

Because kids can help change lives too!



I've created some super cool perks and gifts if you back my Rosie G campaign.  Be sure to scroll down and donate!

I'd love to be able to say this together!




(oh...and did I say Thank You?)

Visit The Website Here: www.rosiegstyle.com

Visit Our Facebook Page Here: www.facebook.com/rosiegstyle

Follow Us on Instagram Here: www.instagram.com/rosiegstyle

My Annual Fundraising Facebook Page Here: https://www.facebook.com/Gr4cf

To Learn More About Cystic Fibrosis Visit Here: www.cff.org

story:
Why Do You Need R.G.B.?

Do you have the following issues:
  • Your belt is either too loose or too tight, cannot fit perfectly
  • Your waist hurts because your belt is too stiff for your waist
  • Your waist size changes over time and your belt becomes either too short or too long
  • Your belt begins to sag, stretch or even flip as time goes by
  • You carry heavy stuff on a daily base, such as guns, magazine, flash lights, bottles, baton or tools and the belt cannot even hold
  • You are considering a gift for your beloved ones and don't have an idea yet!

If you have the above concerns, please continue to read and we might be able to help you today.

 

 

What Makes R.G.B. Unique?

-A Ratchet Belt
Let's look at our co-founder Lance W, 6"00 tall and waist size 42", spend his 8 hours a day in the office.  All of his belts, the luxury dress belt, the Amish hand made belt, and R.G.B. CA King fit perfectly and tightly. Lance can carry anything on the belt, IWB, OWB, cell phone, wallet, EDCs, etc. 
Lance always has business lunch with his colleagues and clients. After a good meal and a Starbucks double shot espresso, his effective waist size increases to 42 1/4".  With his luxury belt and Amish belt, Lance has to either suffer from the pain of over tightness if he sticks to the 42" hole, or walk around the office with his saggy pants if he relax the belt to the 43" hole. R.G.B. solves this problem by using the ratchet system to achieve the 1/4" adjustment. With a simple click, Lance can adjust R.G.B. to 42 1/4" and keep focusing on the important things instead of his pants.
 

 

 

 

 

-A Reinforced Belt

Lance W, loves all his 3 belts and wear them in turn. His EDCs and CCW are quite heavy and as a result, his luxury belt and Amish belt die after 7 months of daily usage. The Amish belt become saggy and stretched. The luxury belt is completely folded over. R.G.B.  survives by reinforcing the leather with another layer of "liquid steel" polymer. See how solid R.G.B. is after the reinforcement, it can even carry 3 people standing on top!

 

-A Reinforced Ratchet Belt

This is R.G.B.! Decent as a dress belt, solid as a carry belt!

 

How Does R.G.B. Achieve Top Quality ?

We don't want to present to you something that you can purchase from Alibaba for pennies. It should be so special that you can not find anything similar all over the world.

We want to also give you a product that is made to last for a long time. To achieve this we believe that top of the line products come from top of the line quality control, materials and design.

We believe that making products by hand in the traditional way worships the craftsmanship cherished by generations and instills a unique spirit to our products.

Our craftsmen stick to the techniques passed down for centuries. We appreciate our fathers' and grandfathers' wisdom tested by time. 

 

 

 

 

Top grain, means only the top (Best) 5% of the cow skin. This is what we use, on BOTH SIDES of our belt. We collected several popular brands from the market and none of them are even close to R.G.B. in terms of leather quality and craftsmanship. 

 

 

 

We understand looking good is very important. We embrace the most stylish and comfortable designs in a every day carry gun belt. 

 

 

With the special formulated polymer reinforcement layer, R.G.B. supports every day carry of light to heavy weight objects. Phones, scanners, flashlights, firearms, anything you can ever think of. The ratchet system is designed so that a 1/4" adjustment puts no holes on the belt and supports any waist size (up to 48" regular and up to 60" extra long) with just a click. The buckle is re-engineered to provide durability and ease of use.

 

 

 
We have 120% confidence in the quality of the R.G.B. and therefore offer a LIMITED LIFE TIME WARRANTY on all the R.G.B.'s we sell. 

The amazing design, the versatile functionality, the quality materials, the master craftsmanship and the excellent customer service, is what makes the R.G.B. what it is today. When you use the best of the best the result is "The Best and Last Gun Belt That You Will Ever Need". All of this is done with the customer (you) in mind.
 

 

Which One To Choose?

We Please leave us a comment or send us an email indicating which R.G.B. you want, Mamba, Condor, Cobra, CA King or Viper. All of our belts are 1 1/2" in width.

 
 
 

R.G.B. VS Regular Belts

 

  • Ratchet system makes it possible to fit all waist sizes
        With the ratchet system, you don't need to drill holes on the belt which will make your belt last longer. Regular belt holes are 1 inch apart. With ratchet system in place, R.G.B. can adjust in 1/4 inch increment, which will effortlessly fit almost all waist sizes.
    
  • Reinforced belt stops it from sagging, stretching and folding over
         R.G.B. inserts a layer of "liquid steel“ in between the leather. With reinforcement, R.G.B. is designed to carry guns, magazine, flash lights, keys, hammers, tools, any heavy stuff you can imagine. 
As you can see, R.G.B. can carry 3 person, more than 500 pound and still maintains its form.
 
  • Top notch leather
         Our leather acquiring cost is 6 times more than most regular brands which also claim to use the top grain leather. In the manufacturing world, price = quality. $5 can make a big difference, let alone 6 times difference.  

 

R.G.B. VS Other Ratchet Belts

  • Re-engineered ratchet system for max endurance
         We noticed most of the ratchet buckle tends to skid after months of regular use. We spent more than 6 months to redesign the whole ratchet system to solve the problem. Our buckle is meant to hold unless the metal dies first.
 
  • Not under-reinforced, not over-reinforced, but properly reinforced
         If under-reinforced, the belt will sag or even flip over in couple of months.
         If over-reinforced, the belt becomes super stiff and you feel like wearing a steel band. Actually there are some brands using steel pieces to reinforce the belt. It may hurt you simply because it's way too stiff and your waist are tender.
         R.G.B. did thousands of experiments to find the best material which perfectly balances strength and comfort. We are not smart enough to find out everything immediately, but our pursuit of perfection leads us there.
 
  • Top notch leather
         Same as the above section. Most ratchet belt brands are not willing to pay premium for the leather. R.G.B. pays, because we believe that quality is on top of everything, 
 

What Does R.G.B. Customer Say

You think I'm bragging about R.G.B.? Not a problem, let's see what our customers say:
Wellington from WA comes back to R.G.B. after tried out 5 different gun belts:

Charles from TX highly evaluated our service and explains why R.G.B. is "well worth the money" from the professional perspective:

 

Dan from OK gave us 5 star on our product and 6 star on our service:

 

 

Please find more supports from our Facebook page and customer testimonial page of our R.G.B. official website:

https://www.facebook.com/RGB-Ratchet-Gun-Belt-1693241560919609/

http://www.ratchetgunbelt.com/#!testimonial/w41oi

 

 

Production

We will begin the mass production at early November. The handcraft process normally takes 20-30 days. The packaging and shipping from our warehouse at Ohio requires another week or so.   You should be able to receive the R.G.B. belts mid December, definitely before Christmas.

 

Stretch Goal

We've reached 300% of our target and the stretch goal is unlocked now! Hooray!

A lot of backers contacted us for more selections. In order to thank y'all for your consistent love and support, we decided to offer the gun metal buckle  for only $19 each (MSRP of $39 in the future). Hurry up and our Indemand sale will end soon!

Check our all 3 buckles, black, silver and gunmetal!

story:
A Fashion Essential

In the City of London, on the pulse of the time, we developed a special fabric for our pocket squares that represent the merger between fashion and functionality. Every pocket square is two sided, one side is formal, the other one will style your casual look. Wherever you go, to the office or for afterwork drinks, this revolutionary pocket square has it all.
What is more, our unique fabric enables you to clean the surface of your electronic devices easily. You can wear it on you - in a classy way. Remember, the difference is always in the detail!


This petite piece of fabric can express your personality without having to purchase an entire closet worth of different suits. Our unique designs allow you to adjust your style to any occasion. 


For men there are just two possibilities to stand out from the crowd: Either a nice wristwatch or a smart pocket square. Since we are no watchmakers...the latter it shall be!


The Fabric

Our pocket squares are made from a unique material that we call TONY, which we developed after conducting extensive research. Through our dedication to perfection we managed to combine two often controversial features - function and aesthetics. As a result, our smart pocket squares are capable of cleaning your smartphone, tablet or any other delicate surface. Your electronic devices and sunglasses need a cleaning several times a day, using a specifically developed fabric, our pocket squares can easily wipe away unwanted distraction from your screens. Their elegant design compliments your outfit at the same time - all in one. We use just the finest and most elegant materials and with our eye for detail we craft the most stylish piece of accessory.


The Perfect Gift

Each pocket square is designed with passion and attention to detail and wrapped in an elegant packaging because a revolutionary product deserves an outstanding presentation as well. It is important for us that the overall picture gives you the feeling of durability when you first get your hands on it. Therefore, our pocket squares represent the perfect gift for your beloved ones. 


Our Designs

Aviator



Torero


Tropical


Nightowl


Mayfair


Overview


The Story Behind The Campaign

Our team was formed at Cass Business School where we decided to start up a business and develop a stylish product that would represent a merger between two crucial things essential for a person living in an urban environment. In our case, combining fashion and functionality was a challenge - and we were eager to accept it. In large cities it is sometimes hard to stand out of the crowd and you never know what the current day may bring. So after days and nights of nerve-racking discussions we found a solution by launching a product that we, and also our friends and colleagues, were excited about. Due to close contacts to the textile industry we are able to have our hands on the product from the very first moment, starting from development and production until the delivery to your doorstep. This enables us to provide you with the very best quality and cutting-edge service. Some team members have a background in fashion, others worked in the creative industry. Nevertheless, we all share the same enthusiasm for building something new.


Timeline

To take our project to the next step and realize the serial production, we need your support.
