story:
When you put on your watch in the morning, does it reflect who you are?  Well, it should!

We live in a time when everyone has the same stuff, racing for the latest phone, fastest laptop and most advanced gadget. Every single one of these devices will soon be obsolete. Your WATCH, on the other hand, is a chance to reflect your value of striking design and timeless mechanics, and that is why we hope you'll join us in bringing the Limited Edition SOLOSCOPE Automatic to life. Let the latest and boldest mechanical watch by XERIC remind you -- and everyone around you -- that you are making your own mark.  It's time to go SOLO.

The SOLOSCOPE Automatic is mechanical, so the motion of your wrist is all it needs for power. This personal time machine will be right there on your wrist through all the forced upgrades of your gadgets and their planned obsolescence. At XERIC Watches, we are taking a step back to classic mechanical watches, affordably priced, so that you can move forward in your individuality. We believe our creations focus on what really matters when you're the one with most striking watch in your world.

The SOLOSCOPE Automatic separates display from mechanics. It has a single hand, fusing hours and minutes in a distinctive but simple display balancing function and style. This hand encircles the hour and points to the minutes. The other half of the face exposes twin balance wheels, and the mechanics that powers the watch in reaction to motion of your wrist. 

A watch isn't complete without a great leather strap. We've proudly teamed up with the historic American Tannery HORWEEN for some undeniably awesome time belts!

THE REWARDS

 

Those who are attracted to XERIC Watches -- the new and long-standing customers of WATCHISMO and WATCHES.COM -- are tired of ostentatious watches that merely express privilege, and dull watches that say nothing at all.  We found a way to offer affordable, limited edition -- but still amazing -- watches to fill that void. We are unleashing the SOLOSCOPE Automatic, our most adventurous and personal design to date.

At XERIC, we are passionate about making watches that no one has seen before - it's all we do.  To bring the SOLOSCOPE to life, we need the thumbs-up from individuals who take pride in standing out from the pack. We need you.

We value crowdfunding as a way to reach those unique individuals who share our dream of making highly unusual mechanical watches affordable. We feel a kinship with the crowdfunding culture and the visionary people who support alternative concepts like the SOLOSCOPE.

SOLOSCOPE FEATURES

Like the chambers of a beating heart, the balance wheels pump life into this complex time machine. Watching the action of a living machine on your wrist gives a thrill no electronic gadget can.

Simply wearing your SOLOSCOPE Automatic spins the rotor, storing enough energy to power the movement. The oscillating mass (rotor) generating the power supply to the movement is seen through the caseback porthole viewing crystal (as shown below).

Each XERIC timepiece will be hand assembled. A limited edition of 999 allows for superb attention to detail and great care when building the full SOLOSCOPE collection.

The Horween Leather Company has set the standard for the highest quality leathers since 1905. All of their leather is processed at their location on the corner of Elston and Ashland in Chicago, Illinois.

We are working with exceptional manufacturers with decades of experience in the watch industry. They're excited to start producing the SOLOSCOPE, with every excruciating detail to our exacting standards.

 

 

ABOUT WATCHISMO & WATCHES.COM

 

 

After years of specializing in only the most unique timepieces, creating XERIC WATCHES was the natural progression for WATCHISMO & WATCHES.COM founders Mitch & Andrew to explore their creative passions.

WATCHISMO is carefully curated watch collection by brothers Mitch & Andrew Greenblatt, modern horological enthusiasts with a passion for unique timepieces. Purveyors of wrist-borne time machines since 1999, WATCHISMO is a singular source for unusual modern watches from around the world.

Mitch and Andrew founded XERIC Watches to bring complex, mechanical timepieces like the XERISCOPE & HALOGRAPH collection to a broad cross-section of watch enthusiasts who dream of an affordable mechanical watch. Together, the brothers have carefully curated the exceptional collection at WATCHISMO, which since 1999 has been a singular source for unique modern watches from around the world. XERIC Watches represents a natural progression of the business: from Curators to Creators of designs that reflect their experience, knowledge and passion for the truly unusual.

Fits ups to a 9” WristMovt: Twin Balance Automatic Movt. Frequency of 21,600BPH. Running time up to 36 Hours. 40 jewels.Weight: 5.4 oz/155 gramsWater Resistance: 5 ATM Water ResistanceWarranty: 12 Months

story:
The Speedliner GT is the new addition to my Californian Series - stunning timepieces designed for driving. 

Its’ 42mm stainless steel chassis has retro tapered lugs, a black dial with date window, white printed logos, applied hour markers, luminous hands and is finished off with a vibrant red second hand.

With the Racing strap fitted, the GT looks even more appropriate as the ideal attire behind the wheel.

The GT ready for driving 

I designed the Speedliner to capture that iconic ‘60s look and brought it bang up to date with a Swiss Ronda quartz-mechanical movement.


The stainless steel bracelet is fitted as standard and you can add a Racing leather strap in black with red trim, or light brown leather if you wish. All you need to do is add the price of the strap to your Speedliner pledge. There is no additional shipping cost if the strap is going in with the watch.

The watch will usually retail at $712 so the rewards tiers here are really exciting. Jump in quick and grab a bargain! Your support helps make the production of these and other AWC watches possible.

"I ACTUALLY DESIGN, ENGINEER AND BUILD MY WATCHES"

Unlike so many watch brands and crowdfunding projects, l actually design, engineer and build my watches,  I get some help from Swiss companies for some parts and processes but l probably have more physical contact and involvement in creating your watch than other brands. Once l have built your watch, it wont leave my hands and go into the box until l am completely happy with it.

I started designing and building watches around 7 years ago, part time at first. I could see that most watch company’s shopped-out their work except for those producing uber expensive watches, but l wanted to bridge the gap by offering hand built watches that l had actually worked on, but for a more realistic price range.

Me doing what l love best


The AWC brand name came from my childhood recollections that many products had ‘Automatic’ written on them, such as cars, food mixers and other appliances. The word Automatic was there to claim some automation but also to make the product look better. So for me the word is nostalgic, rather than anything to do with the function of the watch.

At the moment my business is split between the UK and Switzerland. In the UK l have a small workshop where l design, engineer and prototype the watches. I then travel to Switzerland where l utilize some workbench space in a friends facility near Delemont, North West Switzerland. His facilities are great but  l really want to move my design office into a small premises in Fleurier so that everything is close by.  My partner Jenny and l will happily relocate to suit.

Workspace in Delemont

So, big plans for a tiny watch company. Please do back this project to help us get a step closer to realizing the dream.

Tim

A little more detail on the Speedliner GT

I dreamed up the Speedliner concept while touring the States and visiting clasic car shows a few years ago. I vowed to add the Speedliner to my Californian Series as the perfect watch for a drive down the coast road. And here it is. 

If you look at the Speedliner GT you will see that the lugs (the spars that hold the strap) begin to taper way back at the side of the case, as opposed to starting to taper close to the top or bottom of the case. A small detail but none the less, one that l had to build into the watch if l was going to achieve that iconic ‘60s look. The subtle bevel along the top edge of the lug then helps to blend it in for a more rounded look from any angle.

The case is made in stainless steel, L316 grade, which is the best for watch cases as it provides excellent durability and when polished, offers a dark contrast in the reflection. The diameter of the case is 42mm and the thickness is 8.78mm. From lug tip to lug tip it measures 48.16mm and the strap width between the lugs is 22mm. The ATM waterproof rating is 10 and the case has a screw on caseback.

Due to the nature of screw-on casebacks, the horizontal alignment of the logos cannot be guaranteed

I always use a sapphire crystal to the front of my watches. There is simply nothing worse than wearing your watch for the first time and then finding you have put a huge scratch across the glass. Sapphires are not indestructible but do offer the closest thing to being scratchproof in terms of normal everyday wear. 

As on all of my watches l only include a small amount of anti reflective coating to the sapphire. This is because l believe that the sapphire is a part of, and should be seen as, the overall shape of the case.

I fitted a Swiss Ronda quartz-mechanical movement as l really believe in their products. The high quality of their gear train is essential to the accuracy of their timekeeping.

The Ronda 515 quartz-mechanical gear train

I usually make my own leather straps entirely by hand, but for the Speedliner GT l did not have a suitable tooling so l sourced my ‘Racing’ strap from world renowned strap makers Hirsch of Austria, and you won’t be disappointed with it if you choose that option.

The stainless steel bracelet comes as standard and is adjustable in length by removing the links and/or moving the clasp position. Please do seek the services of your local jeweler for this exercise or for switching from the bracelet to the leather strap.

All in all, the GT is already a personal favorite of mine and l can’t wait to build one for you. 

T-shirts
Why not show your support with this exclusive Mustang/Speedliner GT T-shirt? You can indicate your T-shirt choice and size, at the end of the campaign.

These exclusive backer T-shirts are available in sizes S, M, L, XL. Shirts are 90% cotton, washable and beautifully printed (text says Speedliner GT). 

T-shirts will be posted to backers within 4 weeks of the end of the campaign.


What else can l do to help ?

Even if you are not ready for a new watch just yet, you can still back this project by simply spreading the word. If you like what you see then tell your friends. The more people that see the campaign, the better. You could drop off a Dollar too if you wish. It all counts. 

Risks and Challenges

I have plenty of experience in building watches, so the only real issues are the time it will take for me to deliver your beautiful watch. We will hit the summer break in mid July through to the end of August. The whole of Switzerland seems to shut down which hampers my access to my work area and parts or processes that l need doing. I will do what l can to stay on target and will keep everyone regularly updated as to my progress.


FAQs

Q.  Why run the watch campaign now if you know that there will be a holiday period in the Summer?

A.  If l leave it until after the summer break then l will hit the equally long winter holidays.

Q. How long is the guarantee on your watch?

A.  I offer a one year guarantee.

Automatic Watch Co.
    Driving Design...

story:
Around 1995-1996 I was living in Brooklyn, NY. I was an undergrad at Long Island University, and working full time with the Department of education in New York City. I had a lovely 2 bedroom apartment and decided to find a room-mate to cut living cost.

My new room-mate insisted on dumping everything into the kitchen trash-can..

Recycling was a new concept and easy to forget..

I sat down and did a rough sketch of my idea of a recycle bin..

Fast forward to today.. I hold a US patent for a recyclable trash can that was granted in 2010.

Challenged with raising money to bring this to the market place, I am seeking $35,000 to develop the cost of the mould.

I have located a manufacturer in China, that is able to develop this product for roughly $35,000.

My dream is to raise funds to manufacture this trash-can, and donate a portion of every sale there-after to charitable organizations such as St Jude Children Hospital.

Partners are encouraged to choose a charitable organization for future donations...

story:
BlueFox is the world's first automatic electronic safety bracelet that helps prevent drowning.

The BlueFox bracelet is fully automatic and consists of 2 main components that are mounted on a bracelet: an electronic base and an alarm module. The permanent measurement of depth and time in the water makes the bracelet a personal protector for swimmers of all ages. In an emergency situation – in this case the pre-programmed parameters of depth and time are exceeded – the alarm module will be disconnected from the bracelet and a balloon that instantly inflates (filling with gas) is forced to the water’s surface. Right after the alarm module with the balloon has reached the surface it alerts people in and around the water with a very loud (100 dB) acoustic signal. When using BlueFox in public/commercial pools, the alarm-signal from the Balloon can be sent to an external receiver unit and then the alarm can be transferred to any existing alarm system or to a Walkie-Talkie.

 


BlueFox can be programmed individually depending on the swimming ability or the age of a person. For example: the programming parameters of the bracelet for a six-year-old non-swimmer might be 1.6 ft. (50 cm)/15 sec. An alarm will be released as soon as the child exceeds the preset depth (counted from the water-surface) and a duration of 15 seconds. For an adult or experienced swimmer, the parameters will be set at a higher level, for example 2.6 ft. (80 cm) and a longer duration of maybe 20 seconds. This allows the swimmer to jump into the water, to dive, to swim laps etc. without getting a false alarm. Whereas if you want to protect a toddler who should not even be close to the water, the unit will be programmed with 5cm/5 seconds which ensures that an alarm will be triggered immediately when the toddler falls into the water. BlueFox is developed and produced in Switzerland and carries the label: SWISS MADE. 

The technology of BlueFox is protected by a  worldwide patent application. 

                     Example Programming of BlueFox 50 cm / 15 seconds:





What are we offering you for your support?

Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!


Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!


Application Possibilities

BlueFox is a stand-alone safety product. No additional equipment or installation is required to carry out the necessary alert functions in an emergency case. It functions in any type of water and pools around the world. The only condition is that you are not alone and somebody can provide the rescue procedure in an emergency. BlueFox can be programmed very easily and is consumer-friendly. All it requires is a free download-program of the BlueFox software found on our website. With the PC you can adjust time and depth anytime. 

The operator of a commercial pool facility might be interested in the possibility of integrating the functions of a cash card, an access control, season tickets dressing-rooms etc. This is possible by equipping the BlueFox bracelet with any available RFID chip and will be receiving a multifunctional bracelet with the principle application of a safety unit.


Why did we develop the BlueFox ST1 anti-drowning bracelet?

With BlueFox we want to help prevent drowning and near-drowning by giving an early alarm when somebody is in trouble. Drowning is not the violent, splashing, call for help that most people expect. Drowning is almost always a deceptively quiet, silent and invisible event. The waving, splashing, and yelling that dramatic conditioning (television) prepares us to look for is rarely seen in real life. Drowning is the second leading cause of accidental injury-related death among children ages 1 to 14, with a lot of drowning accidents happening close to parents or other adults. The problem is being able to recognize in time when somebody is drowning. Not only can children drown, it can happen to anybody in the water, even professional swimmers.

But keep in mind, BlueFox is intended to complement lifeguards, not replace them or reduce their responsibilities or vigilance. BlueFox does not save people from drowning – lifeguards do. Under no circumstances should the presence or use of BlueFox result in the reduction or modification of lifeguard staffing or duties as required by regulation or normal practices.
Further assistance you can get from following associations:
http://www.ilsf.org/
http://www.ilsamericas.org/
http://europe.ilsf.org/
http://www.royallifesaving.com.au/
http://www.slrg.ch/de.html
Facts on drowning:
http://www.cdc.gov/HomeandRecreationalSafety/Water-Safety/waterinjuries-factsheet.html

Drowning is one of the leading causes of accidental injury-related death among children!

It should be mentioned that the second-most common cause of accidental death for children is drowning. In addition to the fatal drowning accidents, the number of nearly drowned children is approx. 5 times as high. Many of these accidents can result in severe bodily harm and brain damage due to lack of oxygen. 

 

Many of thesetragic accidents happen in public swimming pools and private pools. Contrary to popular opinion, most victims of drowning are not non-swimmers; in fact, the largest section is made up of experienced swimmers.

The method most commonly used today to keep swimmers safe is to monitor them with a trained lifeguard.  But factors such as fatigue, distraction, a poor overall view and noise may cause the attentiveness of the observer to waver, ultimately leading to lapses in safety. What’s more, to justify costs, attendants and lifeguards are often given additional tasks. To ensure that pool users are fully supervised, a minimum of one lifeguard per pool is necessary at all times. But in practice, this is not realistic.

Drowning Statistics in the US

Many people enjoy swimming pools and don't think about drowning. And yet every day, nine people drown in the United States. The statistics can be quite alarming, especially for parents with young kids -- but it does help people realize the reality of the potential danger of swimming pools.

  • Each day in the United States, nine people drown 
  • For each death caused by drowning, there are 1-4 nonfatal submersion accidents serious enough for the victim to be hospitalized 
  • Drowning is the second leading cause of accidental injury-related death among children ages 1 to 14 
  • Drowning is the leading cause of accidental injury-related death among children ages 1 to 4
  • Among children ages 1 to 4 years, most drownings occur in residential swimming pools 
  • Nonfatal drownings can result in brain damage that may result in long-term disabilities including memory problems, learning disabilities, and permanent loss of basic functioning
  • Nineteen percent of child drowning fatalities take place in public pools with certified lifeguards on duty 
  • Seventy-seven percent of those involved in a home-drowning accident had only been missing for five minutes or less when found in the swimming pool; 70% weren't expected to be in or near the pool at that time
  • In nearly 9 out of 10 child-drowning deaths, a parent or caregiver claimed to be watching the child
  • Participation in formal swimming lessons can reduce the risk of drowning by 88% among children ages 1-4
    Sources: Water-Related Injuries: Fact Sheet.Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. March 12, 2007. Water-Related Injuries: Fact Sheet. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. June 12, 2008. http:/www.poolsafely.gov/

                                      Who are we?

                                                  Project Timeline

         


                         Where does the money go?

We need your help to finalize our software development and to purchase raw material for the mass production.

Here is how we will invest the funding we receive:

With your support we expect to have the first production of BlueFox in your hands by July/August 2016! We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We really do appreciate your support and please share our BlueFox campaign with your friends!

Be a part of this success story, together we can change the world and help save lives.                              

                                                         

Does BlueFox replace lifeguards or other supervisors? 
No, BlueFox can’t replace lifeguards or any other supervisors. BlueFox is a product that gives support to lifeguards and other people in and around the pool. Somebody needs to rescue the drowning person. BlueFox helps by giving an alarm in time. We still recommend learning to swimming and for your own safety, please respect the rules in the various swimming pool facilities and waters.

Who is BlueFox designed for? In principle BlueFox can be used by everybody, from toddlers to elderly people. It’s useful for swimmers and non-swimmers who are in the water, but also around the water. Anyone can  wear Blue Fox. 

In which waters or pools can BlueFox operate? BlueFox could potentially be used in any kind of waters. But it only makes sense when there are other people around. This for example could be in private pools, commercial (public) pools, waterparks, therapeutic baths, beaches, lakes, waterways, ponds etc.

Can BlueFox be reused after triggering an alarm? Yes, it can. Simply buy an exchange alarm capsule and klick it into your BlueFox base of the  bracelet and it will be ready again. 

Can I use the exchange alarm capsule without the bracelet? No, this is not possible. The bracelet is especially designed for BlueFox and it operates with a sophisticated software and by a special trigger mechanism. The unit only works with both of these parts. 

How many exchange alarm capsules do I get? Exchange alarm capsules have to be bought separately, except with the Early Bird Plus perk. With this perk you will get an extra exchange alarm capsule included in the package. 

Where can I buy exchange alarm capsules after the Indiegogo campaign?Shortly after the campaign has ended you can check on our website for locations. 

Is BlueFox available in different colors and different bracelet sizes? Yes, BlueFox ST1 will be available in different colours if we reach our stretch goals. 

Why are we looking on Indiegogo for potential customers? We are trying to reach all of you  with this campaign , all parents, grandparents, everybody who likes to have fun in the water. We want you to have the chance to get a great and unique product direct from the manufacturer. 

How does BlueFox recognize that somebody is drowning? BlueFox is a high-tech micro-computer, which constantly measures the depth with a pressure sensor. The individual programming of the BlueFox is made on a PC. That means BlueFox monitors the person in water. An alarm will be triggered as soon as the programmed depth and elapsed time has been exceeded. This special programming allows you to jump into the water, dive, and do whatever you want without giving false alarm.

                        Thank you for reading through our campaign page
story_txt:
BlueFox is the world's first automatic electronic safety bracelet that helps prevent drowning. 
The BlueFox bracelet is fully automatic and consists of 2 main
components that are mounted on a bracelet: an electronic base and an alarm
module. The permanent measurement of depth and time in the water makes the
bracelet a personal protector for swimmers of all ages. In an emergency
situation – in this case the pre-programmed parameters of depth and time are
exceeded – the alarm module will be disconnected from the bracelet and a
balloon that instantly inflates (filling with gas) is forced to the water’s surface.
Right after the alarm module with the balloon has reached the surface it alerts
people in and around the water with a very loud (100 dB) acoustic signal. When
using BlueFox in public/commercial pools, the alarm-signal from the
Balloon can be sent to an external receiver unit and then the alarm can be transferred to
any existing alarm system or to a
Walkie-Talkie. BlueFox can be programmed individually depending on the
swimming ability or the age of a person. For example: the programming
parameters of the bracelet for a six-year-old non-swimmer might be 1.6 ft.
(50 cm)/15 sec. An alarm will be released as soon as the child exceeds the
preset depth (counted from the water-surface) and a duration of 15 seconds. For
an adult or experienced swimmer, the parameters will be set at a higher level, for
example 2.6 ft. (80 cm) and a longer duration of maybe 20 seconds. This allows
the swimmer to jump into the water, to dive, to swim laps etc. without getting
a false alarm. Whereas if you want to protect a toddler who should not even be
close to the water, the unit will be programmed with 5cm/5 seconds which
ensures that an alarm will be triggered immediately when the toddler falls into
the water. BlueFox is developed and produced in Switzerland and carries the
label: SWISS MADE. The technology of BlueFox is protected by a  worldwide patent application.                      Example Programming of BlueFox 50 cm / 15 seconds:













What are we offering you for your support?


Claim Yours!


Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!



Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!

Claim Yours!
Application Possibilities





BlueFox is a stand-alone safety product. No additional equipment or installation is required to carry out the necessary alert functions in an emergency case. It functions in any type of water and pools around the world. The only condition is that you are not alone and somebody can provide the rescue procedure in an emergency. BlueFox can be programmed very easily and is consumer-friendly. All it requires is a free download-program of the BlueFox software found on our website. With the PC you can adjust time and depth anytime. 
The operator of a commercial pool facility might be interested in the possibility of integrating the functions of a cash card, an access control, season tickets dressing-rooms etc. This is possible by equipping the BlueFox bracelet with any available RFID chip and will be receiving a multifunctional bracelet with the principle application of a safety unit.



Why did we develop the BlueFox ST1 anti-drowning bracelet?
With BlueFox we want to help prevent drowning and near-drowning by giving an early alarm when somebody is in trouble. Drowning is not the violent, splashing, call for help that most people expect. Drowning is almost always a deceptively quiet, silent and invisible event. The waving, splashing, and yelling that dramatic conditioning (television) prepares us to look for is rarely seen in real life. Drowning is the second leading cause of accidental injury-related death among children ages 1 to 14, with a lot of drowning accidents happening close to parents or other adults. The problem is being able to recognize in time when somebody is drowning. Not only can children drown, it can happen to anybody in the water, even professional swimmers.

But keep in mind, BlueFox is intended to complement lifeguards, not replace them or reduce their responsibilities or vigilance. BlueFox does not save people from drowning – lifeguards do. Under no circumstances should the presence or use of BlueFox result in the reduction or modification of lifeguard staffing or duties as required by regulation or normal practices. Further assistance you can get from following associations: http://www.ilsf.org/http://www.ilsamericas.org/http://europe.ilsf.org/http://www.royallifesaving.com.au/http://www.slrg.ch/de.htmlFacts on drowning:http://www.cdc.gov/HomeandRecreationalSafety/Water-Safety/waterinjuries-factsheet.html
Drowning is one of the leading causes of accidental injury-related death among children!
It should be mentioned that the second-most common cause of accidental death for children is drowning. In addition to the fatal drowning accidents, the number of nearly drowned children is approx. 5 times as high. Many of these accidents can result in severe bodily harm and brain damage due to lack of oxygen.  
  
Many of thesetragic accidents
happen in public swimming pools and private pools. Contrary to popular opinion, most victims of drowning are
not non-swimmers; in fact, the largest section is made up of experienced
swimmers.

The method most commonly used today to keep
swimmers safe is to monitor them with a trained lifeguard.  But factors
such as fatigue, distraction, a poor overall view and noise may cause the
attentiveness of the observer to waver, ultimately leading to lapses in safety.
What’s more, to justify costs, attendants and lifeguards are often given
additional tasks. To ensure that pool users are fully supervised, a minimum of one lifeguard
per pool is necessary at all times. But in practice, this is not realistic.
Drowning Statistics in the US
Many people enjoy swimming pools and don't think about drowning. And yet every day, nine people drown in the United States. The statistics can be quite alarming, especially for parents with young kids -- but it does help people realize the reality of the potential danger of swimming pools. 

Each day in the United States, nine people drown 
For each death caused by drowning, there are 1-4 nonfatal submersion accidents serious enough for the victim to be hospitalized 
Drowning is the second leading cause of accidental injury-related death among children ages 1 to 14 
Drowning is the leading cause of accidental injury-related death among children ages 1 to 4 
Among children ages 1 to 4 years, most drownings occur in residential swimming pools 
Nonfatal drownings can result in brain damage that may result in long-term disabilities including memory problems, learning disabilities, and permanent loss of basic functioning
Nineteen percent of child drowning fatalities take place in public pools with certified lifeguards on duty 
Seventy-seven percent of those involved in a home-drowning accident had only been missing for five minutes or less when found in the swimming pool; 70% weren't expected to be in or near the pool at that time 
In nearly 9 out of 10 child-drowning deaths, a parent or caregiver claimed to be watching the child
Participation in formal swimming lessons can reduce the risk of drowning by 88% among children ages 1-4Sources: Water-Related Injuries: Fact Sheet.Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. March 12, 2007. Water-Related Injuries: Fact Sheet. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. June 12, 2008.
http:/www.poolsafely.gov/


                                      Who are we?




                                                  Project Timeline 
         


                         Where does the money go? 

We need your help to finalize our software development and to purchase raw material for the mass production.
Here is how we will invest the funding we receive:

We really do appreciate your support and please share our BlueFox campaign with your friends!Be a part of this success story, together we can change the world and help save lives.

This for example could be in private pools, commercial (public) pools, waterparks, therapeutic baths, beaches, lakes, waterways, ponds etc.Can BlueFox be reused after triggering an alarm? Yes, it can. Simply buy an exchange alarm capsule and klick it into your BlueFox base of the  bracelet and it will be ready again. Can I use the exchange alarm capsule without the bracelet? No, this is not possible. The bracelet is especially designed for BlueFox and it operates with a sophisticated software and by a special trigger mechanism. The unit only works with both of these parts. How many exchange alarm capsules do I get? Exchange alarm capsules have to be bought separately, except with the Early Bird Plus perk. With this perk you will get an extra exchange alarm capsule included in the package. Where can I buy exchange alarm capsules after the Indiegogo campaign?Shortly after the campaign has ended you can check on our website for locations. Is BlueFox available in different colors and different bracelet sizes? Yes, BlueFox ST1 will be available in different colours if we reach our stretch goals. Why are we looking on Indiegogo for potential customers? We are trying to reach all of you  with this campaign , all parents, grandparents, everybody who likes to have fun in the water. This special programming allows you to jump into the water, dive, and do whatever you want without giving false alarm.

story:
Help Snapease raise 2.000€ for our first production run! Check out our story, what we are about and our product.

Snapease are cool socks that remain in pairs during and after the washing.

Our dream, no more sorting socks and no more socks without mate.

Snapease are designed in Berlin and handmade in Spain with high quality socks and nice snap fasteners.

Snapease are for women and for men, for business and for casual dressing.

Bruno is the designer of Snapease and a cheerful engineer, Eduardo is the producer of Snapease and a friendly physicist.

All our perks have free shipping (world wide) and are made with lots of love.

Thank you!

story:
SAFESAK is a set of Biodegradable liners that clip into YOUR reusable grocery bags. STOP E-Coli festering from chicken juice & fruits.

Reusable Bag with SafeSak liners

Hi, I live in Austin Texas and like many other cities in the world, city leaders have been trying different ways to deal with the number one consumer item in the world, plastic grocery bags. In the United States we use ~100 Billion one time use plastic grocery bags every year and with only 2% recycled coupled with estimated 400 years to break down each one, they have become a huge problem. Some cities are dealing with the problem by banning their use outright or attempting to collect a deposit for each plastic grocery bag used. Other cities have attempted to encourage the use of reusable bags which has created the potential for unwanted contamination inside those bags. Recent Universities of Arizona and Pennsylvania studies have found in random inspections of reusable grocery bags, that several types of bacteria were present including Salmonella & E-coli bacteria. SafeSak's do not allow for any cross contamination and they biodegrade without leaving any hazardous chemicals in the soil.

I am going to use the Indiegogo funding (which after Rewards should be about half of what was raised) to refine the bag design and order the final version of the SafeSak. I will also redesign the clips and tailor marketing and promotional material to store requirements I plan on rapidly expanding the brand while testing customer satisfaction results in concert with a large national grocery chain while developing better pricing on the bags themselves. SafeSak is protected by the US Patent and international offices but I may add to those with a redesign of the clips. My goal is to have SafeSak in a store near you by 1st quarter 2014.

You can always follow or comment on my Website: www.SafeSak.com

Thank You so much for your support!

Jim Morrow

 ________________________________________________________

Typical mountain of plastic trash that doesn't have to be there!

Typical one time use plastic bag decoration, you know you've seen it!

________________________________________________________


Risks and challenges 

When it comes to fulfillment, every project has potential obstacles, from production delays to permits to collaborator mishaps. That is true but this is not my first time as a business owner, the biggest thing I have learned over the years is to plan for the unexpected. I have ordered the bags previously and have adjusted timeframes and expectations accordingly. I have a Law degree and currently run the Compliance Department for three national companies. I have experience dealing with governmental regulations and have previously been the owner of an Import/Export company. I will not let you down!

story:
WE DID IT!

Thank you, thank you, thank you, THANK YOU from the bottom of our overflowing hearts. We are so inspired and humbled by the support we've received from Wornettes all over the world. With your contributions, we know this issue of WORN will be our very best ever.

Now that we've reached our goal, any amount over $5,000 will go to three very specific places:

  1. An honorarium to our production manager Laura Kloepfer, who has worked tirelessly to produce the new layout for WORN;
  2. Honarariums to our consultants, an organization called Lateral Strategists, who have been an invaluable source of help with the redesign;
  3. And finally, any remaining funds will go back into the production of WORN Fashion Journal.

The IndieGoGo campaign will stay up until we finish our alloted time - 28 more days! - and it is currently the ONLY place you can pre-order Issue 15 of WORN. If you want to be first to get your hands on the new WORN, or if you'd like to purchase a new subscription, or if you want one of our remaining friendship bracelets, this is the place to do it.

Again, thank you, thank you, and once more for the cheap seats in the back THANK YOUUUUU.

Who are we?
WORN Fashion Journal is an independent print publication based in Toronto, Canada. WORN is a completely different kind of fashion publication – instead of writing about trends or what to buy, WORN looks at the personal stories, politics, histories, cultures, and subcultures of fashion.

WORN began as a side project by Serah-Marie McMahon while she was a student at Concordia University. A small staff would meet in her apartment for one weekend and put the issue together. Seven years later, the staff has grown to over thirty Wornettes and our readership is in the thousands. Our editors and readers come from all over the world – from Boston to Berlin, from Spain to Singapore, people are constantly finding, reading, and contributing to WORN Fashion Journal.

What are we asking for?
Our readers have told us they keep their issues of WORN at record-breaking rates. Over 97% of WORN readers keep their issues forever. Our content is timeless and always relevant. We believe it makes perfect sense for our readers to want to hang on to their issues of WORN forever.

We believe a thicker, perfect-bound edition reflects the true value of WORN. It’s a prestige object our readers should be able to stack on a bookshelf, keep safe in a purse, or display proudly on a coffee table.

We believe this new format is a necessary step for WORN. We are no longer a group of friends working in a living room; we’re a real business that makes a product we believe in with all our hearts. We want the outside of WORN to reflect the inside.

Where will the money go?
WORN needs $5,000 to complete this project. The breakdown is as follows:

The additional fee for perfect binding and extra pages is $2,000 over our standard printing bill.

The new edition of WORN weighs more and will incur further shipping costs. We require $2,000 to cover the increase in shipping costs.

The new size of WORN will require different shipping supplies. We have the material necessary to ship out the old version of WORN, but we need $1,000 to purchase sturdier envelopes for durable shipping to WORN readers all over the world.

About the perks
All perks, including Issue 15 of WORN Fashion Journal, will be shipped after November 15, 2012. Shipping costs have been included in all applicable perk levels. Delivery dates will vary based on location.

ABOUT THE LIMERICKS: Anna Wornette has a gift for crafting limericks. A sample of her genius:

The Wornettes had set all their eyes
On expanding in scope and in size
Their intentions laid bare
On the reinventions they'd share
With their readers, supporters and allies

Your limerick about you will be sent via email.

ABOUT THE PINS: The “Wornette” pins are specially designed and a limited edition available only to our Indiegogo backers. Wear it to show the world what a good person you are for supporting independent publishing.

ABOUT THE SUBSCRIPTIONS: All subscriptions begin with Issue 15. The subscriptions include four issues of WORN over two years.

ABOUT THE FRIENDSHIP BRACELETS: Each friendship bracelet is handmade by a team of Wornettes: Isabel, Liz, Marianna, and Sarah-Joyce. Each style is unique and proudly announces that you - yes, you - are a Wornette. 

ABOUT THE LETTERS: Starting in November 2012, a Wornette will send you a monthly letter. You can expect lots of musings on fashion, stories from the WORN office, and a pile of lolz.

ABOUT THE SUPERCUTS: Daniel Wornette is a film editor that creates video content for WORN. He is the genius responsible for Every Outfit That Cher Horowitz Wears in Clueless, Hackers <3 Leather, and Goomahs, Molls, and Mob Wives. You will email Daniel your choice, and your supercut will be sent via email and posted on the official WORN Fashion Journal YouTube page.

ABOUT THE PUPPETS: Sara Guindon is a talented artist responsible for the illustrations and puppets featured in Issue 12 of WORN Fashion Journal. Once provided with your photo, Sara will create a puppet in your likeness. See more of her puppets here.

Music by Eastborough

Questions? Contact us!
dearworn@wornjournal.com

story:
Here is a video that presents what we have achieved


AR Wear - A clothing line offering wearable protection for when things go wrong.

PREFACE

Rape is about as wrong as it gets. The only one responsible for a rape is the rapist and AR Wear will not solve the fundamental problem that rape exists in our world. Only by raising awareness and education, as well as bringing rapists to justice, can we all hope to eventually accomplish the goal of eliminating rape as a threat to both women and men. Meanwhile, as long as sexual predators continue to populate our world, AR Wear would like to provide products to women and girls that will offer better protection against some attempted rapes while the work of changing society's rape culture moves forward.

OUR STORY        

         **Please refer to "Updates" for additional information posted since campaign launch**

      **NOTE: While we have reached our goal, we are appreciative of all additional donations**

We developed this product so that women and girls could have more power to control the outcome of a sexual assault. We wanted to offer some peace of mind in situations that cause feelings of apprehension, such as going out on a blind date, taking an evening run, “clubbing”, traveling in unfamiliar countries, and any other activity that might make one anxious about the possibility of an assault.

Although we believe that self-defense skills can help to resist an attempted assault, they cannot be used in all situations and will not always be effective. Other tools of self-defense currently available are also not effective in many common settings of sexual assault. Products such as pepper spray, tear gas, stun guns, etc. require that the potential victim be very alert and might be taken away to use against her.

We read studies reviewing the statistics of resisting assault, whether by forceful or non-forceful means. We learned that resistance increases the chance of avoiding a completed rape without making the victim more likely to be physically injured. We concluded that an item of clothing that creates an effective barrier layer can allow women and girls to passively resist an attacker, in addition to any other form of resistance they may be able to carry out at the time of an assault.

Our goal is to offer a wide range of wearable items, which will include assorted types and styles of underwear, running shorts, traveling shorts, etc., suitable for different situations and the styles of individual users. The challenge was to design products that can be worn comfortably while still being able to frustrate an assault effectively. The garments must be very difficult for someone else to remove by either force or stealth (in situations where the victim cannot resist because she has had too much to drink, was drugged, or is asleep).

They need to be resistant to pulling, tearing and cutting while being comfortable to wear during normal activities and, as in the case of underwear, fit smoothly under form-fitting outer clothing

Since we did not find a single material that fulfilled these requirements, our solution was to strengthen specific elements of our garments using an innovative skeletal structure which allows them to remain soft and ergonomic. The waist, thighs, and central panels are protected with specially designed, cut resistant straps and webbing. Once the waist girth has been adjusted and secured with its unique locking device, the garment cannot be pulled down. Since a female’s waist measurement is generally less than that of her pelvic area, the waist strap can be locked at a comfortable position and still prevent unwanted removal of the garment. The thigh straps, after an initial adjustment by the wearer, prevent the leg openings from being lifted or shifted to the sides by someone else. The center panels are connected to both the waist and thigh straps to create a unified protective skeletal structure.

WHY ARE WE ON INDIEGOGO?

We are here for several reasons:

- We need your financial support so that we can finalize prototypes that can be production ready.

- We need to know that other people believe that this product line should exist.

We feel very strongly about women’s safety and believe that we have successfully combined technology and fashion to help solve a problem that has not been adequately addressed in our society. We hope to work with organizations that combat violence against women and which offer support to those who have been violated.

No product alone can solve the problem of violence against women. Nevertheless, a woman or girl who is wearing one of our garments will be sending a clear message to her would-be assailant that she is NOT consenting. We believe that this undeniable message can help to prevent a significant number of rapes.

REWARDS

We have agonized over the subject of rewards for our supporters. We cannot in good conscience predict when our garments will be in production (see "Forecast & Challenges”) so feel that it would be unrealistic to offer the actual product as a reward. July 2014 (listed as our estimated delivery date) is when we hope to have our final prototype ready. Other customary rewards, such as key chains, stickers, t-shirts or hats, seem inappropriate considering the seriousness of our message and product line. We hope that our supporters will agree that all funds raised here should go towards making this project a success, rather than spending a portion on unrelated rewards, so that we can launch a product line that will let women and girls, as well as concerned loved ones, worry less and feel more secure.

FORECAST & CHALLENGES  

After several years of research, development, and testing, we have submitted a patent application and produced prototypes of the designs presented in our video. These are “concept prototypes”. Our next step, which we are hoping to fund here, is to finalize prototypes that are production-ready, while we simultaneously continue to develop additional styles and variations. The amount we have chosen as our campaign target is meant to complete this step, but may not be sufficient for finalizing production-ready prototypes since we cannot predict all of the obstacles we may encounter with such a unique structure and materials. We can assure our supporters that, if necessary, we will find the additional resources that may be required to complete this step towards making AR Wear a reality. Once we have finalized the prototypes, we will start another round of funding for the investment required to create the production line. Any funds we receive in excess of our target here will expedite the process of putting into operation the specifically designed production line that will be needed so that AR Wear can be available as soon as possible.
story_txt:
Here is a video that presents what we have achieved




AR Wear - A clothing line offering wearable protection for when things go wrong.



PREFACE
Rape is about as wrong as it gets. The only one responsible for a rape is the rapist and AR Wear will not solve the fundamental problem that rape exists in our world. Only by raising awareness and education, as well as bringing rapists to justice, can we all hope to eventually accomplish the goal of eliminating rape as a threat to both women and men. Meanwhile, as long as sexual predators continue to populate our world, AR Wear would like to provide products to women and girls that will offer better protection against some attempted rapes while the work of changing society's rape culture moves forward.
OUR STORY         

         **Please refer to "Updates" for additional information posted since campaign launch**
      **NOTE: While we have reached our goal, we are appreciative of all additional donations**
We developed this product so that women and girls could have more power to control the outcome of a sexual assault. We wanted to offer some peace of mind in situations that cause feelings of apprehension, such as going out on a blind date, taking an evening run, “clubbing”, traveling in unfamiliar countries, and any other activity that might make one anxious about the possibility of an assault.
Although we believe that self-defense skills can help to resist an attempted assault, they cannot be used in all situations and will not always be effective. Other tools of self-defense currently available are also not effective in many common settings of sexual assault. Products such as pepper spray, tear gas, stun guns, etc. require that the potential victim be very alert and might be taken away to use against her.
We read studies reviewing the statistics of resisting assault, whether by forceful or non-forceful means. We learned that resistance increases the chance of avoiding a completed rape without making the victim more likely to be physically injured. We concluded that an item of clothing that creates an effective barrier layer can allow women and girls to passively resist an attacker, in addition to any other form of resistance they may be able to carry out at the time of an assault.

The center panels are connected to both the waist and thigh straps to create a unified protective skeletal structure.

We feel very strongly about women’s safety and believe that we have successfully combined technology and fashion to help solve a problem that has not been adequately addressed in our society. We hope to work with organizations that combat violence against women and which offer support to those who have been violated.
No product alone can solve the problem of violence against women. Nevertheless, a woman or girl who is wearing one of our garments will be sending a clear message to her would-be assailant that she is NOT consenting. We believe that this undeniable message can help to prevent a significant number of rapes.
REWARDS
We have agonized over the subject of rewards for our supporters. We cannot in good conscience predict when our garments will be in production (see "Forecast & Challenges”) so feel that it would be unrealistic to offer the actual product as a reward. July 2014 (listed as our estimated delivery date) is when we hope to have our final prototype ready. Other customary rewards, such as key chains, stickers, t-shirts or hats, seem inappropriate considering the seriousness of our message and product line. We hope that our supporters will agree that all funds raised here should go towards making this project a success, rather than spending a portion on unrelated rewards, so that we can launch a product line that will let women and girls, as well as concerned loved ones, worry less and feel more secure.
FORECAST & CHALLENGES  
After several years of research, development, and testing, we have submitted a patent application and produced prototypes of the designs presented in our video. These are “concept prototypes”. Our next step, which we are hoping to fund here, is to finalize prototypes that are production-ready, while we simultaneously continue to develop additional styles and variations. The amount we have chosen as our campaign target is meant to complete this step, but may not be sufficient for finalizing production-ready prototypes since we cannot predict all of the obstacles we may encounter with such a unique structure and materials. We can assure our supporters that, if necessary, we will find the additional resources that may be required to complete this step towards making AR Wear a reality. Once we have finalized the prototypes, we will start another round of funding for the investment required to create the production line. Any funds we receive in excess of our target here will expedite the process of putting into operation the specifically designed production line that will be needed so that AR Wear can be available as soon as possible.

story:
The Radiation Shield™ is the ultimate protection accessory against hazardous radiation. 


Each of the Radiation Shield™ accessories is equipped with lead metal embedded inside the case. The Radiation Shield™ patent pending technology is a proven method for blocking radiation.

The lead layer is embedded inside the plastic case to block the radio-frequency waves from the phone. On top of the lead there is a clear separator layer, which seals the lead from a direct physical contact from the phone or the consumer.

 

Radiation Shield™ is currently offered for the following models:

PreOrder Sale of the Radiation Shield™

iPhone 4 & 4s Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
iPhone 5 Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
iPad Mini Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $30 (Retail $39.99)
iPad Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $35 (Retail $44.99)
Samsung Galaxy S3 Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
Samsung Galaxy S4 Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
Samsung Galaxy Note Radiation Shield™ Case: Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
Laptop Tray Radiation Shield™: Preorder Price $50 (Retail $59.99)

Warning: smartphones & other electronics are dangerous!

According to the FDA website, Radiation Emitting Products are “possibly carcinogenic to humans” That means smartphones, tablets and laptops might cause your body’s cells to deform and possibly develop cancer! Therefor everyone must protect themselves  from all electonic devices.

Source: FDA Website.

How does the Radiation Shield™ works?

The Radiation Shield™ is the ultimate way to protect your body from  hazardous radiation emitted from smartphones, tablet and laptops. The way it works is that each Radiation Shield™ product is embedded with a lead metal layer, which acts as a blocking agent against dangers electromagnetic waves. Another product which uses Lead, is an Xray apron which the doctors make you wear while performing an Xray on your body, so your body won’t get exposed to harmful rays. The Radiation Shield™ patent pending technology works exactly in the same way. So while you store your smartphone in your pocket have the Radiation Shield™ Case installed on your smartphone. Make sure that the case side is sitting inside your pocket,  closer to your body side, to maximize the Radiation Shield™ efficiency. This way the screen side is towards the outside surrounding, which still enables cellphone reception to take place, but clock that radiation from your body side.
On top of the lead layer there is another clear layer is embedded on top of the lead layer to avoid direct contact with the lead layer. In simpler words, the lead layer keeps radiation away from you and clear layer keeps led layer away from you. Despite of the presence of two layers in this case, it does not cause your smart gadget to stop sending or receiving data. In simpler words, you can use or work on your smart gadget behind double protective layers without any problem. Moreover, the Radiation Shield™ doesn’t have any harmful effect on the performance of your smart gadget. Your smart gadget will work with normal speed.

The Radiation Shield Dual Function

Radiation Shield serves 2 functional purposes. The main purpose of this smart gadget case is to block hazardous radiations. The Radiation Shield™ redistributes electromagnetic waves and sends them away from your body. It doesn’t interfere with the signals and your smart gadget’s antenna continues to work normally.
The secondary purpose, and not less important is that it can be used as a regular smart gadget case, as it protects your gadgets from daily grind and the occasional falls to the floor.


The Radiation Shield™ product line:

iPhone 4 / iPhone 4S Radiation Shield™ Case. Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
iPhone 5 Radiation Shield™ Case. Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
iPad Mini Radiation Shield™ Case. Preorder Price $30 (Retail $49.99)
iPad Radiation Shield™ Case. Price: Preorder Price $35 (Retail $44.99)
Samsung Galaxy S3 / Samsung Galaxy S4 Radiation Shield™ Case. Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
 
Samsung Galaxy Note Radiation Shield™ Case. Preorder Price $25 (Retail $34.99)
Laptop Tray Radiation Shield™ Case. Preorder Price $50 (Retail $59.99)
 

Protect yourself and order the Radiation Shield™ Today!

Shipping Worldwide!

 

Question & Answers

Does the Radiation Shield™ block cellphone signal?

the Radiation Shield™ does not interfere with the signals and your smart gadget’s antenna continues to work normally.

Is the Radiation Shield™ heavy?

Not at all, The Lead layer inside is thin, and doesn't add much weight to the smartphone itself.

story:
THE STORY

Inspired by an alternative way of life, modern Pinups and the spirit of a real rebel the name, which is a neologism of the words “ADORABLE“ and “REBEL”, came up.

After numerous creations finally our graceful STALLION was born. The STALLION represents the spirit of ADOREBEL. It stands for an alternative lifestyle and exceptional people who are passionate to express their wild side.

ADOREBEL is a sense of life representing freedom, self-will and authenticity.
For the starting phase we designed three T-Shirts which give a first impression of what you can expect for the future.

Since it is important to us that our clothes are manufactured under human conditions we decided to produce our Tees with controlled and certified manufacturers.


STALLION V1 - UNTAMED FORCE

The "STALLION V1" is an expressive V-Neck Tee made of fine cotton, refined with our ADOREBEL Logo of high-quality soft flock on the breast and a flocked ADOREBEL letterng on the left arm.

STALLION V1 - UNTAMED FORCE
Composition

95% Cotton, 5% Elastane




VANESSA – PURE ATTRACTION

Provocative V-Neck T-Shirt made of high quality synthetic fibre. The breast refined with a fine print of the most famous Pin-up beauties of our time.

VANESSA, the pure attraction of a blazing fire, no look can resist, is highlighted by a color-coordinated arm flock, an open edge finish of the V-Neck, the sleeves and the lower cuff.

A soft neckband and silk labels stand for a distinctive ADOREBEL Spirit ensuring highest wearing comfort.



VANESSA - PURE ATTRACTION
Composition
95% Polyester, 5% Elastane




ALLOY - HARD TO RESIST

Irresistible V-Neck T-Shirt made of high quality synthetic fibre. The breast refined with a fine print of the most sought-after Pin-up models of our time.

ALLOY is much more than just a seductive look. She is art of flesh and blood, burned into the fibres of sin, highlighted by a color-coordinated arm flock, an open edge finish of the V-Neck, the sleeves and the lower cuff.

A soft neckband and silk labels stand for a distinctive ADOREBEL Spirit ensuring highest wearing comfort.




ALLOY - HARD TO RESIST
Composition
95% Polyester, 5% Elastane


The pinup Tees “ALLOY” and “VANESSA” are so hot that they are limited to 1000 pcs world-wide!



LOURDES - SENSUAL PLEASURE

Extravagant Round Neck T-Shirt made of high quality synthetic fibre. The breast is refined with a fine print of another Pin-up Beauty of our time.

LOURDES radiates an incomparable sensuality. Her overall appearance gives the observer this indescribable and not explainable feeling.

The T-Shirt is highlighted by a color coordinated arm flock and the STALLION as a soft layer in the background.

LOURDES - SENSUAL PLEASURE is a Limited Edition to 500 pieces worldwide and currently only available on IndieGoGo.



LOURDES - SENSUAL PLEASURE
Composition
95% Polyester, 5% Elastane


We reveiced the most brilliant result at all Pin-up T-Shirts with high resolution and wthout a foreign body feeling through the combination of synthetic fibre and sublimation print.


ADOREBEL T-SHIRTS ARE UNISEX!


The authenticity of our Pin-up T-Shirts is guaranteed by a special code in the neck bend and a laser engraving in a high-quality dog tag.





ADOREBEL DOG TAG

Each Pin-up T-Shirt includes a DOG TAG made of stainless steel which is engraved with a unique code, our ADOREBEL lettering and the prominent Logo.

The code is your guarantee, that only the stated amount of the chosen design had been produced.

If you chose the DOG TAG Perk solely, you will get it without the unique code, which refers to the associated Pin-up T-Shirt, but only with the ADOREBEL Lettering on the one side and the Logo on the other.



ADOREBEL DOG TAG
Composition
Stainless Steel


MISSION

It is our mission to give Individualists the opportunity to express their selves through a breath-taking garment in an attention-getting manner. We want to use the best materials for our products while respecting our environment.

Why do we need your CA$H?

ADOREBEL is the essence of provocation, rebellion, individualism, charm and sex of urban life.

In the future we plan to design a high quality collection for DOLLS & REBELS with ADOREBEL Pants, Shoes, Shirts, Underwear, Accessories and Perfume as well.


As a foretaste of what is to come We are already presenting you the especially designed Logo for Dolls...



...and our first accessory

                       "THE STALLION CAP"



THE STALLION CAP
- FlexFit Cap -

We believe in the success of our brand therefore we would be very grateful if you' d become part of this vision by contributing our project and sharing it on social media channels. The more money we collect, the more we can provide you with new designs.

Thanks,
ADOREBEL. UNTAMED FORCE.


ABOUT ADOREBEL

ADOREBEL was founded in 2013 by Patrick and his co-founder Sebastian. Its headquarter is outside of Düsseldorf, Germany. Patrick and Sebastian made a creative team who wanted to create a new brand which is extremely influenced by modern Pin-ups, Burlesques and badass Rebels.

From the beginning a lot of passion and dedication flew into the creation of the new brand. ADOREBEL gives its wearer an extraordinary feeling and makes him point out from the crowd.


Every item we desgined shall inspire a person's imagination.



MILESTONES

October - December 2013:

  • IndieGoGo Campaign

December 2013 - January 2014:

  • Perks will be manufactured

January - March 2014:

  • Packaging of products
  • Delivery to customers worldwide



FAQs

How do I choose my size?
At the end of the campaign we will send you a request for size and shipping details.
Please consider that our T-Shirts are body-fit with a modern cut.

What are you raising the funds for?

Partially it´s a fund-raiser and partially a pre-order of our products.


When will I get my perk(s)?

STICKERS: Prospectively January 2014.

DOG TAG/ CAP: Prospectively February 2014.

STALLION/ ALLOY/ VANESSA: Prospectively February 2014.

LOURDES T-Shirt: Prospectively in March 2014.

story:
Meet the first innovation in sticky notes in over 40 years! Slickynotes are brightly colored, thin sheets of double-sided paper. Use any writing instrument on the colored side (just like traditional sticky notes) or flip to use with a dry erase marker! Erase and reuse as often as you like: one pad of Slickynotes lasts much longer than the old stickynotes. They're good for your wallet and for the Earth. 

Now you can have a whiteboard anywhere. Slickynotes stick to smooth surfaces like glass, doors, desks, wallpaper, drywall and more. Their stable electrostatic charge lets them stick for weeks (not just minutes or hours), but because they’re not made with harmful glues or adhesives, they’re also incredibly easy to slide around your work surface. Slickynotes move as fast as your ideas!
                  



With $10K, we’ll purchase a printer that will let us add color to the paper in house and reduce production costs by 40%. Printing in house will also let us reduce the retail cost of Slickynotes, making them more affordable. Our mission is to make sure everyone can upgrade their old sticky notes to a product that is environmental friendly, innovative and reusable.
 

My name is Nelson Pizarro. I founded EcoStatic, Inc. with my children because we wanted to make Slickynotes as an eco-friendly alternative to sticky notes. Slickynotes are made right here in the United States, and our family-run company is committed social, environmental and economic sustainability.

Socially, we pay our employees a fair, living wage and provide above-standard benefits. In addition, we’re committed to sharing our expertise and financial success in the communities across our commodity chains. Environmentally, we source our products from environmentally responsible manufacturers, foster the recycling of our products and promote sustainable business practices everywhere we do business. Economically, we strive to price our products to make them broadly accessible, while providing the income necessary to meet our commitments to our families and those of our employees—all while investing in the future of our business.

                                                       

Slickynotes are double sided, reusable on one side and come in all shapes and sizes. Slickynotes can be used with any writing implement and will stick to any smooth, dry surface. Slickynotes have a stable electrostatic charge that lasts for days. You can stick, re-stick and slide them around. 



Shipping within the United States has been included within the perk cost. International shipping will be calculated depending on your location. Towards the end of the campaign we will be reaching out to our wonderful international customers and sending them the estimated shipping cost for their purchase.

Feel free to reach out to us to get more information regarding this topic!

story:
PURPOSE

Hey It’s Sunny Fong from Project Runway Canada Season Two. Since the show I've re-launched my line VAWK (www.vawk.ca). I've showed at Toronto and Vancouver Fashion Weeks , Sold exclusive collections at The Room and the WhiteSpace at Hudsons Bay. Dressed celebrities like Katy Perry, Elisha Cuthbert, and Serena Ryder. Collaborated with luxury hotel Shangri-la and online giant eBay Canada. I've continue to work really hard at making this Luxury brand succeed in Canada and to bring the Canadian apparel market exciting and original designs.  Now, with your help, I can take bigger and bigger steps to making this brand a fan favourite beyond my Canadian borders!

I'm raising funds for

  • Our next presentation at Fashion week
  • Launch our first Online Store and redesign of existing website
  • Take our line abroad and present our brand to the global market.
  • Expand and grow our Canadian business


Most recent show at Toronto Fashion week March 17 2014


Our favourite shows at Toronto Fashion Week:




BENEFITS

With your support you will get exclusive and original items that only supporters of this campaign will receive. Help us and you'll get a exclusive VAWK piece(s). See below for how you can help.


IMPACT

Running a business on my own is has been the challenge in Canada and realizing the market is only so big, with your contribution, it will ignite the dream of turning VAWK, a Canadian Luxury brand to a global brand.


 

SPREAD THE WORD

Please spread the word and support the cause, use the Indiegogo share tools!


Thank you

story:
Video: 'The Story Of CARH" Indie GoGo project By Playback.net  Directed by Stacy Poulos 'Mountain In Me' By Kym Jessing Conductor; Larry Kriegbaum.


On Saturday, October 5, 2013 we will be hosting our 27th Annual Unique Fashion Show Fundraiser, "CARH's 40 Year Journey". The event will be held at the Greek Orthodox Church in Castro Valley, California. This fabulous event features local special needs models wearing contemporary and fashion forward outfits. We invite you to support our efforts in raising funds to put on this popular event while at the same time help us raise awareness of how important CARH's programs and services are for local citizens with intellectual disabilities by donating to CARH's campaign. CARH's Unique Fashion Show Fundraiser continues to be a vital part of CARH's programs which help foster the self-esteem, confidence and social skills needed by these special models.


 CARH, Inc. is an exciting and fast-growing 501(c)(3) non-profit organization providing a variety of services to those individuals with intellectual disabilities living in four Bay Area Counties. Our organization has been in your community for over 41 years. Your contribution will help support our following activities; bingo, movies, "A Wonderful You Day, picnics, special holiday dances, and much more!  All of these programs and services are designed to provide social and recreational opportunities for local children and adults with special needs.  When you see how bright the SMILES are on our clients faces when they attend these social events it is a priceless moment!!


Funds raised from this campaign will pay for the cost of putting on this year's Fashion Show and monies raised above our targeted amount will directly benefit local children and adults with intellectual disabilities by making sure that CARH's on going programs and services will continue to be funded. During these difficult economic times we have had to cut some of our popular activities and services and in order for us to bring these programs back we need your help!


Thank you for stopping by our campaign page and we hope that we can count on your support for this very worthwhile community event. Our Tax ID # is 94-2156307.


CARH recently received the Jefferson Award for Public Service from KPIX, Channel 5.  We are extremely honored by this recognition and welcome your support and contribution to our special cause. Visit our website, www.carh-inc.org to view an entertaining video of why CARH's founder was recognized for her extraordinary contribution to the disabled community. 

We have seen many new friendships develop and the confidence that evolves from the social event gatherings that they attend at CARH are amazing.  Our goal is to reach $7, 000 to help offset the costs associated with putting on our heartwarming Fashion Show event and as stated earlier any funds raised beyond $7,000 will go directly to support CARH's other programs. CARH is a non-profit organization and all of our funding is raised from private donors such as you. We do not receive any State or Government funding and depend exclusively on the generosity of our community members.  If you can’t make a contribution today that’s okay we will connect again at another time.  Please share this campaign with your family and friends and help us help those in our community with special needs.

story:
As featured on:

                      


Get a FREE pair of Sets when you share this campaign with your friends! Details here


Sets are custom sunglasses with interchangeable side arms and are guaranteed for life.  The unique design of our frames allow you to quickly and easily change color combinations to customize your sunglasses however you want, whenever you want.

Our classic frame style comes with polarized lenses and is offered at a special Indiegogo campaign price of $45 with free U.S. shipping.  Pre-order your very first pair of Sets today by selecting from one of our perks to the right!


Our quick release, stainless steel hinge design allows you to change color combinations in a matter of seconds to customize your sunglasses for any situation.  No tools required - changing side arms is done with the push of a button. 

We designed Sets with everyone in mind: Want to own the perfect pair of sunglasses to match any outfit?  Want to show support for your favorite sports team through a great pair of sunglasses?  Simply want to have the freedom to create the perfect pair of sunglasses without having to spend a fortune?  Sets has you covered with just one pair and your choice of side arm colors.  


We spent more than one year sourcing materials from around the world until we found the perfect combination to create a durable, reliable pair of sunglasses with the versatility to customize them again and again.


The Hinge: Made from stainless steel and has the polished look of a standard sunglasses hinge yet gives you the freedom to detach and change side arm colors. 

The Frames: We use a high quality injection molded polycarbonate material that creates a durable, lightweight frame.  Our 100% original, classic frame style is inspired by the Wayfarer design and gives you the look and feel you’d expect from higher priced sunglasses.

The Lenses: Polarized and UV 400 protection lets you see the world in rich, vivid colors while protecting your eyes from harmful UV light.  We also included a dual-sided scratch resistant coating to protect your Sets from any of life’s adventures.

Simply put, Sets are built to last and designed to go wherever you may take them. And the best part, every pair of Sets comes with a lifetime guarantee.


  

Sets' Indiegogo launch collection offers 12 frames in unisex fit and 12 different interchangeable side colors.  Every pair of Sets purchased on Indiegogo comes with at least one additional pair of side arms to ensure you can create your perfect look.

You will choose your color combinations at the end of the campaign.  We can customize lens color on any frame for only $5 more.  


We're committed to giving back to ocean conservation efforts around the globe, and believe strongly in our mission.  Every pair purchased helps to protect and save vital marine life,  such as sea turtles, dolphins, sharks, and whales.  

                                 

 


The initial response to our product samples has been incredible, but we still need your support to help fund our first full product run.  Here is how you can support our campaign and get your hands on one of the very first pairs of Sets:
1) Choose from one of the perks on the right to pre-order Sets at the special Indiegogo discount price.  
2) On the next page, enter your shipping information and payment details.  Note: If you'd like to contribute extra on the perk you've selected please change the number above.  For every incremental $5 contributed we'll give you an additional pair of arms.  
3) Complete payment via credit/debit card or PayPal.  These funds will allow us to begin a full production run.
4) We plan to deliver our first shipment of Sets by the end of September 2014.


What will my Sets order come with?

Each Indiegogo order comes with a custom pair of Sets, an additional pair of arms in the color of your choice, Sets branded microfiber sleeve, branded shipping/storage box, and a Sets brand sticker.  Specific quantity of each element depends on your funding level.

How do I change the side arms?

Changing side arms is easy. Simply press the quick release hinge button and pull gently to remove. Then select a different color pair of arms, align the hinges, and press in until you hear them lock into place.

How and when do I choose the color of my Sets?

After the campaign is completed you will get an email asking your color preferences. You can then choose the colors of your arms and frames.

What size are the frames?

Sets come in one size that is made to fit both men and women.  The eye is 55mm, the bridge is 19mm, and the side arm is 143mm.  

When will I get my Sets?

Our goal is to deliver Sets to you by October.  We're confident in ourselves and our products, but recognize that the manufacturing process may present some delays depending on volume of orders. 

Do you offer non-polarized sunglasses?

Yes, we will have a limited number of non-polarized sunglasses.  Please make this request in the comments section of your Indiegogo purchase and we will be happy to ship you non-polarized sunglasses.  No discounts offered.

Do you ship internationally?

We ship Sets anywhere in the world, however, we cannot offer free shipping on international orders.  Please add $10 for international shipping.


Say hello: team@setslife.com 

Drop us a line with any questions, comment, or ideas you might have.  We are excited to get feedback for new colors and styles and to build the Sets community.

 

Press: press@setslife.com


From all of us,  a huge thanks for checking out our campaign.  Please help to keep the momentum going by sharing Sets with your friends,  we'd greatly appreciate it!
Jeff, Chris, and Brandon
