story:
Making it Happen!  

"Someone, at some point, came up with this very bad idea that an ordinary individual couldn't make a difference in the world"...Jeff Skoll, Founder Ebay and Skoll Foundation 

We are TRIBE of LAMBS! A new online retail space committed to providing one of a kind (and totally awesome) products to our consumers. We're encouraging conscious shopping and sparking compassion in our suppliers, customers and beneficiaries...and actually, anyone who comes our way. 

Our full circle business model can be broken down into three easy parts;

  1. In the interest of building relationships and supporting economies in more rural communities, we seek out artisans and small business owners producing unique fair trade products, which include jewellery, leather goods, clothing, textiles and home wares. We will be working together to invest in both artisan designed products as well as doing some custom designing of our own. 
  2. Once our orders have been carefully selected to suit our market and customer needs, we make the products available globally through our stylish, user friendly and customer engaged web store. 
  3. Proceeds from each item will then be redistributed back into the community, which it came from, through partnerships with established and local run, non government organizations reaching at risk children. As a result of collaborating on smaller and measurable projects with these NGO's, we can successfully aid in the protection, education, development and nourishment that every child deserves.
We're kicking it all off right here in the Himalayas in the Northern Indian province of Himachal Pradesh. Once we've gained momentum with this location, we can continue to grow and spread love far and wide. 
  • The talented craftsmen and ambitious business owners have been sought out, are excited to be involved in our vision and are eagerly awaiting first orders from us. 
  • We've partnered up with the Vashisht Children's Ashram and Sudeshana's Children's home, both near Manali, Himachal Pradesh. These extraordinary organisations are aiding orphaned or abandoned children with limited or NO funding and are grateful to be the first beneficiaries of our business.  
  • The magnitude of your generous donation will not only be helping us gain the seed capital necessary to launch our business but you also be aiding in the purchase of new winter jackets and boots (as well as underwear and sanitary napkins) for these 52 Children in the homes mentioned above. 

What We Need & What You Get!

"Nothing important happens in life without a cost"...Jacqueline Novogratz, Founder and Ceo Acumen Fund

Seed Capital + Winter Clothes = Custom REWARDS! 

Let's break it down for you, WE NEED:

  1. $2500 - Merchandise orders and delivery: A  small initial investment to get our shop rolling and our customers smiling. 
  2. $2500 - Website design and development: We need to build a super fab, creative and customer friendly website and store with our friends at Superfein Creative Studio  
  3. $500 - Towards product photography and packaging: Because seeing and receiving is fun too! 
  4. $1325 + -Vashisht Children's Ashram & Mrs. Sudeshana's Children's Home:  Regardless of how much is raised, $1325 of our funding will buy 32 children at Sudeshana's  and 20 Children at Vashisht warm clothes for the Himalayan winter ahead. We aren't the only ones who want to feel AND look good!
PERKS for Donating?! Sounds great doesn't it? Check out our rewards which the Tribe of Lambs team custom designed here in Northern India for our crowd funding campaign. We've partnered up with some of the best jewellers, leather smiths, knitters and dyers in the area to  gift you something special. Make sure to check out our video which follows our founder Bobbi Paidel, in her search for the perfect perks. Want to donate but don't see anything you fancy? Get in touch and we'll see about getting you the right treat for your generosity. 


The Impact!

“Humanity’s greatest advances are not in its discoveries, but in how those discoveries are applied to reduce inequity.” ... Bill Gates, Founder Gates Foundation
Your contribution will make a difference! 
  • This project is valuable to you through participating in a new wave of shopping, engaging, sharing and thinking. The value also lies in supporting global communities as the world is plentiful yet resources and monetary support are lacking. It is only through togetherness that will create the world that we want to live in and share.  
  • Our team is built up of professionals and philanthropists in fashion, administration, creative design and education and are devoted to using their valuable skills to aid in social change.   
  • We are 100% committed to keeping you involved and up to date on the impact we are making in the lives of others. Through detailed information and personal stories on our artisans and team members, partnerships and travels you are given assurance that your contribution is being directed and applied immediately to the campaign goals. 


No one said it would be easy! 

"Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to loose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart"...Steve Jobs, Founder Apple Inc. 

Lets be real, with any big investment comes big risk and of course many challenges.  

  • Through anticipating the financial, operational, strategic, compliance and political demands involved in starting up a social enterprise, we are working to embed a culture of risk management into our business model. 
  • We are learning too! Believing in a vision isn't always enough. Through keeping our team engaged in the global community and building our network, we are able to seek assistance in areas which we are lacking.
  • We are full believers that the potential to succeed and the determination to make a difference greatly outweighs any challenge ahead. 


Last but not least!

"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world; indeed it's the only thing that ever has"...Margaret Mead, Anthropologist

Everybody has something to contribute! 

  • We know not everyone is able to donate, but we appreciate your support in spreading our vision with those who can. 
  • Please take a view minutes to share our video, tell a friend, call your Grandma and if nothing else just do good in the world! Be inspired! We love you!

story:
The InDent Watchcase is today’s most innovative smart phone case created for the iPhone 5, 5s, 6, 6+  models. It is sure to be a conversation piece when you show it to your friends. This innovative, durable case features one of many distinctive watch pieces that function independently from all phone applications. The InDent Watchcase offers you: 

  • A solid, durable construction for enhanced protection of your phone. Protective bumper guards will protect the phone and the watch.
  • A case design that allows instant access to the time even if your phone battery dies.
  • A watch that can be viewed at any time without disrupting any social or business meeting situations.
  • Preservation of the phone’s battery life because you no longer need to turn on your phone to check the time.
  • The “Nite Touch” feature that offers light for night viewing; ALL of the watchcases will have the Nite Touch feature!
  • Multiple, stylish graphics appealing to your individual taste. The graphic Collection designs will be available on all phone models that we offer. 

Traditional watch elegance with awesome graphic options integrated in a durable case…..

Welcome to the world of the InDent Watchcase!


From the "Classic Clocks" Collection - the Big Ben (with the Nite Touch feature shown; available on all Collection styles) and Horoscope cases  (iPhone 5 version)



_________________________________________________

“InDent Watchcase’s Vision is to merge the simplicity of the traditional watch with an iPhone protective case, while providing a useful function and elegant designs that are unique to you. As a distinctive statement piece, it shows we are never afraid to color outside the lines." 

_________________________________________________


From the "Designer" Collection 

Sport  (iPhone 6 version)

Gold (iPhone 5 version)


Lucent (iPhone 5 version)


Why the InDent Watchcase?  

We decided it was time to add pizazz to the functionality of today’s iPhone cases! Inspired by the modern watch craze, we created the InDent Watchcase by working closely with designers to integrate a self-contained watch into the back cover of an iPhone case. This beautifully designed watch piece makes it easier to check the time without having to turn on your phone, which just wastes valuable phone battery and interrupts your social or business meetings. Now you can check the time whenever you want because the InDent Watchcase is not only beautiful and stylish, it also expands the functionality of your phone case!

The InDent Watchcase comes with many distinctive and beautiful design options within 5 different collections: Nature, Spiritual, Classic Clocks and the Designer Collections . You may contribute to our campaign and receive one or more of these designs in the Perks section of our campaign. We will be expanding on these as we grow! 

Once you receive your InDent Watchcase, please let us know what you think. We also welcome any design and functionality ideas that you may have. Thanks for your time and interest in the InDent Watchcase!


From the "Spiritual" Collection - the iChing and Yantra cases (Both iPhone 5  versions)


From the "Nature Collection" - SunSurf (iPhone 5 version)


From the "Art Collection": V-Man (iPhone 5 version)


Use of Funds

All of our funds will go to expenses directly associated with design, production and delivery of the InDent Watchcases to our intial customers. 


"On the Street" 

What people are saying about us!


 "Cell Phone" Regional Store Manager - Very Innovative - Nothing Like It!
Monte Blanc Salesperson - Trendy/Edgy... I Love It!
Apple Phone Repairman - Checking Time All of the Time!

Project Schedule 


Grab your T

FAQs

1. Time of delivery –  Our plan is to ship the case to our supporters in the 3rd or 4th quarter of this year.

2. Warranty – We will have a limited manufacturing warranty if the InDent Watchcase is broken during shipping. 

3. Choice of graphics – We’ll introduce new collections of graphics to select from, always trying to create “out of the box” designs. 

4. Battery – The InDent Watchcase is powered by a long-life battery that is easily replaced. 

5. Time change – The InDent Watchcase has its own stem and crown to allow you to change the time when needed. 

6. Durability – We are selecting high standard watch components that have proven durability. 

7. Case –Our case will be designed with protective bumper guards to protect both the watch and your phone. 

8. Functions independent of iPhone – The InDent Watchcase does not rely on iPhone apps or power; it is totally independent. 

9. Future models – We are initially releasing iPhone 5, 5s and 6 models. We will also release a 6+ model as market demand grows.


Risks

We feel very good about the acceptance of the InDent Watchcase but there are risks. These risks include, but are not limited to:

·  Market Acceptance – while we have completed substantial market research, there is no guarantee that the InDent Watchcase will have broad acceptance.

·  Working Capital Requirements – there may be large working capital requirements which will require a more substantial capital investment. 

·  Distribution –  There is no guarantee that our targeted channels will be willing to partner with InDent Watchcase.

·  Patent Protection – we have applied for and have certification for both Design and Utility patents. 

·  Competition – there is no guarantee that others will not introduce concepts similar to InDent Watchcase’s.

·  Pricing – we are assuming certain prices for our products but have no assurance that the market will accept these pricing assumptions.

·  Production Schedule – unknown design or production issues could delay the introduction of our products. 

______________________________________________________________________

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn our Indent Watchcase into a reality by sharing this campaign with your family & friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and  let the world know about our awesome campaign..

story:
BUILDING THE FUTURE.

DIGITAL SOCIETY.

EVERYTHING IS BETA.

 

THIS IS ALL EXPERIMENTAL.

I DO STRONGLY BELIEVE,

THAT EVERYTHING CAN BE IMPROVED,

EVERYTHING CAN BE BETTER!

 

The web of today is in a state of BETA.

Everything Buggy. Usability nightmares. Confusion.

 

Basic design: non existent.

Burried in clutter and noise of the "free web" ... ads. irrelevance.

 

Build from a mindset of "goldrush", problems introduced, the web got "sick".

 

Cures where offered. closed alternatives: flash.

Now today, everyone seeks the cure in facebook. it is not.

 

THE WEB MUST BE FREE. IT MUST BE OPEN.

it must also work and not waste our lifes.

Rather than turning us into fools, It should enrich us.

there is a responsibility.

 

PART 1: AWARENESS. We can do better!

 

ioxit™ technology is at the heart of the Everything Beta program, an exploration of our state of mind. All software is a reflection of our thinking.

All design is improvement or enhancement thinking.

 

Everything Beta can offer a collaborative prototyping / production environment with back office service for custom code and high end media production service based in Berlin, Germany.

Level 1: Send a Signal - contribute!

story:
Introducing the SYKLA Model ONE - The Elegant Smart Watch


Have you ever asked yourself - Why are all the current smart watches ugly as sin??  Ya, I have too… Let’s talk about how Sykla brings a fresh perspective to making smart watches.

Hello! My name is Reza, and I am the founder of Sykla. I have always loved technology and new innovations. I have been involved with a few different tech start-ups throughout my career, so I am no stranger to the manufacturing and development process. That’s why I was so excited last year when we started to see smart watch technology evolve and begin to gain mass adoption. 

However I looked at the smart watches available and honestly could never see myself wearing any of those oversized computers in public. They were hideous! As the year went on I was tired of seeing release after release of the same old smart watches that didn't inspire or look beautiful like the beloved classic timepieces from Tag Heuer, Hamilton or Nomos. The art of watch making was never about packing as many FEATURES into your watch that you can fit, so why do smart watch manufacturers feel the need to compete on features – camera, wifi, 3G, memory cards, video playback, etc, etc, etc.

I loved the idea of a smart watch where I can quickly and at a glance see who’s calling without having to remove my huge and lovely Samsung Note from my pocket.  But the smart watches on the market were… ugly.  And usually you need to press a button or shake your arm furiously to see the time which impedes the main purpose of wearing a watch.  Why can’t we have a beautiful and artistic time piece that just happens to be SMART?

Enter the Sykla Model ONE.  



The Sykla Model ONE was thoughtfully designed by our experienced manufacturing partner from the ground up to be an elegant time piece that you will LOVE to show off on your wrist. From the sharp and bold lines reminiscent of a luxury sports car, to the soft and supple band that whiffs of the familiar and pleasant scent of genuine leather – the Model ONE is a fine time instrument that you will find yourself admiring throughout the day. You will need to get used to receiving compliments and questions from all your peers. 

The most unique thing about our Sykla Model ONE is that it’s always ON. Just glance down at your watch and you’ll see the time, no fussing about. We are confident that you will quickly find the watch as a useful and dependable companion, and you’ll soon wonder how you ever lived without it.

Here are some of the most amazing and unique features:

- Compatible with both Android (Samsung, LG, HTC, etc) and Apple devices

- “Always On” technology adopts a special translucent TFT screen which can display the clock face all the time, even when the smart watch is in stand-by

- Integrated microphone and speaker for taking phone calls on your wrist

- Voice control compatible with Google Now and Apple Siri

- Up to 2 to 3 days of battery life

- Replaceable leather straps with your choice of soft genuine calf skin, gator skin or snake skin.

- Waterproof at IP67 level with protection against complete submersion in water

- Heart rate and step monitor to promote a healthy lifestyle



Progress pictures during development process:

Original Sketch


Chipset Selected (MTK6250)


Battery Selected (400 mAh)


Render

Prototype


Working Prototype



Where are we at today?

We are pleased to let you know that we have privately funded and completed the initial required costs to develop the hardware and software for the watch.  All the tooling and programming has been completed.  The software testing including QA testing has been completed. We have a working prototype that is available for demonstration and we are posting videos of the functionality shortly.


What is left to accomplish?

We need to complete the following tasks and need your help for this:

- Identify accessory manufacturer for accessories that will accompany the device such as leather watch straps styles/colors, metal clasp types, and USB cable
- Complete the documentation including user manual and FAQs
- Hire package designer and complete the retail package design
- Complete manufacturing of initial 300 units for IndieGoGo Backers and to be sent to distribution chains for promotion.
- We NEED your help to get these watches through the manufacturing process. We have been promised it will take only 2 weeks to complete the manufacturing since all the materials have been ordered and are ready. 


- If there is no DEMAND for this Elegant Smart Watch we can't justify moving forward with the project. I hope my instincts are correct and the world is waiting for a beautiful smart watch like what we have created...



Gift Options for Backers:

Core Supporter

Your choice of Sykla Model ONE in brushed silver or anthracite gray (see pic above).  Standard genuine leather strap in black, brown or tan.  Stainless steel “D” clasp.

Premium Supporter

Your choice of Sykla Model ONE in brushed silver or anthracite gray.  Premium gator or snake skin leather strap in black, brown or white.  Stainless steel “D” clasp with Sykla logo.

Limited Edition Supporter

Your choice of Sykla Model ONE in brushed silver or anthracite gray.  Premium gator or snake skin leather strap in black, brown or white. Stainless steel butterfly clasp with Sykla logo.


When will the IndieGoGo Backers receive the watch?

We are hoping to ship by December 19th 2014 in time for receiving before Christmas.  We will be shipping via FedEx Express in the USA, and UPS Express to Canada, and USPS Priority Express to overseas.
story_txt:
Introducing the SYKLA Model ONE - The Elegant Smart Watch
Have you ever asked
yourself - Why are all the current smart
watches ugly as sin??  Ya, I have too…
Let’s talk about how Sykla brings a fresh perspective to making smart watches.

Hello! My name is Reza, and
I am the founder of Sykla. I have always loved technology and new innovations.
I have been involved with a few different tech start-ups throughout my career,
so I am no stranger to the manufacturing and development process. That’s why I
was so excited last year when we started to see smart watch technology evolve
and begin to gain mass adoption. 

However I looked at the
smart watches available and honestly could never
see myself wearing any of those oversized computers in public. They were
hideous! As the year went on I was tired of seeing release after release of the
same old smart watches that didn't inspire or look beautiful like the beloved classic
timepieces from Tag Heuer, Hamilton or Nomos. The art of watch making was never
about packing as many FEATURES into your watch that you can fit, so why do
smart watch manufacturers feel the need to compete on features – camera, wifi,
3G, memory cards, video playback, etc, etc, etc.
I loved the idea of a smart
watch where I can quickly and at a glance see who’s calling without having to
remove my huge and lovely Samsung Note from my pocket.  But the smart
watches on the market were… ugly.
 And usually you need to press a button or shake your arm furiously to see
the time which impedes the main purpose of wearing a watch.  Why can’t we have a beautiful and artistic
time piece that just happens to be SMART?
Enter the Sykla Model ONE.  

The Sykla Model ONE was thoughtfully
designed by our experienced manufacturing partner from the ground up to be an elegant
time piece that you will LOVE to show off on your wrist. From the sharp and
bold lines reminiscent of a luxury sports car, to the soft and supple band that
whiffs of the familiar and pleasant scent of genuine leather – the Model ONE is
a fine time instrument that you will find yourself admiring throughout the day.
You will need to get used to receiving compliments and questions from all your
peers.  
The most unique thing about
our Sykla Model ONE is that it’s always ON. Just glance down at your watch and
you’ll see the time, no fussing about. We are confident that you will quickly
find the watch as a useful and dependable companion, and you’ll soon wonder how
you ever lived without it. 

Here are some of the most amazing and unique features:
- Compatible with both Android (Samsung, LG, HTC, etc) and Apple devices
- “Always On” technology
adopts a special translucent TFT screen which can display the clock face all
the time, even when the smart watch is in stand-by
- Integrated microphone and
speaker for taking phone calls on your wrist
- Voice control compatible
with Google Now and Apple Siri
- Up to 2 to 3 days of
battery life
- Replaceable leather
straps with your choice of soft genuine calf skin, gator skin or snake skin.
- Waterproof at IP67 level
with protection against complete submersion in water
- Heart rate and step monitor
to promote a healthy lifestyle


Progress pictures during development process:Original SketchChipset Selected (MTK6250)
Battery Selected (400 mAh)Render
Prototype


Working Prototype


Where are we at today?
We are pleased to let you
know that we have privately funded and completed the initial required costs to develop the hardware and software for the watch.  All the tooling and programming has been
completed.  The software testing
including QA testing has been completed. We have a working prototype that is available for demonstration and we are posting videos of the functionality
shortly.

What is left to accomplish?
We need to complete the
following tasks and need your help for this:
- Identify accessory manufacturer for accessories that
will accompany the device such as leather watch straps styles/colors, metal
clasp types, and USB cable
- Complete the documentation including user manual and FAQs
- Hire package designer and complete the retail package design
- Complete manufacturing of initial 300 units for IndieGoGo Backers and to be
sent to distribution chains for promotion.- We NEED your help to get these watches through the manufacturing process. We have been promised it will take only 2 weeks to complete the manufacturing since all the materials have been ordered and are ready. - If there is no DEMAND for this Elegant Smart Watch we can't justify moving forward with the project. I hope my instincts are correct and the world is waiting for a beautiful smart watch like what we have created...

Gift Options for Backers:
Core Supporter
Your choice of Sykla Model
ONE in brushed silver or anthracite gray (see pic above). 
Standard genuine leather strap in black, brown or tan.  Stainless steel “D” clasp.
Premium Supporter 
Your choice of Sykla Model
ONE in brushed silver or anthracite gray. 
Premium gator or snake skin leather strap in black, brown or white.  Stainless steel “D” clasp with Sykla logo.
Limited Edition Supporter
Your choice of Sykla Model
ONE in brushed silver or anthracite gray. 
Premium gator or snake skin leather strap in black, brown or white.
Stainless steel butterfly clasp with Sykla logo.

When will the IndieGoGo Backers receive the watch?
We are hoping to ship by
December 19th 2014 in time for receiving before Christmas.  We will be shipping via FedEx Express in the
USA, and UPS Express to Canada, and USPS Priority Express to overseas.

story:
Our Big Debut

Threads Collective is a senior showcase for the inaugural class of Fashion and Textile Design at NC State.  As the first graduating class in this major, we want to start off the tradition with a bang. The past four years we have been everything from fiber nerds to computer geeks to our friends' personal seamstresses, and it is finally our time to show the world how we bring it all together in one fantastic fashion show and exhibition. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our budget for the show is $15,000 which seems like a lot, but when you break it down it's really a bargain. This price tag includes the catwalk, runway set up and take down, lights, reception, exhibition displays, photography, hair and makeup, music, decorations, programs, tiny cookies for our models to eat backstage...and other supplies. We like to think of ourselves as crafty people, but even we can't build a stage and do electrical work... which is where you come in!

Based on the level of donation, we have perks from tickets to the show to screen printed canvas bags made by yours truly and even tours of the College of Textiles. From the hand looms older than our textile designers to the windowless dungeon studio that our fashion designers call home, you could see where all the magic happens! You can even support us by coming to our show on April 18th at 7 PM at the NC State College of Textiles and meet all of our parents. 


The Legacy Begins

This show is a huge deal for us and something we have been working toward since we first picked up our first hand needle. This is our shot to present the great things happening at the College of Textiles. Even on snow days and most Saturday nights, we are here, at studio, in sweatpants, working on our collections. Furthermore, it is our chance to show industry personnel all the different skill sets and experience we have to offer. Generations upon generations of other Fashion and Textile Design students will look back on this night as the one that started it all. We want to give them something splendid to look back upon. 


The Risks & Challenges

As the first class to take on this new endeavor, we are setting the precedent for years to come with nowhere to go but up. We have been charged with raising the funds independently. This means if we want something other than the vintage 80's carpet as our catwalk and our grandmothers sitting cross legged on the floor, then we need your help. 

Other Ways You Can Help!

As broke college kids, we understand that everyone can't donate to every amazing cause that they would like to. However, we would so appreciate your support through sending this link to all your friends, family, and everyone you have ever known. We also have sweet Facebook and Instagram pages that are yours for the liking. 

Also if you live in the Raleigh- Durham area, please come out to see our show and tell your entire workplace how awesome your Saturday night is going to be.

story:
This campaign is part of a campaign of Enviu. Check our current total amount raised at  http://enviu.org/our-work/chakardi/!

CHALLENGE

Indian salt-farmers live in very poor conditions. Firstly, producing salt is a tough job. Farmers have to pump up seawater from the sea onto their fields. To do this, they mainly use hand pumps. Imagine using a hand pump for about eight hours...everyday!

Next to that, salt farmers receive extremely low prices for their salt. Since large-scale factories are rising, farmers are forced to sell their salt to exploiting salt traders. These traders offer a little as € 0.002 for one kilogram! The salt farmers have no opportunity to sell their salt to other outlets, because they have no clue how to do this. So, that’s why we’re gonna help them!

 

SOLUTION

India’s middle and upper class is developing rapidly. These modern-minded consumers want to buy trendy products, but at the moment they can only get old-fashioned 1 kg salt bags. Which actually is a great opportunity for us! Our aim is to launch the first modern fair-trade salt brand in India: Chakardi. We will package our salt in trendy bags, sprinklers and grinders and sell it for a higher price. With the profit we generate, we can pay the farmers a fair price for their salt. Also, we will finance locally developed wind- and solar pumps, which will reduce the drudgery of the farmers.

 

CURRENT STATUS

Our first 3,000 bags have already been produced and sold! Within 3 days, we sold all our salt at an Indian Food Fair. Now, we want to take this project to the next step. We want to produce and test different types of packaging. By doing so, we will be able to develop the optimal product for the Indian market. To do this, we need your help!

For more information please check http://enviu.org/our-work/chakardi/ 
and like us on facebook http://on.fb.me/14qU8Dy!

story:
www.sophireaptress.com

IG:@sophireaptress

http://www.lingeriefw.com/

#Sophireaptress


Short Summary

Hi! My name is Sophi and I run a small label call Sophireaptress designs. 

I was born in Taiwan but grew up in South America (Venezuela). Ending up here in the U.S.A. where my journey started!  I have had my label about a year now and many good things have happened since then and can't wait for more!

I was asked to participate in New York Lingerie Fashion week which is a big opportunity for me to show everyone my work and I am very honor too. But I need your help! Every little bit helps and spreading the word in any way would be greatly appreciated.


What We Need & What You Get

I need $3,000 to be able to participate at this event which the deadline is on December 15th including transportation to New York, cost of materials, and other expenses to accomplish the show.  

I am very excited to make everyone their rewards because I will be very thankful that you could help me and I really need your support and i truly appreciate that!

Note that all items are handmade and not mass produced in factories which makes every piece very special.  I will keep you posted in your rewards!


The Impact

I just finished up a very successful event at the Philadelphia Museum of Art which was the annual PMA craft show held at the Convention Center of Philadelphia.  I am also part of a Co-op designer store in Fishtown Philadelphia called Toile Atelier and I am participating in a traveling pop up shop that includes a number of independent designers from all around the world called From the Black Lodge. 

If I can make this goal I would be able to take part in Lingerie Fashion week which will open more doors and opportunities for me to grow :) 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please remember to share this on facebook, twitter, instagram, tumblr, e-mail,
word of mouth or any other way you can think of to spread the word.
I realize that not everyone can support this project financially, but sharing this
project is just as important!


PERKS!!! 
ALL PERKS ARE SHIPPING INCLUDED ;) 

GRIMREAPER (UNISEX)

LEGGINGS 

LONG SLEEVE GRIMREAPER (UNISEX)

FOXY CROP

story:
Bagline sté 

 Est une petite entreprise locale située dans le canton de Neuchâtel  dépuis 2008.Sa création a démarré à Genève en 2004.Principale  activité, création & vente d'accessoires fashion en cuir de qualité sur  le net.

                                       Nos partenaires:

Parcours personnel

Je suis diplômée de la chambre de Commerce de Paris. (Les Ateliers Grégoires-Ferrandi) maroquinerie de luxe. www.lafabrique-ecole.fr

Cette formation m'inspire toujours en m'apportant de nouveaux horizons à explorer à chaque fois.Nous venons donc de rajouter à notre gamme initiale une ligne de sacs à main pour femme.Matière carbone plastique de haute qualité qui saura accompagner les montres LED.

Nous y croyons fortement après test auprès de notre clientèle habituelle.C'est un succès.La décision à l'idée de produire  les montres LED avec notre logo est devenue évidente faire de cette campagne, une réalité.Produire une ligne de montre LED touche digitale Screen Tactile conçue et fabriquée  en France ( Garantie 5 ans).

Ces montres bénéficient d'une technologie de haute qualité.La plaque du cadran miroir plexiglas accentue fortement une consommation energétique en  LED.

                                  bgmv-watches.

C'est un projet visant à developper une ligne de montre indépendante et à la fois communautaire.Distinguez-vous avec la montre LED ligne unisexe,design moderne facile à utiliser.Une touche tactile sur écran permet d'ouvrir et d'acceder aux fonctions.Spécialement conçue pour avoir un éffet décontractant energisant.

 Bracelet ultra doux sécuritaire jusqu'à 10 crans 2.8 cm de largeur forme carrée 40 mm.Poids 64 g.pile incluse modèle (CR2025)Résistante à l'eau : 1ATM,épaisseur 1 cm,longeur de la bande 23.7 cm.largeur du bracelet 2.8 cm.Batterie 15-18 mois.Mouvement japonais.

Fonctionnement:

Appuyez sur l'écran jusqu'à ce que les touches clignotent.Reglez l'heure en caressant l'écran de gauche à droite.

Puis appuyer sur le côté gauche du cadran jusqu'à ce que les chiffres des minutes clignotent....Reglez les minutes en caressant l'ecran de la gauche vers la droite.

Tapotez l'écran pour afficher la date,appuyez ensuite sur le côté gauche de l'écran jusqu'à ce que le chiffre de la date clignote....Reglez la date!


L'impact:

Les montres sont déclinées en différentes couleurs soutenant 7 causes.De gauche vers la droite positionnées par numéro d'ordre.De la plus flashy à la plus sobre,distinguez-vous selon vos tenues avec le pack de couleur.Votre contribution soutiendra donc la montre dont la cause vous semble plus à votre goût.Lorsque vous soutenez notre projet,vous achetez des produits simples.Je dirais un geste charitable & grandiose à la fois pour nous tous.

             Chaque contribution est associée à une cause spécifique                              

1 Bleu:      Repas pour les sans-abris en Hospice. www.armeedusalut.ch 

2 Vert:       Insertion sans-abris.  www.armeedusalut.ch

3 Marron:  Protection des enfants  www.partag.org

4 Jaune:    ( lutte contre la mendicité ). www.fondationcaritasfrance.org

5 Noire:      prévention des malades neuro-moteurs.  www.ilavigny.ch

6 Orange   Soins apporté aux sans-abris.  www.armeedusalut.ch

7 Blanche:  Education-formation-hébergement.  www.ilavigny.ch

Vous contribuez pour soutenir nos actions en échange,il y'a des contreparties avec nous à gagner.Si notre objectif est largement  atteint ce qui serait vraiement formidable pour qu'ensemble on puisse faire bouger un peu les choses en mettant l'accent sur le bien social.Des nouvelles de ces actions pourraient être partagées avec les contributeurs s'il le souhaitent.Comme je suis toujours impliquée dans différentes causes humanitaires cette campagne est importante à mes yeux pour lever des fonds.Par exemple:

Quand vous contribuez pour 2 montres. bleue & autre coloris

Votre contribution est justifiée: $ 19 < soutien 2 repas > chez les  sans-abris.Le plus important c'est de devoir pouvoir continuer à faire mes petits dons envers les démunis,les malades etc...

Financement:

$ 1500  n'est qu'une fraction.Cela represente mon apport personnel apporté dans cette campagne si j'atteignais pas mon objectif.Cette  campagne est primordiale pour le soutien que j'attend afin de voir le projet devenir réalité.Mon objectif est d'atteindre au moins $ 25000  ou voir dépasser mon objectif.Capacité d'approvisionnement imposée par le fabricant:dès 3000/pièces minimum.Personnalisation des emballages dont coffret + logo (impression à déterminer).500/pièces par colissage de 20 kg par carton.Dès 3000/pièces me fait  bénéficier du tarif dégressif sur l'ensemble du lot. Directement calculé à la pièce.Dans cette situation,la remise globale convertie en gain servira aussi à amenager un espace de stockage déjà disponible dans un dépot avec porte sécurisée.

Contreparties:

Ce que vous obtenez en apportant votre soutien pour cette campagne ce sont nos montres LED magic touch sreen digitale relaxante tant energisante en campagne pour Indiegogo.Quand vous nous soutenez et quelque soit la cause,un email vous est adressé soit pour remerciement soit si votre action est en rapport avec l'achat de montre.Par questionnaire vous demander le choix des couleurs.Nous avons une campagne de 45 jours! au fur et à mesure que la campagne avance nous  envoyons les contreparties même avant la date proposée.Tous les 15 jours,par positionnement de pays nous classons les envois pour expédition.Nous avons mis de petites contreparties afin de satisfaire tout le monde.


$ 1  merci.Vous ne souhaitez pas la montre,mais tout geste reste grandiose.

$ 5 : votre nom ou votre logo dans notre page web.Merci!

$ 19  :2 montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo de votre sté dans notre page web.Ajoutez $ 10  frais d'envoi dépuis Suisse vers USA & Europe.Autre pays, nous  consulter.


Montre screen tactile fabriquée en France bénéficie d'une garantie de  5 ans.Prix  magasin 19 à 21 euros.



$ 29  :3 montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo de votre sté  dans notre page web.Ajoutez $ 15 frais d'envoi dépuis Suisse vers USA & Europe. Autre pays, nous consulter.Soutenez-nous,les offres sont accessibles.


 $ 39  :4 montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo de votre sté dans notre page web.Ajoutez $ 19 frais d'envoi  dépuis la Suisse vers USA & Europe.Autre pays,nous consulter.Offre de lancement,profitez-en.Pour nous soutenir avec notre action.



$ 49  :5  montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo dans notre page wesite.+ 1 montre gratuite total 6 montres pour moins de $120.

Ajoutez $ 22 frais d'envoi dépuis la Suisse vers USA & europe.Autre pays,nous consulter.



$ 59   :7 montres toutes les couleurs.Votre nom ou logo dans notre page.2 montres gratuites au lieu de $180

 total 9 montres que vous pouvez partager entre familles.

Votre nom ou logo dans notre livre d'or signé: " Genereux contributeurs  qui ont permis ce projet de voir le jour.Ajoutez $ 27 de frais d'envoi dépuis la Suisse.

Si nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif?

Comme stipuler, nous avions mis en apport  $1500 usd .Cette somme correspond à notre motivation pour cette campagne.Si l'objectif n'a pas joué nous l'utiliserons en commande d'échantillons de quelques pièces de montres en test avec notre logo sans emballage,pour faire une promotion d'avance.ou alors achat de montres LED,en commande ferme, pour accompagner nos sacs fluo en carbone.

Mais baissons pas les bras et attendons de voir  le résultat de notre campagne!

D'autres façon d'aider:

Si vous vous arrêtez sur notre page et que vous ne pouvez pas contribuer,alors que vous aimeriez porter une de nos montres,parlez-en autour de vous.Vos amis(es) pourraient être intéressés pour ensemble partager entre vous les contreparties.

  • Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de notre projet.
  • Rappelez-leur d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo.

      Pour toutes question:

      info@bagline-germain.com

      patxy2009@gmail.com

 LED.                                  bgmv-watches.C'est un projet visant à developper une ligne de montre indépendante et à la fois communautaire.Distinguez-vous avec la montre LED ligne unisexe,design moderne facile à utiliser.Une touche tactile sur écran permet d'ouvrir et d'acceder aux fonctions.Spécialement conçue pour avoir un éffet décontractant energisant. Bracelet ultra doux sécuritaire jusqu'à 10 crans 2.8 cm de largeur forme carrée 40 mm.Poids 64 g.pile incluse modèle (CR2025)Résistante à l'eau : 1ATM,épaisseur 1 cm,longeur de la bande 23.7 cm.largeur du bracelet 2.8 cm.Batterie 15-18 mois.Mouvement japonais.Fonctionnement:Appuyez sur l'écran jusqu'à ce que les touches clignotent.Reglez l'heure en caressant l'écran de gauche à droite.Puis appuyer sur le côté gauche du cadran jusqu'à ce que les chiffres des minutes clignotent....Reglez les minutes en caressant l'ecran de la gauche vers la droite.Tapotez l'écran pour afficher la date,appuyez ensuite sur le côté gauche de l'écran jusqu'à ce que le chiffre de la date clignote....Reglez la date!L'impact:Les montres sont déclinées en différentes couleurs soutenant 7 causes.De gauche vers la droite positionnées par numéro d'ordre.De la plus flashy à la plus sobre,distinguez-vous selon vos tenues avec le pack de couleur.Votre contribution soutiendra donc la montre dont la cause vous semble plus à votre goût.Lorsque vous soutenez notre projet,vous achetez des produits simples.Je dirais un geste charitable & grandiose à la fois pour nous tous.             Chaque contribution est associée à une cause spécifique                              1 Bleu:      Repas pour les sans-abris en Hospice. www.armeedusalut.ch 2 Vert:       Insertion sans-abris.  www.armeedusalut.ch3 Marron:  Protection des enfants  www.partag.org4 Jaune:    ( lutte contre la mendicité ). www.fondationcaritasfrance.org5 Noire:      prévention des malades neuro-moteurs.  www.ilavigny.ch6 Orange   Soins apporté aux sans-abris.  www.armeedusalut.ch7 Blanche:  Education-formation-hébergement.  www.ilavigny.chVous contribuez pour soutenir nos actions en échange,il y'a des contreparties avec nous à gagner.Si notre objectif est largement  atteint ce qui serait vraiement formidable pour qu'ensemble on puisse faire bouger un peu les choses en mettant l'accent sur le bien social.Des nouvelles de ces actions pourraient être partagées avec les contributeurs s'il le souhaitent.Comme je suis toujours impliquée dans différentes causes humanitaires cette campagne est importante à mes yeux pour lever des fonds.Par exemple:Quand vous contribuez pour 2 montres. bleue & autre colorisVotre contribution est justifiée: $ 19 < soutien 2 repas > chez les  sans-abris.Le plus important c'est de devoir pouvoir continuer à faire mes petits dons envers les démunis,les malades etc...Financement:$ 1500  n'est qu'une fraction.Cela represente mon apport personnel apporté dans cette campagne si j'atteignais pas mon objectif.Cette  campagne est primordiale pour le soutien que j'attend afin de voir le projet devenir réalité.Mon objectif est d'atteindre au moins $ 25000  ou voir dépasser mon objectif.Capacité d'approvisionnement imposée par le fabricant:dès 3000/pièces minimum.Personnalisation des emballages dont coffret + logo (impression à déterminer).500/pièces par colissage de 20 kg par carton.Dès 3000/pièces me fait  bénéficier du tarif dégressif sur l'ensemble du lot. Directement calculé à la pièce.Dans cette situation,la remise globale convertie en gain servira aussi à amenager un espace de stockage déjà disponible dans un dépot avec porte sécurisée.Contreparties:Ce que vous obtenez en apportant votre soutien pour cette campagne ce sont nos montres LED magic touch sreen digitale relaxante tant energisante en campagne pour Indiegogo.Quand vous nous soutenez et quelque soit la cause,un email vous est adressé soit pour remerciement soit si votre action est en rapport avec l'achat de montre.Par questionnaire vous demander le choix des couleurs.Nous avons une campagne de 45 jours! au fur et à mesure que la campagne avance nous  envoyons les contreparties même avant la date proposée.Tous les 15 jours,par positionnement de pays nous classons les envois pour expédition.Nous avons mis de petites contreparties afin de satisfaire tout le monde.$ 1  merci.Vous ne souhaitez pas la montre,mais tout geste reste grandiose.$ 5 : votre nom ou votre logo dans notre page web.Merci!$ 19  :2 montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo de votre sté dans notre page web.Ajoutez $ 10  frais d'envoi dépuis Suisse vers USA & Europe.Autre pays, nous  consulter.Montre screen tactile fabriquée en France bénéficie d'une garantie de  5 ans.Prix  magasin 19 à 21 euros.$ 29  :3 montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo de votre sté  dans notre page web.Ajoutez $ 15 frais d'envoi dépuis Suisse vers USA & Europe. Autre pays, nous consulter.Soutenez-nous,les offres sont accessibles. $ 39  :4 montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo de votre sté dans notre page web.Ajoutez $ 19 frais d'envoi  dépuis la Suisse vers USA & Europe.Autre pays,nous consulter.Offre de lancement,profitez-en.Pour nous soutenir avec notre action.$ 49  :5  montres coloris au choix.Votre nom ou logo dans notre page wesite.+ 1 montre gratuite total 6 montres pour moins de $120.Ajoutez $ 22 frais d'envoi dépuis la Suisse vers USA & europe.Autre pays,nous consulter.$ 59   :7 montres toutes les couleurs.Votre nom ou logo dans notre page.2 montres gratuites au lieu de $180 total 9 montres que vous pouvez partager entre familles.Votre nom ou logo dans notre livre d'or signé: " Genereux contributeurs  qui ont permis ce projet de voir le jour.Ajoutez $ 27 de frais d'envoi dépuis la Suisse.Si nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif?Comme stipuler, nous avions mis en apport  $1500 usd .Cette somme correspond à notre motivation pour cette campagne.Si l'objectif n'a pas joué nous l'utiliserons en commande d'échantillons de quelques pièces de montres en test avec notre logo sans emballage,pour faire une promotion d'avance.ou alors achat de montres LED,en commande ferme, pour accompagner nos sacs fluo en carbone.Mais baissons pas les bras et attendons de voir  le résultat de notre campagne!D'autres façon d'aider:Si vous vous arrêtez sur notre page et que vous ne pouvez pas contribuer,alors que vous aimeriez porter une de nos montres,parlez-en autour de vous.Vos amis(es) pourraient être intéressés pour ensemble partager entre vous les contreparties.
Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de notre projet.
Rappelez-leur d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo.
      Pour toutes question:      info@bagline-germain.com      patxy2009@gmail.com

story:
HELLO! 

ALEX S. YU is a young designer womenswear brand made with dream and love. ALEX S. YU creates garments that explore the fine line between reality and fantasy. The brand rollicks the happy emotions of childhood, nostalgia and wanderlust, while pondering the very definition of femininity in a modern, quirky way through garments. ALEX S. YU graduated from Blanche Macdonald Centre and furthered his fashion education at London College of Fashion before launching debut collection of ALEX S. YU sponsored by NICHE magazine in September 2014 at Vancouver Fashion Week. The debut collection has caught numerous local Vancouver and international attentions. The collection has since then appeared on Vogue UK, Glamour UK, Elle Italia, The Province, Vancouver Sun, Vancouver City Fashion; travelled to Tokyo for an exclusive photoshoot and has been featured in many local and international blogs. 


So the next step is to keep the momentum and show the FW2015 collection again at Vancouver Fashion Week!

This campaign is to gather funds for ALEX S. YU to show for the second consecutive time at Vancouver Fashion Week for the Fall Winter 2015 season in during the period of 16-22 March 2015.

Being able to show season after season is essential for a label to stay in the loop and especially for a young and new label like ALEX S. YU. 

With your help, ALEX S. YU will be able to show his FW 2015 collection at Vancouver Fashion Week and build momentum for his label.


EXPENSES?

Fashion Shows are expensive to put on as it involves multiple parties of the industry ranging from lighting, music, make up, hair, models, photographers, volunteers, greeters, ushers, security, press and many others. All these costs divides up and as a result, a fee of $3,800 CAD is needed to show at Vancouver Fashion Week. This campaign's goal is to raise the $3,800 CAD needed to cover the cost of attending the VFW. Any extra would go towards covering the cost of the production of the collection. 


PERKS!

To thank you for your generous help, ALEX S. YU has provided several perks! :D To accommodate production time, the products will be available in March, 2015. For those in Vancouver, they will be available for drop off in Greater Vancouver / pick up at the ALEX S. YU FW2015 POP UP (date and location to be confirmed but YES there will be an ALEX S. YU FW2015 POP UP SHOP!!) For those outside of Vancouver/International, your perks will be posted with Canada Post as soon as they are finished.
Thank You! <3
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE POSTCARDS - $5
     
Set of 8 double sided postcards from the ALEX S. YU | SS2015 - THE LOST YOUTH collection. This set was only given out as gifts for the guests at Vancouver Fashion Week in September 2014 and at the ALEX S. YU SS2015 POP UP SHOP as gifts with purchase. 
Printed on 100% Recycled Paper in Taiwan. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE TOQUE - $20
   
Oversized unisex Toque/Beanie available in 5 colours! Fits all heads and feels super warm! Made with 100% Acrylic Blend so it will not pill as easily as wool or cashmere. Will stretch a bit according to head size overtime. 
Made in Canada.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE TEE 2.0 - $60 

Limited edition unisex THE TEE 2.0 is the second collection of TEEs from the SS2015 collection. The first collection sold out in one day at the SS2015 POP UP.

Each TEE is unique. There is only ONE of each design on earth. 

THE TEE features photographs of graffitis in East London and Monmartre taken by ALEX S. YU during his travels, and digitally manipulated. The TEEs are then collaged with bits and pieces of shiny holographic fabrics (two in random shapes, to be exact) from the SS2015 runway collection to create a collaged image.

THE TEE 2.0 is available in unisex sizes XS-2L, they do fit true to size. Please note: there are limited quantities of each sizes as only a limited edition run of 25 per type is printed, some types are already running low. Please check perks available to the right to see availability of sizes and NO, they will not be printed again. 

Material - 100% Cotton Mesh 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE SKIRT - $250

Pick ONE of three skirts from THE LOST YOUTH collection.

Two sizes available. Elasticized waistbands, so fits all sizes comfortably.

It will be custom made for you. Details regarding sizing should be discussed after perk is claimed.


AHH!

As a small, young independent fashion label. There is literally no support financially from the Canadian government. And each collection costs a lot of money to produce, but what's the point of  producing a collection if no one will see it? But showing it at fashion weeks costs a lot of money! It really is sort of an oxymoron and a big challenge for all independent fashion designers out there. So, by contributing to the fees to attend Vancouver Fashion Week, it will help ALEX S. YU go a step further as an independent fashion label. 


FINALLY?!

Thank you for reading through the LONG campaign, and THANK YOU<3! if you decided to claim a perk and help me achieve my dreams. 

If not, it's all cupcakes and cookies! 

BUT!!!

Please CLICK!CLICK!CLICK! and help ALEX S. YU spread the word and share on your social media! Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr, ANYTHING! <3


And that's all there is to it.

- made with dream and love.

story:
ACHTUNG! Das Projekt ist noch nicht vollständig - es fehlen noch die Perks, und das eingebettete Video ist vom letzten Projekt - ein aktualisiertes folgt noch! Alle Perks können kurz nach Zahlungseingang verschickt werden - es muss nicht das Ende des Crowdfundingprojects abgewartet werden!

Kids beim allerersten Workshop gleich den Drop-In beizubringen, macht mir größte Freude - und erfüllt die Kids mit Stolz. Das funktioniert mit ihren Eltern übrigens genau so gut ;-)
(Foto: Bina Engel, sichtweise)

Wer ich bin:

Meine Name ist Volker Lux, ich bin 45 Jahre alt und Vater von 2 Kindern.
Seit Weihnachten 1984 gehört meine Leidenschaft dem Skate-Sport. Auf http://www.subvert.de/DIY-or-DIE erfahrt Ihr mehr, was ich seit 1986 ehrenamtlich auf die Beine gestellt habe. 2004 habe ich subVert gegründet, um zu dem Ehrenamt ein Gewerbe hinzuzufügen, um meine Tätigkeit finanzieren zu können. Meine Mission ist es, mindestens eine familienfreundliche Skatehalle für den Hamburger Raum zu schaffen. 

Bis dahin versuche ich, Hallen temporär für den Rollsport verfügbar zu machen (2013-2015 im Oberhafen, (Anschubfinanzierung über mein erstes erfolgreiches Crowdfundingprojekt!) und ab sofort Rindermarkthalle St. Pauli (Parkdeck))

Worum es geht:

Skateboard-Angebote an Schulen - davon träumen nicht nur die Kids von Hamburg und Umland, auch bei den Lehrern kommt das mobile Angebot super an, mit Anfragen aus allen drei Nachbarländern.
Allein dafür lohnt sich das SkateSchoolMobil (ein Transporter voller Leih-Boards, Rampen und Schoner), aber wir haben weit mehr vor: Schon jetzt geben wir neben regelmäßigen Schulstunden auch einzeln buchbare Anfänger-Kurse und bieten Skate-Geburtstage an.

Das SkateSchool Mobil soll auch Skate-Vereinen und -Gruppen eine starke Stütze für die Durchführung von Contests oder anderen Skate-Events sein. Nicht nur durch Stellen von Infrastruktur (Soundanlage, Generator, Tische, Zelte, Pavillons etc.) sondern auch mit mobilen Rampen.

Was wir schon geschafft haben:

Vor 2 Jahren starteten wir ein erstes Crowdfundingprojekt für das Mobil, bei dem am Ende knapp 4.000 Euro fehlten. Wir konnten durch die erfolgsunabhängige Spende von Abasto die Arbeit aufnehmen mit einem alten Transporter.
Wir geben in Schulen regelmäßige Skateboard-Ateliers und einmalige bzw. sich jährlich wiederholende Workshops bei Jugendzentren oder Kunsthallen mit einem Aktionsradius von über 400 Kilometern - denn so ein Angebot gibt es bundesweit viel zu selten!

Bei unseren Workshops spielen auch Balanceboards eine immer größere Rolle, erst recht in Schulen, in denen uns die Sporthalle nicht zur Verfügung steht und wir uns bei Regen auf ein Klassenzimmer beschränken müssen. Balanceboarding ist der perfekte Indoor-Sport für jedermann, fördert die Konzentration und verbessert Schulleistungen. Ihr könnt die subVert-B-Boards, custom-made in Hamburg, als Perk kaufen.

Wir konnten "Mok", den 11-fachen Freestyle-Weltmeister für unsere Arbeit gewinnen, der bei unseren Workshops und Mitmach-Aktionen, wie hier beim Kinderfest in Pinneberg ab und zu Shows fährt, um die Kids zu Höchstleistungen zu motivieren. Er bleibt in unseren Reihen und ist für Shows + Workshops buchbar, deren Erlös dem SkateSchoolMobil zu gute kommt. Danke, Mok!


Der alte Ducato wird im Januar nicht mehr über den TÜV kommen. Zudem brauchen wir ein Gefährt, welches weiteren Anforderungen gerecht werden muss:

Es braucht eine stärkere Anhängerkupplung, denn es wurde uns eine mobile Halfpipe angeboten, die man noch so gerade mit einem 3,5-Tonner ziehen kann (und in nur 2 Stunden komplett aufbauen kann). Wir brauchen mehr Sitzplätze für ein stärkeres Team. Bei Tageseinsätzen soll das (Wohn-)Mobil Rückzugsort für's Team sein. Und bei abseits liegenden Skateparks, die wir mit unseren Workshops beleben, werden wir auch oft nach einer Toilette gefragt, die wir dann dabei hätten.

Wie Du helfen kannst:

Wir streben eine Finanzierung über Umsatz ein, bei der die Unterstützer nicht spenden, sondern einfach nur einkaufen brauchen: Skate-Stuff oder was es sonst so in Skateshops gibt: Rucksäcke, Klamotten, Sneaker, Schoner... wir nehmen jetzt für's Projekt sogar Scooter ins Sortiment auf! 
Und man kann die Produkte auch schon vor Crowdfunding-Ende abholen oder sich schicken lassen (sie lassen sich also als Weihnachtsgeschenke einsetzen).

ACHTUNG: bis auf einen Gutschein sind die Perks sind noch nicht online - das folgt die Tage!

Du kannst auch direkt zu uns zum Shoppen kommen: Für das Projekt richten wir vom 5.-23. Dezember einen Info- und Verkaufsstand (einen kompletten Skateshop!) mitten auf der Marktfläche in der Rindermarkthalle ein! Die Ware nehmen wir aus unserem Skateshop, dem subVert store:

Nicht weniger direkt tragen die Erlöse unseres Skateshops in Pinneberg zum Gelingen des Projekts bei.

Außerdem kannst Du das Projekt promoten, über Mund-zu-Mund-Propaganda, Social Media (dafür bietet Indiegogo ein Tool an) oder durch Flyer&Poster-Verteilen/-Plakatieren. 

Was Du davon hast:

Natürlich erstmal das Produkt oder den Gutschein, über dessen Kauf Du das Projekt vorantreibst. Das Mobil kann auch Dir zur Verfügung stehen: durch Workshops, Kindergeburtstage oder andere Feste.
Und eines Tages wirst Du hoffentlich die Skatehalle genießen, die wir über die Lobby-Arbeit durch unsere Mobil auf die Beine stellen wollen. 

Schon jetzt laden wir Dich herzlich in die Rindermarkt(skate)halle ein, wo wir einen Teil des Parkdecks zum Skatepark umfunktioniert haben - zur kostenfreien Nutzung!

Wieviel Geld wird benötigt?

Das günstigste Mobil, welches wir bisher auf dem Gebrauchtmarkt gesehen haben und welches allen grundlegenden Anforderungen gerecht wird, lag bei 17.500 Euro.
Es kommen noch einige Kosten dazu. Hinzu kommen noch die ganzen Beschaffungskosten für die Ware, die sich die Unterstützer aussuchen. Insofern sollten wir einen Umsatz von über 50.000 Euro generieren.
Dadurch, dass wir den Zielbetrag auf nur 11.000 Euro festgelegt haben, sparen wir uns Gebühren. Und wir führen unsere Arbeit ja auch bei einem geringerem Betrag fort, nur halt nicht so umfangreich, wie es nötig wäre.
Was geschieht mit dem Geld, wenn wir unter dem Zielbetrag bleiben?

Auf Indiegogo gibt es die Möglichkeit, sich auch die geringere Summe auszahlen zu lassen. Davon machen wir Gebrauch, denn so oder so werden wir mit dem Skate-Unterricht fortfahren - und sei es mit einer "Schrottlaube" oder auch mit einem klapprigen Damenrad. Ich habe schon Kurse in Schnelsen gegeben, zu denen ich von St. Pauli aus mit einem Fahrrad + Anhänger aufgebrochen bin :-)

Aber es wäre schade um die mobile Halfpipe, auf die wir dann ganz verzichten müssten, und regelmässige Kurse in Schulen wären nur noch möglich, wenn sich die Schulen Boards anschaffen.

Die Folgen

Das SkateSchool-Mobil ist deshalb bei Sportlehrern und Pädagogen so beliebt, weil es die Kids motiviert, sich zu bewegen. Bewegung und Balance kommen in Zeiten von Playstation, Tablets und Smartphone zu kurz. 

Risiken & Nebenwirkungen

Korrigiert mich gerne, aber ich meine, es gibt kein Risiko für den Supporter, da er ja ein Erfolgsunabhängigen Gegenwert sofort erhält. Auch für Spender ohne Gegenleistung gibt es kein Risiko, denn ich gebe seit 25 Jahren leidenschaftlich gerne Skate-Kurse, und ich mach damit weiter, auch wenn weniger als geplant reinkommt. 

Es gibt nur ein Risiko, wenn man sich NICHT für das Projekt einsetzt ;-) Z.B. zu viele übergewichtige Kids, die nur am Handy daddeln!

Fotos von PERKS:
Einer der BRIGHTHELMETs, weitere Ansichten siehe http://brighthelmet.com/helmets/

Bis dahin versuche ich, Hallen temporär für den Rollsport verfügbar zu machen (2013-2015 im Oberhafen, (Anschubfinanzierung über mein erstes erfolgreiches Crowdfundingprojekt!) und ab sofort Rindermarkthalle St. Pauli (Parkdeck))
Worum es geht:
Skateboard-Angebote an Schulen - davon träumen nicht nur die Kids von Hamburg und Umland, auch bei den Lehrern kommt das mobile Angebot super an, mit Anfragen aus allen drei Nachbarländern.Allein dafür lohnt sich das SkateSchoolMobil (ein Transporter voller Leih-Boards, Rampen und Schoner), aber wir haben weit mehr vor: Schon jetzt geben wir neben regelmäßigen Schulstunden auch einzeln buchbare Anfänger-Kurse und bieten Skate-Geburtstage an.

Das SkateSchool Mobil soll auch Skate-Vereinen und -Gruppen eine starke Stütze für die Durchführung von Contests oder anderen Skate-Events sein. Nicht nur durch Stellen von Infrastruktur (Soundanlage, Generator, Tische, Zelte, Pavillons etc.) sondern auch mit mobilen Rampen.

Was wir schon geschafft haben:Vor 2 Jahren starteten wir ein erstes Crowdfundingprojekt für das Mobil, bei dem am Ende knapp 4.000 Euro fehlten. Wir konnten durch die erfolgsunabhängige Spende von Abasto die Arbeit aufnehmen mit einem alten Transporter. Wir geben in Schulen regelmäßige Skateboard-Ateliers und einmalige bzw. sich jährlich wiederholende Workshops bei Jugendzentren oder Kunsthallen mit einem Aktionsradius von über 400 Kilometern - denn so ein Angebot gibt es bundesweit viel zu selten!
Bei unseren Workshops spielen auch Balanceboards eine immer größere Rolle, erst recht in Schulen, in denen uns die Sporthalle nicht zur Verfügung steht und wir uns bei Regen auf ein Klassenzimmer beschränken müssen. Balanceboarding ist der perfekte Indoor-Sport für jedermann, fördert die Konzentration und verbessert Schulleistungen. Ihr könnt die subVert-B-Boards, custom-made in Hamburg, als Perk kaufen.
Wir konnten "Mok", den 11-fachen Freestyle-Weltmeister für unsere Arbeit gewinnen, der bei unseren Workshops und Mitmach-Aktionen, wie hier beim Kinderfest in Pinneberg ab und zu Shows fährt, um die Kids zu Höchstleistungen zu motivieren. Er bleibt in unseren Reihen und ist für Shows + Workshops buchbar, deren Erlös dem SkateSchoolMobil zu gute kommt. Danke, Mok!




Der alte Ducato wird im Januar nicht mehr über den TÜV kommen. Zudem brauchen wir ein Gefährt, welches weiteren Anforderungen gerecht werden muss:
Es braucht eine stärkere Anhängerkupplung, denn es wurde uns eine mobile Halfpipe angeboten, die man noch so gerade mit einem 3,5-Tonner ziehen kann (und in nur 2 Stunden komplett aufbauen kann). Wir brauchen mehr Sitzplätze für ein stärkeres Team. Bei Tageseinsätzen soll das (Wohn-)Mobil Rückzugsort für's Team sein. Und bei abseits liegenden Skateparks, die wir mit unseren Workshops beleben, werden wir auch oft nach einer Toilette gefragt, die wir dann dabei hätten.
Wie Du helfen kannst:
Wir streben eine Finanzierung über Umsatz ein, bei der die Unterstützer nicht spenden, sondern einfach nur einkaufen brauchen: Skate-Stuff oder was es sonst so in Skateshops gibt: Rucksäcke, Klamotten, Sneaker, Schoner... wir nehmen jetzt für's Projekt sogar Scooter ins Sortiment auf! Und man kann die Produkte auch schon vor Crowdfunding-Ende abholen oder sich schicken lassen (sie lassen sich also als Weihnachtsgeschenke einsetzen).
ACHTUNG: bis auf einen Gutschein sind die Perks sind noch nicht online - das folgt die Tage!
Du kannst auch direkt zu uns zum Shoppen kommen: Für das Projekt richten wir vom 5.-23. Dezember einen Info- und Verkaufsstand (einen kompletten Skateshop!) mitten auf der Marktfläche in der Rindermarkthalle ein! Die Ware nehmen wir aus unserem Skateshop, dem subVert store:


Nicht weniger direkt tragen die Erlöse unseres Skateshops in Pinneberg zum Gelingen des Projekts bei.
Außerdem kannst Du das Projekt promoten, über Mund-zu-Mund-Propaganda, Social Media (dafür bietet Indiegogo ein Tool an) oder durch Flyer&Poster-Verteilen/-Plakatieren. 
Was Du davon hast:
Natürlich erstmal das Produkt oder den Gutschein, über dessen Kauf Du das Projekt vorantreibst. Das Mobil kann auch Dir zur Verfügung stehen: durch Workshops, Kindergeburtstage oder andere Feste. Und eines Tages wirst Du hoffentlich die Skatehalle genießen, die wir über die Lobby-Arbeit durch unsere Mobil auf die Beine stellen wollen. 
Schon jetzt laden wir Dich herzlich in die Rindermarkt(skate)halle ein, wo wir einen Teil des Parkdecks zum Skatepark umfunktioniert haben - zur kostenfreien Nutzung!

Wieviel Geld wird benötigt?Das günstigste Mobil, welches wir bisher auf dem Gebrauchtmarkt gesehen haben und welches allen grundlegenden Anforderungen gerecht wird, lag bei 17.500 Euro.Es kommen noch einige Kosten dazu. Hinzu kommen noch die ganzen Beschaffungskosten für die Ware, die sich die Unterstützer aussuchen. Insofern sollten wir einen Umsatz von über 50.000 Euro generieren.Dadurch, dass wir den Zielbetrag auf nur 11.000 Euro festgelegt haben, sparen wir uns Gebühren. Und wir führen unsere Arbeit ja auch bei einem geringerem Betrag fort, nur halt nicht so umfangreich, wie es nötig wäre.Was geschieht mit dem Geld, wenn wir unter dem Zielbetrag bleiben? Auf Indiegogo gibt es die Möglichkeit, sich auch die geringere Summe auszahlen zu lassen. Davon machen wir Gebrauch, denn so oder so werden wir mit dem Skate-Unterricht fortfahren - und sei es mit einer "Schrottlaube" oder auch mit einem klapprigen Damenrad. Ich habe schon Kurse in Schnelsen gegeben, zu denen ich von St. Pauli aus mit einem Fahrrad + Anhänger aufgebrochen bin :-)
Aber es wäre schade um die mobile Halfpipe, auf die wir dann ganz verzichten müssten, und regelmässige Kurse in Schulen wären nur noch möglich, wenn sich die Schulen Boards anschaffen.
Die Folgen
 Das SkateSchool-Mobil ist deshalb bei Sportlehrern und Pädagogen so beliebt, weil es die Kids motiviert, sich zu bewegen. Bewegung und Balance kommen in Zeiten von Playstation, Tablets und Smartphone zu kurz. 


Risiken & Nebenwirkungen


Korrigiert mich gerne, aber ich meine, es gibt kein Risiko für den Supporter, da er ja ein Erfolgsunabhängigen Gegenwert sofort erhält. Auch für Spender ohne Gegenleistung gibt es kein Risiko, denn ich gebe seit 25 Jahren leidenschaftlich gerne Skate-Kurse, und ich mach damit weiter, auch wenn weniger als geplant reinkommt. 
Es gibt nur ein Risiko, wenn man sich NICHT für das Projekt einsetzt ;-) Z.B. zu viele übergewichtige Kids, die nur am Handy daddeln!



Fotos von PERKS:Einer der BRIGHTHELMETs, weitere Ansichten siehe http://brighthelmet.com/helmets/

story:
About us and our sunglasses

Sirius Attire is an eco-conscious brand born in Vancouver, British Columbia. We have created the first bamboo sunglasses fused with genuine semi-precious stones to enhance the stylish and earthy nature of our product. We equally care about quality and comfort as well, which is why our lenses are 400 UVA/UVB protected, have a polarization class of 3, and the temples are equipped with flex hinges to fit any head size! They are also super lightweight so you'll forget that you're even wearing them. Follow us on: Instagram   Facebook  Twitter  YouTube

Our Sunglasses


Instant & free international shipping*

We went through multiple stages of design and quality testing to ensure we were satisfied with the end result. We are ecstatic with what we have which is why we have nearly 300 pairs available to ship starting August 22!

 

We have allocated up to $25 of free shipping per package but in some rare circumstances this amount may go over – if so we will let you know in order to add on to your reward.

Each country, state, and province may or may not have it's own taxes or duties associated with importing sunglasses. We can't keep track of it all but usually small & light shipment should be nil or nominal or so we hope! =)

Every pair is one of a kind

Due to the fact that both the frames and stones are natural, each pair will slightly differ from the pictures. We take this in as a positive as each stone has it's own unique design!

Lenses

Our 400 UVA/UVB protected & polarized lenses (class 3) have been tested by a third party locally and certified in all tests under the USA (FDA), Australian/NZ, and European standards.

Unique Lifetime Warranty

If there are any manufacturer defects which cause it to break within the first year we will accept a return on the product and refund the full value. After the one year warranty, if you decide you don't want the sunglasses anymore we will credit 20% of your purchase price against a new pair if they are in good condition. If they break in any way after 1 year we will credit it at 15% value towards a new pair. The warranties are subject to returning the product back to us so we can do something cool with them.

Non-profit support

$1 from every pair sold, or shout-out reward purchased, will go towards one or more of the Plan Canada matched gifts seen below:

http://plancanada.ca/GiftsofHope/products/33-Matched-gifts/
We support the matched gifts program because donations are matched by various government, corporate and foundation organizations. Every dollar that we give can be leveraged 2x - 15x depending on what cause we support.
Packaging
In order to be a little more environmentally friendly we are sending the sunglasses contained in 100% recycled cardboard case which you may recycle instantly. Our pouches are made from a jute and cotton blend and the internal lining is 100% satin silk.
 

Design

During the design process we went thru several prototypes and experimented with different stones to achieve our desired look. Quite a few designs didn't make the cut while some are on the back burner for future models!


Models from left to right
Riun: Vimeo & Instagram                                       Dora: Facebook & Instagram
Ashley (standing): Facebook  & Instagram       Venneisa: Facebook

Jacques: Facebook  & Instagram                         Anny: Facebook & Instagram

Credits

We worked with a ton of great people to get this campaign up and running. If you are interested in checking out our creative crew then here they are!

Photography by Richard Lecoin: Website & Instagram 
Videography by Bren MacDonald:  Facebook
Music by DJ Tim Waters: Facebook & SoundCloud

FAQ
  1. When will you start shipping? August 22 2014.

story:
Short Summary

As a long-time volunteer firefighter and emergency medical technician Bob Stone knew the importance of solid lines of communications among emergency responders.  He was often frustrated by the inability of police, fire, and ambulance personal, especially across multiple jurisdictions, to communicate directly because they had different radio equipment.  So, in 2009, Bob had a vision to change all of that and applied his experience with radio communications and signal processing to the task.

Our company is called Newfield Design and we have created a new technology that acts like a “universal translator” for formally incompatible radio equipment.  Our project will allow direct communication between different radio networks without the need for the communities & agencies to buy new radios or new transmitters.  Our box plugs directly into their existing equipment.  This makes our solution affordable.

We have proven out our technology over the last year of live operation and are ready to make it widely available.  We need your support to start adding the many other languages, known as protocols, to our device.  Your dollars pledged will help us contract the software engineers to write the necessary computer code to our specifications.

Supporters of our project are helping to save the lives of victims of disasters and the emergency responder teams alike.

What We Need & What You Get

Each language that we add to our translator costs about $10,000 worth of programming time.  The technology is proven and the specs are written but there is still a lot of work for each protocol.  Our project will allow us to make our device available for the two most commonly used protocols for Public Safety networks.  There are 47 different protocols in all so excess funding will help towards adding more capabilities to our translator.  Every dollar pledged gets us closer to our goal.

In addition to the good karma for helping us make our vision a reality we would like to offer you token of our appreciation in the form of a small gift emblazoned with our company logo.  We hope this might help you to share your story of how your contribution is helping to save lives.

The Impact

This project will allow us to begin the process of tying together all forms of emergency communications equipment across the nation.  This will help us be more responsive in times of crisis and to help fight terrorism.  The need for this was evident during the 911 disaster and again during Katrina.  The solutions proposed so far (see the Department of Homeland Security project SAFECOM) have been largely ineffective due to old technology and high costs.

With your support Newfield Design can start to make an affordable solution accessible to our first responders. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't feel you can contribute with a pledge please help us spread the word about our vision of a nationwide network for emergency responder communications.

story:
view our most recent crowdfunding campaign:

Kickstarter

 

What is CROSSKIX?

A SUPERIOR alternative in soft foam composite (EVA) footwear and a Hybrid footwear for multiple uses. It is by far the most technical shoe in the EVA footwear category.

"CROSS" is the short term for "crossover" and "KIX" is for "kicks" which is slang for shoes (a term typically used by young adults).

 

             CHOOSE from 8 STOCK COLORWAYS

 

______________________________________________________________________________

 

MEDIA COVERAGE:

PSFK
 
Gizmag
 
TrendHunter
 
OregonLive.com
 
Earth911.com
 
DailyCandy.com - Kickstarter
 
Yahoo! News Singapore
 
Greatist
 
Cosmone
 
ShoppersBase
 
RetailMeNot
 
Keetsa
 
Kinetic Shift
 
OP Adventure Team
 
Origin Of Cool
 
Sole Sirius
 
CounterKicks
 
Kicks Addict
 
Defy New York

 

_______________________________________________________________________________

 

What makes CROSSKIX different from the competition?

Below is a chart showing the advantages of CROSSKIX as compared to the one brand that dominates this category. We wanted to fill the void in this category for a more Sportier shoe that can be used in so many more ways than just a slip-on. Please review below.

 

Why CROSSKIX?

  • multiple uses - leisure, recreation, casual, and work
  • stylish AIR VENTS throughout to keep your feet cool & dry
  • soft and contour footbed for a comfortable fit
  • strategically located water vents for use IN and OUT of the water
  • PRE and POST foot recovery features (after playing sports)
  • EASY cleaning
  • 100% RECYCLABLE - for playgrounds, track & field, basketball courts, etc.
  • fashion forward styling

 

 

CROSSKIX are made with separate Upper and Outsole components which allow for greater flexibility and a "real" shoe feel.

________________________________________________________________________

Our Story.

Let's face it....there is really ONLY one brand out there that dominates the EVA (soft foam composite) footwear category (as you have seen in the video). We all know who that is. But if you're like MANY other folks, you've probably have said to yourself..."they're comfortable, but I wouldn't be caught with them on!"

So, our goal was to design a shoe that EVERYONE can PROUDLY wear for multiple uses and of course...look GOOD while doing it. We believe there's definitely a void in this category for a more sportier, stylish, and functional shoe. So, we've spent over 4 years designing, redesigning, testing, retesting, producing sample after sample and have finally come up with a shoe that all men, women, and kids just can't wait to get their feet into. Our focus groups have unanimously voted on what you see.

We're committed to producing top quality footwear for the demanding consumer that cares about price, style, and functionality. We let YOU decide what you want in a multi-purpose athletic shoe. 

About the shoe.

Crosskix are made with the highest grade of EVA (ethylyn vinyl acetate) material. It is basically a soft foam composite that is commonly used as midsoles in running and basketball shoes. Most people can identify the material simply by the brand c***s (we prefer not to be mentioned in the same breath simply because our shoe is much more superior in the way it is constructed, function and quality).

They are VERY lightweight (only 7.5oz for size 11). The outsole and uppers are SEPARATE molds (not like the competition that is made with just ONE mold). This allows the shoe greater flexibility and to wear like a fabric made shoe. 

The shoe also has stylish air vents that allow your feet to stay dry and cool. These same vents also act as drain holes for water to exit the shoe. This means that you can wear your Crosskix while washing your car, walking on the beach, or at the swimming pool. There are specially placed drain holes located in the heel of the footbed that allows water to flow outside of the shoe quickly and easily.

Experience

We have been in the athletic apparel industry over 10 years and in footwear for over 4. Collectively, our team has over 30 years in footwear design and manufacturing. During the 4 years, we've actually developed 3 other designs and samples. All of which did not make the cut for design but more importantly - functionality. 

What is the money being used for?

All of the funds raised will be used to produce the MOLDS for sizes 3-13 and of course, our opening order. We also will use part of the funds to finalize packaging options.

Our 5 YEAR GUARANTEE!

We are very confident about our quality that if any part of your CROSSKIX becomes defective under normal use, we will gladly replace it with a NEW pair! Simply follow our return policy procedure by sending us a clear image of the defective area and we will send you an authorization code. Normal wear and tear does not qualify.

Because we are proud supporters of STAND UP 2 CANCER!

For all Pleasure Pink colorways selected, 10% of all proceeds will be donated to a Cancer Research Agency (yet to be determined IF we get funded). Most of us know someone that has been or is affected by this awful disease. Lets all support this cause and STAND UP TO CANCER

___________________________________________________________________________________

100% RECYKIX (recycling program)

Don't throw away your used or unwanted CROSSKIX! 

At CROSSKIX, we are proponents of a 'Green Planet". Return 'em to us and we'll use for our RECY-KIX program. In return, we'll offer a 15% DISCOUNT on your next pair of CROSSKIX!

In addition, we want to donate some of the shoes to need kids and families around the world.

What sizes do we offer?

Whole sizes from 5-13 (including WOMENS)

All colorways are in FULL sizes (no half sizes needed).

click here to view SIZE CHART

_______________________________

How do I make a contribution or purchase a PERK?

Simply select from one (or two, or as many as you like) of the PERKS to the right of this page. Follow the prompts on how to finalize payment and you're done! Fast and Easy!

 

Thank you!

Special Thanks to NIKO CATABAY for producing the video..thanks for being patient and dedicated!
