pool are being taken care of while you're away.

Worksite
Imagine
you have hired contractors for a renovation on your house. You come home from
work to find they have done the job totally incorrectly. Without any clear
evidence of what really happened in your absence, what started out as a simple
renovation could quickly turn into a legal and insurance nightmare.
Additionally,
theft of building materials is a major problem with small to medium size sites.
The FlatTops™ security system can provide a powerful theft deterrent for a
fraction of the cost of a full time security guard.

Events
Imagine
that you are arranging an outdoor event with lots of people. An IP security
camera installation can complement ground staff and assist in providing both a
safe and lawful environment. Drugs, alcohol, violence all of these things are
much less likely to occur when somebody knows they are close to a camera.

Liability
Liability
is a major concern for just about everybody nowadays. Having this type of
recording security system would be a great benefit to many organisations. For
example, in the case an accident, injury, damage or theft occurring in a
parking lot. Simply being able to show evidence of what really occurred could
solve many disputes and possibly also assist police in apprehending those responsible.

Schoolyard
Imagine
you are operating a school or day care centre. There have been reports of
people loitering in the vicinity of the playground and the local park where the
children play. There are parents with obvious concerns about the situation, but
what can you do ? Setting up a temporary IP security camera goes a long way to
both alleviating the parent’s concerns and also in assisting local police in
identifying and apprehending any wrongdoer before something serious occurs.
With this system, all this can be achieved for a fraction of the cost of
appointing security personnel.


Wilderness
Park
Rangers or security guards could benefit from the placement of camera devices
in areas where problems such as illegal camping or damage to protected areas
and/ or trespassing is a frequent occurrence. FlatTops™ camera units could be
placed in hidden locations, even attached to trees. Recorded video files could
be periodically accessed and downloaded remotely by WiFi from the comfort of a
vehicle, without ever having to touch the camera device. Given that the
FlatTops™ camera system is solar powered and totally maintenance free it could
remain attached to a tree or other remote site indefinitely.



OPTIONAL
BASES

The FlatTops™ system
features a range of different interchangeable bases which are appropriate for
different situations.
The
product will be first launched with the versatile cylindrical “Picket Base” as
standard but other alternative bases can be easily retrofitted when they become
available through the FlatTops™ online store.

The
full range of bases that are envisaged are:

Tube Base:  For permanent mounting in concrete
Picket Base:  For semi-permanent mounting in soil
or sand
Weighted Base:  For temporary or portable applications
Flange Base:  For attachment to solid horizontal
surfaces 
Clamp Base:  For attachment to tubular structures
or solid vertical surfaces



COLOUR
SCHEMES



Various
colour schemes are available for the base, mast, and head sections of the FlatTops™
camera system. Some parts of the camera system are specifically allocated as
matt black to reduce internal reflections.
Plain
colours and simple combinations of colours are included as standard. Tri-colour
combinations such as camouflage colour schemes cost slightly more because they
must be stencilled, painted and baked three times as opposed to just once for
the simple colour schemes.
Custom
colour schemes are possible for no additional cost with the purchase of 10 or
more units as outlined in the perks
section. Additionally we are happy to work with contributors in the development
of a custom colour scheme of your making and can provide you with CAD
renderings of your desired colours & patterns.
To
use the Interactive colour selector on the website, first select the scene using the media icons on the media selector strip
and then flip through the colour choices
using the page selector controls on the lower portion of the screen.



DEVELOPMENT SCHEDULE




What has been done so far

The
project has passed the design phase and early Beta Phase prototypes exist.
New
patents have been applied for and are now pending in addition to granted
patents relating to panoramic imagery and processing techniques.
Sample
solar panels have been fabricated and are currently being evaluated.
CAD
and manufacturing designs have been completed.
Contract
manufacturers have been sourced and manufacturing quotations have been acquired
for all mechanical components.
Camera
and network components have been tested and are fully operational.


What is yet to be done

Finalize
PCB design for solar charge controller/PSU.
Secure
manufacturer for charge controller PCB.
Give
go-ahead for fabrication of moulds for injection moulding and die casting.
Get detailed
quotations for painting processes.
Appoint
a “pack and ship” agent for delivery of finished products


Order fulfilment of final
product is anticipated to be approximately 6 months from campaign completion.



THE
FUTURE


Shadow
Technology Australia is continuing to develop the FlatTops™ technology. Support
from contributors will allow further innovations and refinements of the
technology to become available.
Because the FlatTops system utilizes a modular design approach, many of
the proposed future enhancements will become available to existing customers as
retro-fit options.



PERKS













SHIPPING


Shadow Technology Australia
will secure a “Pack & Ship” agent to coordinate a speedy and cost effective
delivery option for the finished product. Given that contributors are dispersed
over the world, exact pricing will not be known until final order quantities
and delivery locations are known. We will seek to reduce shipping and delivery
costs to an absolute minimum through order consolidation and shipping to
centralized locations before final distribution. The delivery costs will simply
be passed on to contributors without any mark up. We are also happy to work
directly with any contributor who wants to make special delivery arrangements.






THE FlatTops™ REFERRAL PROGRAM

Win a free FlatTops™
Solar Security Sentinel valued at $2299 just for getting involved in the
campaign !



Refer other people to the
FlatTops™ campaign at Indiegogo by using the Sharing Tools on the campaign page
and provided the funding goal is reached, the person who referred the most Funds
Contributed will win a FlatTops™ Solar Security Sentinel totally free !

LEGAL


Copyright 2014
Shadow Technology Australia Pty Ltd. All rights reserved.
FlatTops™ is a
trademark of Shadow Technology Australia Pty Ltd.

story:
Short Summary


  • As many of you know, the chapter of my life here in Sacramento has come to a close.
  • I'm set to return to school in the fall to focus and fine tune my skills as a writer. In addition to my academic pursuits, relocating to the Los Angeles area will serve as a great environment to expand on my clothing line Jefferson Lush as well as further explore my hobby of singing/songwriting.
  • That being said, uprooting the life I have established here over the past two years doesn't happen overnight. Moving the belongings from the apartment here that I furnished is going to require movers and a moving truck. I also have two adopted shelter cats that are going to make the 400 mile journey with me! I am in need of supplies to comfortably furnish transporting them in a car for 7+ hours. I love them and their unique personalities but they are quite vocal and have never traveled before! I may need to stay in a hotel overnight to let them rest and give them a break if they aren't keen on the car travel. Supporting myself and another person for the past two years hasn't left me in the most economically savvy position but I'm definitely looking forward to the future and what it holds for my creative outlets. and my kitties! :)


What We Need & What You Get

  • Directly these funds are going to cover the costs of thing such as: 
  • 2 large cat carriers for Penelope and Henry to be comfortable in.
  • a travel type litter pan/box
  • travel food/water for Penelope and Henry
  • Hotel expenses if they are too miserable in the car
  • Movers/Moving truck
  • Parts of my deposit I am going to lose due to damages incurred by "roommate".
  • These donations won't go unrewarded!! I have a handful of awesome t-shirts -- pre worn, pre washed, and pre loved! Wu Tang, NHBD, Drake, Miguel, Secrets, We The Kings, and Young & Reckless in various sizes that I am going to award to donors...donors that can generate the most buzz and donations..and a few at complete random!
  • I don't expect to raise anywhere near $500 - that's just the minimum amount required by IndieGogo. Honestly, anything will help. 

The Impact

  • Your support in this difficult and unexpected time in my life is appreciated more than you will ever know.
  • I cannot wait to return home and resume the pursuit of writing music and working on my book. Not to mention my clothing line -- you won't be disappointed!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you are unable to donate anything -- feel free to spread the word in helping out someone in need! Karma is amazing. :)

story:
We are students from Drexel University and we are the first senior class of Drexel’s Product Design program. Our program is made unique by its adherence not to the passing on of time-honored design methods, but marked by its spunk and devotion to raising the standards of the future. We are the future — we are the first graduating class.


Because we are the first Product Design class at Drexel University, there is no precedent for how our senior show should be done. As such, we are creating this show from the ground up. We are responsible for organizing as well as fundraising. The money we raise will go towards event catering, promotions, poster printing, exhibition furniture, material costs, and putting the last finishing touches on our projects to make sure they really stand out.



Alexa Forney: Spoonful

Exploring the role of product design in social change, this project investigates using self-sufficient skills to improve the quality of life in low-income populations. In the wake of twelve months of original qualitative research, Spoonful attempts to democratize access to information and specialized ingredients in a population with limited budgets and limited access to technology, utilizing micro-kits to disseminate recipes and valuable information on self-sufficient habits.



Bradley Seigel: A New Desk

I set out on my senior project to redesign the office desk for more efficient and productive use. This modular flat-pack desk can be made out of many materials to fit any work space. For people that mainly use a computer, the desk can act more as a bookcase with shelves than a desk with drawers. For people that use a desktop computer, it can be rearranged to accommodate that efficiently as well. It can also be made out a wide range of materials.



Nnaemeke Offodile: Helping Arthritic Hands

My goal is to lend a helping hand and provide both a product and a system that will change the realities of those with arthritis and allow them to live a less painful life. My system and product will incorporate proven methods of Arthritic treatments such as, moist heat therapy, cold therapy, massaging and stretching. The combination of these four methods will be delivered to all potential users through my product in a way that is easy to use, simple to understand, unobtrusive and, most importantly, designed with the user in mind.



Jingqiao Wang: Design for Sports Injury

My design concept delivers the right information for pre-professional soccer players to know exactly what they need to do and how to do them correctly in order to prevent injuries, improve their abilities to play soccer, and eventually help them to become better soccer players.



Jacob Beadenkopf: DIY Shoes, no tools required

By creating a design for a shoe that can be assembled without need of any specialized tools and can be constructed out of any fabric, the ability to makes shoes for oneself is made available to many. Additionally, a visual design language has been established that can communicate the design and instructions with minimal written language, making it widely accessible. The final design is intended to allow those in need to make shoes for themselves, and to give those who are not in need an opportunity to reflect on their place in consumer society.




Jordann Smith: Supporum, Helping Substance Abusers’ Loved Ones

Addiction is a family disease that has been growing rapidly throughout our nation, but most people know little about it and are victim to the stigmas associated with addiction.  More methods are being created to help the addict, but addict’s loved ones have little to no options to cope. “Supporum” is a system that helps substance abusers’ loved ones learn about their illness, connect with others in similar situations, and heal through achieving self-empowerment.



Mary DiPesa: Collaborative Space for Developing Neighborhood in South Philly

Point Breeze, a historically underprivileged neighborhood in South Philadelphia, is approaching a breakthrough. This area needs a reliable community centered environment for sharing and implementing ideas. Utilizing a range of conceptual design and mixed media production, my thesis asks and attempts to answer questions like: What happens to human evolution when our built environments shift?



Megan Peaslee: Reading with Arthritis

Inspired by people suffering with Rheumatoid Arthritis, this project tackles the issue of being unable to enjoy reading due to the effects of this disease.  This solution is inspired by a quilt and folds into a triangle, creating stand for a variety of books.  Along with supporting the weight of the book, the Acute Reader has features that aid in keeping the book open and turning the pages.



Nick Kovacs: Musical Medicine Project

Music has been used as a healing force for centuries. Today Music Therapy is effective in treating people with a variety of developmental delays through the use of musical group exercises.  Therapists lead these group exercises to help improve patients focus, motor and social skills. Music therapists still use traditional music instruments, which are not designed for the severely mentally and physically handicapped. My Musical Medicine Project is new musical experience that improves the motor skills of the patients and is designed with the end user in mind.



Osman Cueto: Empowering Asthmatics Through Education

Asthma affects about 1 in 12 people in the US, making it one of the most common non-communicable diseases. Having been diagnosed with asthma as child it is continually something I have to deal with. The purpose of this design project is to Empower and instill a sense of Comfort and knowledge to those who are affected. After countless hours of research, synthesising, and ideation the concept for “Breathe” the connected inhaler came about.



Seth Fowler: SoundBite - Innovating and Simplifying Music Creation

Many talented musicians lack the means and the technical proficiency to take the next step in their career and record their own music. SoundBITE gives these musicians a simple all in one solution to this problem that allows them to not only record their music but do it in fun innovative new ways.



Troy Hudson: Light Therapy Glasses for Seasonal Affective Disorder

Seasonal Affective Disorder, or SAD, develops when people experience a lack of sunlight in their life and it affects between 4-6% of people in the United States, while 10-20% experience a minor form of this disorder. Light therapy helps to simulate the effects of sunlight; within the process of understanding the users it became evident that a more seamless integration into their lifestyles was desired. Lumiware, light therapy glasses, helps to encourage use of light therapy for people constantly on-the-move, and transitions people from SAD to happy!



3D Print!


Product Design Mug!





Product Design T-Shirt!

story:
For the description in German language please scroll down - für die Beschreibung in Deutsch bitte nach unten scrollen


How a small accessory can improve the safety on our streets...

We have developed an emergency mirror, which can substitute a damaged car mirror within seconds.

About two years ago, a friend of mine told me about his problem: the outside mirror of his car was damaged. He was driving on. Nevertheless, being almost blind as he did not have any rear view anymore. This was not only extremely dangerous, but also prohibited. But what else could he do in such a situation?

We looked at the statistics and found out that from approximately 1,2 billion cars being on the road worldwide, about 30 million mirrors get damaged every year, which is an unbelievable hazard potential for other road users.

So we started to think about a possible solution and developed an emergency mirror, which can help to drive on safely, without endangering others. The development took more than a year. We have experimented a lot, tested and looked at the regulatory requirements.


In the end we had created an emergency mirror which is easy to mount, fits almost any car, has a reasonable price and ensures road safety.

➢ The design is simple and ingenious. It fits almost any car

➢ The emergency mirror can be mounted easily and within seconds.

➢ It has been tested by TUV for safety

➢ Approved by the German Ministry of Traffic

➢ All components are free of hazardous substances

➢ Production in accordance with European QS standards

➢ Worldwide Patent and Trademark protection

Here is the video explaining the technical details:


Now we would like to make it available to anyone in the world to improve the safety on our streets and avoid dangerous situations.

We have already invested more than 50.000 USD out of our own pocket, but now we need your help to move on.

Your money will be used to setup world wide distribution structures.

In detail, we will use it for the following:

- launch in Germany

- development of an emergency mirror model for pickups and trucks

- research in selected European countries (legal framework and regulatory requirements, country specific modifications)

- launch in selected countries in Europe

- research in the USA (legal framework and regulatory requirements, country specific modifications)

- launch in the USA

- research in Japan, Australia and other countries (legal framework and regulatory requirements, country specific modifications)

- launch in Japan, Australia and other countries

If we do not meet our funding target, we will still put every cent into the distribution of the emergency mirror.

Of course, you will get some remarkable benefits for supporting us. Therefore, we have set up some nice perks. Didn't you ever want to drive a Ferrari? Have a look at the perks...

And there are some other ways for you to support us:

We are looking for partners who can help us to launch the emergency mirror worldwide. So if you are interested to introduce the emergency mirror in your country - please contact us.

We would be pleased if you would also spread the word about our campaign by telling your friends about it. Please share the campaign with the tools of Indiegogo!



DEUTSCHE VERSION - GERMAN VERSION

Wie ein kleines Zubehörteil die Sicherheit auf unseren Strassen verbessern kann...

Wir haben einen Notfallspiegel entwickelt, der einen defekten Außenspiegel am Fahrzeug in sekundenschnelle ersetzt.

Hier zunächst das Video in Deutscher Sprache:


Vor fast zwei Jahren schilderte mir ein Freund sein Problem: sein Aussenspiegel wurde beschädigt und er ist fast im Blindflug bis nach Hause gefahren, weil er keine Sicht mehr nach hinten hatte. Das war nicht nur extrem gefährlich, sondern auch verboten. Aber was sollte er in seiner Situation sonst tun?

Wir haben die Statistik bemüht und dabei erfahren, dass bei etwa 1,2 Milliarden PKW, die weltweit unterwegs sind,  jedes Jahr rund 30 Millionen Aussenspiegel zu Bruch gehen und dies ein unglaubliches Gefährdungspotential für andere Verkehrsteilnehmer darstellt.

Daraufhin haben wir angefangen, über Lösungsmöglichkeiten nachzudenken und haben einen Ersatzspiegel entwickelt, der in solchen Situationen die sichere Weiterfahrt ermöglicht, ohne andere Verkehrsteilnehmer zu gefährden. Die Entwicklung hat über ein Jahr gedauert. Wir haben vieles ausprobiert, getestet und uns um die rechtlichen Voraussetzungen gekümmert.

Am Ende kam ein Notfallspiegel dabei heraus, der wenig kostet, universell auf fast alle PKW passt, einfach anzubringen ist und die Verkehrssicherheit gewährleistet.


➢ Das Design ist einfach und genial. Er passt universell bei fast allen PKW Typen

➢ Der Notfallspiegel ist einfach und in sekundenschnelle montiert

➢ Er wurde vom TÜV Hessen getestet

➢ Zulassung durch das Bundesverkehrsministerium

➢ Die Einzelteile sind frei von schädlichen Substanzen

➢ Die Produktion erfolgt nach Europäischen QS Richtlinien

➢ Weltweiter Patent- und Markenschutz

Hier das Video mit den technischen Details:


Nun möchten wir den Notffallspiegel gerne weltweit jedem zugänglich machen, um die Sicherheit auf unseren Strassen zu erhöhen und eine Gefährdung von Verkehrsteilnehmern durch defekte Aussenspielgel zu vermeiden.

Wir haben bereits über 50.000 USD aus unserer eigenen Tasche in das Projekt investiert, aber jetzt brauchen wir Eure Hilfe, um weiterzumachen.

Eure Gelder werden dazu verwendet, eine weltweite Vertriebsstruktur aufzubauen.

Im Einzelnen werden wir sie wie folgt einsetzen:

- Einführung in Deutschland

- Entwicklung eines Modells für Transporter und LKW

- Recherche in ausgewählten Ländern Europas (gesetzliche Voraussetzungen, länderspezifische Modifikationen)

- Einführung in ausgewählten Ländern Europas

- Recherche in den USA (gesetzliche Voraussetzungen, länderspezifische Modifikationen)

- Einführung in den USA

- Recherche in Japan, Australien and anderen Ländern (gesetzliche Voraussetzungen, länderspezifische Modifikationen)

- Einführung in Japan, Australien und anderen Ländern

Falls wir unser Finanzierungsziel nicht erreichen werden wir dennoch jeden Cent in die weltweite Einführung des Notfallspiegels stecken.

Natürlich sollt Ihr auch etwas davon haben, wenn Ihr uns unterstützt. Wir haben uns tolle Incentives für Euch ausgedacht. Wolltet Ihr nicht schon immer mal mit einem Ferrari fahren? Schaut mal unter Perks....

Und es gibt noch andere Möglichkeiten, uns zu unterstützen:

Wir sind auf der Suche nach Partnern, die uns bei der weltweiten Markteinführung helfen. Wenn Ihr also Interesse daran habt, bei der Markteinführung in Eurem Land mitzumachen, nehmt Kontakt mit uns auf.

Wir würden uns freuen, wenn Ihr die Informationen über den Notfallspiegel an Freunde und Bekannte weiterleitet. Nutzt einfach die Werkzeuge von Indiegogo dafür.

In detail, we will use it for the following:

- launch in Germany
- development of an emergency mirror model for pickups and trucks
- research in selected European countries (legal framework and regulatory requirements, country specific modifications)
- launch in selected countries in Europe- research in the USA (legal framework and regulatory requirements, country specific modifications)
- launch in the USA

- research in Japan, Australia and other countries (legal framework and regulatory requirements, country specific modifications)
- launch in Japan, Australia and other countries
If we do not meet our funding target, we will still put every cent into the distribution of the emergency mirror.Of course, you will get some remarkable benefits for supporting us. Therefore, we have set up some nice perks. Didn't you ever want to drive a Ferrari? Have a look at the perks...And there are some other ways for you to support us:We are looking for partners who can help us to launch the emergency mirror worldwide. So if you are interested to introduce the emergency mirror in your country - please contact us.
We
 would be pleased if you would also spread the word about our campaign by 
telling your friends about it. Please share the campaign with the tools 
of Indiegogo!


DEUTSCHE VERSION - GERMAN VERSION
Wie ein kleines Zubehörteil die Sicherheit auf unseren Strassen verbessern kann...
Wir haben einen Notfallspiegel entwickelt, der einen defekten Außenspiegel am Fahrzeug in sekundenschnelle ersetzt.
Hier zunächst das Video in Deutscher Sprache:

Vor fast zwei Jahren schilderte mir ein Freund sein Problem: sein Aussenspiegel wurde beschädigt und er ist fast im Blindflug bis nach Hause gefahren, weil er keine Sicht mehr nach hinten hatte. Das war nicht nur extrem gefährlich, sondern auch verboten. Aber was sollte er in seiner Situation sonst tun?
Wir haben die Statistik bemüht und dabei erfahren, dass bei etwa 1,2 Milliarden PKW, die weltweit unterwegs sind,  jedes Jahr rund 30 Millionen Aussenspiegel zu Bruch gehen und dies ein unglaubliches Gefährdungspotential für andere Verkehrsteilnehmer darstellt.
Daraufhin haben wir angefangen, über Lösungsmöglichkeiten nachzudenken und haben einen Ersatzspiegel entwickelt, der in solchen Situationen die sichere Weiterfahrt ermöglicht, ohne andere Verkehrsteilnehmer zu gefährden. Die Entwicklung hat über ein Jahr gedauert. Wir haben vieles ausprobiert, getestet und uns um die rechtlichen Voraussetzungen gekümmert.



Am Ende kam ein Notfallspiegel dabei heraus, der wenig kostet,
 universell auf fast alle PKW passt, einfach anzubringen ist und die 
Verkehrssicherheit gewährleistet.

 ➢ Das Design ist einfach und genial. Er passt universell bei fast allen PKW Typen

➢ Der Notfallspiegel ist einfach und in sekundenschnelle montiert

➢ Er wurde vom TÜV Hessen getestet

➢ Zulassung durch das Bundesverkehrsministerium
➢ Die Einzelteile sind frei von schädlichen Substanzen

➢ Die Produktion erfolgt nach Europäischen QS Richtlinien
➢ Weltweiter Patent- und Markenschutz


Hier das Video mit den technischen Details:
Nun möchten wir den Notffallspiegel gerne weltweit jedem zugänglich 
machen, um die Sicherheit auf unseren Strassen zu erhöhen und eine 
Gefährdung von Verkehrsteilnehmern durch defekte Aussenspielgel zu vermeiden.
Wir haben bereits über 50.000 USD aus unserer eigenen Tasche in das 
Projekt investiert, aber jetzt brauchen wir Eure Hilfe, um 
weiterzumachen.
Eure Gelder werden dazu verwendet, eine weltweite Vertriebsstruktur aufzubauen. 
Im Einzelnen werden wir sie wie folgt einsetzen:
- Einführung in Deutschland
- Entwicklung eines Modells für Transporter und LKW
- Recherche in ausgewählten Ländern Europas (gesetzliche Voraussetzungen, länderspezifische Modifikationen)
- Einführung in ausgewählten Ländern Europas
- Recherche in den USA (gesetzliche Voraussetzungen, länderspezifische Modifikationen)
- Einführung in den USA
- Recherche in Japan, Australien and anderen Ländern (gesetzliche Voraussetzungen, länderspezifische Modifikationen)
- Einführung in Japan, Australien und anderen Ländern

Falls wir unser Finanzierungsziel nicht erreichen werden wir dennoch 
jeden Cent in die weltweite Einführung des Notfallspiegels stecken.
Natürlich sollt Ihr auch etwas davon haben, wenn Ihr uns unterstützt. 
Wir haben uns tolle Incentives für Euch ausgedacht. Wolltet Ihr nicht 
schon immer mal mit einem Ferrari fahren? Schaut mal unter Perks....
Und es gibt noch andere Möglichkeiten, uns zu unterstützen:
Wir
 sind auf der Suche nach Partnern, die uns bei der weltweiten 
Markteinführung helfen. Wenn Ihr also Interesse daran habt, bei der 
Markteinführung in Eurem Land mitzumachen, nehmt Kontakt mit uns auf.
Wir
 würden uns freuen, wenn Ihr die Informationen über den Notfallspiegel 
an Freunde und Bekannte weiterleitet. Nutzt einfach die Werkzeuge von 
Indiegogo dafür.

story:
My name is Martin and my wife is Grazyna. Together we make Follygraph - small family design studio that makes infographics. We have just started this September. However, we have worked for over 6 months before that to make all of our infographics.

Making that poster took us 2 months of gathering information, filtering it, making sketches and illustrations to the final design.

We have put it online on Visual.ly to check if someone likes it at all. We were thrilled to see that 'The Great Collection of 127 Balls' got a Staff Pick right away! And our second poster - '38 Ways to Make a Perfect Coffee' has been seen by 14K people so far. That is amazing!

This is a start of our entrepreneurship journey and we need a kick. The $500 we pledge is just the cost of printing our poster. Our passion and hard work is a bonus for you. Your pledge helps us develop and grow, which means making a lot more new infographic posters for you. Thank you!

'The Great Collection of 127 World's Most Recognizable Balls' Poster features almost every (or maybe even all) ball that exists. From the obvious like baseball, football or golf to less obvious whiskey chiller, Pimple and Wilson - Tom Hanks' best friend on a deserted island. Get the ball rolling!

Perfect gift for a sports fan, movie fan or a geek friend as a conversation starter. Each print is signed and numbered - this is limited edition of 500.

The size is A2 (42,0 x 59,5cm or 16,5 x 23,5")

The poster is printed on wood-free archival paper Arctic Volume White (coated 150gsm = American 90lb index/100lb tag) using offset lithographic press. This FSC™ - The mark of responsible forestry and PEFC certified paper is also age resistant (ISO 9706).

We want to make it available to Everyone, no matter where you live - USA, Singapur, Poland or Solomon Islands. 

That's way, we will ship it worldwide for free.



1. COFFEE POSTER '38 Ways to Make a Perfect Coffee'

The 38 Ways to Make a Perfect Coffee poster features the most extensive collection of coffee beverages ever! From the obvious espresso, cappuccino and cafe latte to the more unheard-of (but not less energetic & delicious) Borgia, Black Eye and Mazagran. We can assure you, this infographic has recipe to suit your taste. Size A2. Paper Arctic Volume White 150gsm. Also limited edition, so every copy is signed and numbered.


1. Printing process

It is complicated process where no mistakes can be made. The poster is printed on wood-free archival paper Arctic Volume White (coated 150gsm = American 90lb index/100lb tag) using offset lithographic press. This FSC™ - The mark of responsible forestry and PEFC certified paper is also age resistant (ISO 9706). 

2. Shipping and delivery

Our posters will be travelling a very long way sometimes, so secure packaging is very important. Poster will be rolled in a cello sleeve and put into a cardboard shipping tube. We will ship it by Priority Registered Mail that can be tracked online.

We want you to have it before Christmas, so we will ship it ASAP

story:
Make sure to check out whole video above to learn all about this project^^^

Connect with us via Facebook, Instagram or Twitter!

The Story

Articulate started in 2013 when we launched our first Kickstarter project and it featured Men's inspired wallets. Due to the support, we have been able to continually sell this product through our website (www.articulatelifestyle.com). With the accessory market being saturated, it was our goal to come out with ideas that combined functionality, affordability and quality design. Our female inspired clutch falls right into what we are setting out to do; provide individuals with a product that is innovative and highly functional, all while adding a little bit of style to your everyday look.

We wanted this clutch to be:

- Stylish while also minimalist 

- Versatile with attention to design detailing

- Interchangeable

- Highly Functional

- RFID Blocking  (Learn more about RFID below)


Interior Design Functions

Part of the reason we wanted to create this product is because we have noticed how hard getting access to your personal items was becoming. We wanted this clutch to be  a minimalist product which helped you get rid of the unnecessary items that you lug around all day.  How many times have you been fumbling your fingers in between slots to try and show your ID or get access to your most used card? We got you covered with our vertical card slot integration. Simple fixes create better moments. 

We incorporated three interior design qualities that help solve current issues. ONE, instead of having horizontal card slots we created vertical slots that are independent from each other so sliding your cards in and out has never been so easy. 

TWO, the rectangular cut out allows easy access to your money. This clutch accommodates for all sized currencies. So, if you are in the UK, don’t worry your bills will fit as well!

THIRD, we created an independent section for your cell phone that is customized to fit most all smart phones (if you are unsure if your phone size will fit please email us) We eliminated unwanted bulk.

Protect yourself from Credit/Debit Card Hackers

Familiar with RFID (Radio Frequency Identification)? RFID is the technology that allows an individual to simply wave their credit to complete a purchase. Instead of the traditional swipe action that we are so accustomed to, people now have the ability to simply wave their card in front of a scanner which completes a transaction. 

Why is Articulate telling me about RFID technology? 

With every great technology advance there is always going to be someone who wants to break the system. Criminals with very minimal technical skills have created devices similar to the scanner which vendors such as grocery stores. With these makeshift scanners, criminals can easily steal your personal financial information. Thus having the ability to make new credit cards based on your financial information. All the perpetrator needs to do is walk past an innocent civilian which then picks up the credit card signal embedded in the credit card.


How does Articulate help solve this problem?

We embedded a special material into the design of this wallet that helps block the signal that new credit card and debit cards can send off. The material used to help protect you from this type of theft is not visible. Don't worry about it effecting the aesthetic look of the product. It is hidden inside the material of the clutch, visible to no one!




Picking the occasion

Our Articulate clutch allows you to create fu unique styles with one clutch. Everyone of our clutches comes with a wrist strap, and an adjustable half & half strap . Feeling like using this clutch as a basic wallet to fit inside your purse for the day? We got you covered. Feeling like going out for the night and wanting something to attached to your wrist that matches your outfit? No problem, simply snap on the wristlet. Enjoy the comfort of over the shoulder straps? Don't worry we we got you covered. Every occasion allows for unique experiences. We wanted your clutch to match your occasion.

^^ A casual day calls for a basic look. No straps needed for this one. 

^^^ Some days/nights call for a wristlet. We got you covered with our wrist strap add on!

^^^ Rocking the all chain strap.

^^^ A look at our adjustable half & half straps.

The Colors

story:
Here are some dimensions for the SilverSocks in size Medium

Weight: 18g per pair 

Thickness: 1.8mm

Ventilation Mesh: 70 x 115 mm

Size inscription: 1.5 x 0.5 mm

Circulation Cuff (Flat): 70 x 80 mm

Trapezium Toe (before expansion):

  • Flat Top: 40mm
  • Diagonal Sides: 30mm
  • Depth: 22mm

Material Composition:

  • 25% Pure Silver
  • 45% Cotton
  • 23% Nylon
  • 7% Spandex
  • Q: How much does shipping cost to my country? 
  • A: We offer Free Tracked Shipping across the world, wherever you are.
  • Q: How much warranty do we get? 
  • A: You get a one year warranty on all your socks.
  • Q: How do I choose my colours and sizes? 
  • A: You can choose which colour and size you want for every single pair of SilverSocks in BackerKit. This survey is activated and sent to your account email 11 days after pledging. 
  • Q: How do I give you my address? 
  • A: You will provide your address, sizes and colours to us in a service called BackerKit. This survey is activated and sent to your account email 11 days after pledging.
story_txt:
Close up view of the Silver yarn and Cotton










Wash in warm water with like colours at 30°C / 86°F
Do not use bleach or use fabric softeners.
Tumble or line dry.
For Merino Wool underwear, expect to see pilling in abrasive areas.
Turn the sock inside out.
Expect to see silver threads after use.
In hot and humid countries, avoid prolonged exposure when drying

Depth: 22mm

25% Pure Silver

45% Cotton

23% Nylon

7% Spandex

A: We offer Free Tracked Shipping across the world, wherever you are.

Q: How much warranty do we get? 
A: You get a one year warranty on all your socks.

Q: How do I choose my colours and sizes? 
A: You can choose which colour and size you want for every single pair of SilverSocks in BackerKit. This survey is activated and sent to your account email 11 days after pledging. 

Q: How do I give you my address? 
A: You will provide your address, sizes and colours to us in a service called BackerKit. This survey is activated and sent to your account email 11 days after pledging.

story:
Short Summary

VictoryEveryWear is a brand unlike any other. With its origins stemming from the one who gave us the ultimate victory, Jesus Christ. It is our goal to have the world rep His name and everything He stood for, while maintaining their sense of style. VictoryEveryWear is the brand that believes you feel as good as you look. What better feeling to have then a victorious one? Victory, It’s Every Where and We’ve Got It!

What We Need & What You Get

As we prepare for the launching of our website, with your help, we WILL reach our goal of $5000, which will cover advertising, and inventory/merchandise (shirts, hats, etc.).

Every little bit helps. I mean, it takes one hundred pennies added together before the total equals one dollar. Whatever you decide to contribute, it will be greatly appreciated. However, we are offering incentives for contributions. Incentives such as certificates, hats & shirts, and even the opportunity to design your own apparel.

The Impact

As previously stated, your contribution will help to launch the newest and hottest brand to hit the market in a long time. The brand that crosses all generations, races, and genres. The brand that inspires, uplifts, and enhances the way you think about yourself and others. We can give the world a feeling of victory, by first draping the world in it.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you are not able to donate, but you can still be a vital part in making the VictoryEveryWear dream become a reality. Pass this campaign on to any and every body you know. Like VictoryEveryWear on Facebook and follow us on Twitter @VictoryEvryWear.

And remember, Satan is Defeated! God is Exalted! And We've Got VictoryEveryWear

story:
Hello and thank you for looking at my campaign.

I started Violaceous Latex in April 2010. I bought a few meters of latex, made a couple of outfits for myself to go out in, got lots of lovely comments and asking where to buy... Then I set up my business without a real start up fund, working from a tiny table in my living room. Violaceous grew fast which I was really pleased with but the market it now very competitive and I would love to expand with new and exciting ideas!

Lucy Fur by Sean OMalley

 

What Violaceous Latex is looking for?

I am looking for £1500 to purchase a reliable new desk top laser cutter. 

I would use the laser cutter to produce a new range of garments and accessories. This would be for latex and other materials too. 

If the full target isn't reached the funds will go towards stocking more latex and getting the latex laser cut elsewhere. However it is more cost effective for my company to own a machine as Violaceous latex would be able to create any ideas with a much shorter waiting time and cost.

 

Alice La Vie by Joseph O'Brien

The Impact

I run Violaceous Latex on my own and it can be very hard work. It’s not always very profitable as latex is expensive and testing new ideas can also be expensive too. Having my own machine would make the cost of producing new items with laser cut applique would be far more cost effective and in return will mean I can produce garments at a lower cost, as hand cutting is very time consuming and not always perfectly accurate with intricate designs, not to mention can be painful on your fingers and wrist!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry if you are unable to donate towards this fund, you can help in other ways too. 

I would be very thankful if you could share this campaign with your friends, family via Facebook, twitter and other networking sites :)

Thank you for your support.

story:
Anyone has interest in JuiceCan(e), Please email  to wl@allmobilepower.com

 

The Mobile Power System You did not Find in CES 2013

Modern life has forced us to accept mobile devices as one of the most important accessory of our daily life.  Everywhere you go, you will find people staring at cell phone or tablet PC.  Even down at the beach, smart phone and tablet PC are a must besides beer and chips nowadays.

As we depend on mobile devices more and more, portable backup power source becomes indispensable more and more too.  Mobile devices runs on battery power.  It always runs out when you just need that little bit more.

JuiceCan(e) now comes to the rescue. Unlike most of the standard backup batteries which only serve its basic function of providing extra power when needed, JuiceCan(e) is colorful and fashionable by design; simply add more cans to become the cane for extending usage time; and replaceable utility cap to create application flexibility.

Aesthetic Design

JuiceCan(e) is not only colorful, but also fashionable.  A single JuiceCan is small in size, 7.5 fl oz can size, 7 oz. weight; easy to hold in your hand.  Easy to carry in handbag for all occasions.
JuiceCan comes in 7 natural fruit colors: milk-white/ blackberry-black/ cherry-red/ strawberry-pink/ blueberry-blue/ aloe-green/ lemon-yellow.  Each standalone JuiceCan is noticeable by color.
Turning single JuiceCan into JuiceCane can be as easy as making a twist.  When multiple units connected, it becomes a very visible JuiceCane like sugarcane.

 

Functional Design

Each JuiceCan carries 7800mAh capacity;  enough to support 3 charges of iPhone5, or 2 charges of iPad.

Simply connect multiple JuiceCans will create a larger capacity power source to meet the longer capacity needs.

The standard removable Utility cap equips with two USB output ports, one micro USB charging port, and a 2.3W LED flashlight.  It can charge 2 mobile devices at the same time.  And also good to provide 200 hours of LED lighting.


Fun and Easy Technology

AMP design team has made this product with more fun and easy to use.  By adding more JuiceCans, not only it builds the fun of color match, but also increases the usage capacity of the battery.  Buy a few of the JuiceCans for all your family members.  Each JuiceCan will provide the simple function of the personal mobile backup power source.  When family get together, combine all units and create a JuiceCane to meet the large capacity demand.

Making the Best even Better

AMP Tech is in the process of designing more functional removable utility caps.  To name a few below:
1.  Warm and Romatic Lampshades:

2.  Body Massager


3.  BlueTooth speaker


4.  12V DC inverter for light car appliance

In short, JuiceCan(e) is a well-designed product with great creativity.  JuiceCan(e) proves that technology can be colorful and fashionable too.  Ease of use is definitely a must for all classes of users.  The removable utility cap creates the flexibility for all other features next to come. 

Lightning Reward (iPhone 5 not included):

  • Lightning to USB cable (8-pin),
  • Wall charger adapter (110V AC to 5V DC)

Battery Comparison:

 

"JuiceCan(e)" prototyping has been completed,

Ready for quantity production.

Minimum batch quantity: 700 sets, AMP Tech needs your help to subscribe to the first production batch. Your favorable reference to your friends and colleagues are very much appreciated. The sooner we get to the 700 minimum, we will get into the production mode; and delivery follows. Email me at wl@allmobilepower.com for your special requests: 
1. Special delivery time requirement. 
2. Any other special instruction color combination and others. 
3. We will notify you if there is a new production and delivery schedule.

We thank you for your interest in this "JuiceCan(e)" product. We hope you will enjoy having this device around you to serve you when you need it.

Please support AMP Tech to bring our idea to reality. We do appreciate your support to give us the opportunity to serve you and make your life more joyful.

We hope one day, this device can help you and serve you in the best way when you desperately need it. You will definitely feel the investment is more than your expectation.

 

After you make your contribution, AMP Tech will write an email to you to make sure what flavor of JuiceCane you like.

Oversea shipping fee $5 for One can, if order 3+ cans, We will waived oversea shipping fee.

FAQ:

JuiceCan(e) part list:

  • Main Body x 1
  • USB cable x 1
  • Changeable USB tips x 2
  • Charging module with LED light x 1
  • User manual x 1

How to charge JuiceCan(e)?

You can get power from wall outlet or car cigarette lighter socket with USB outport.

Dose JuiceCan(e) support smartphone or tablet PC?

JuiceCan(e) support all kind of Android devices and old Apple devices, with lightning  cable, JuiceCan(e) can charging new Apple devices such as iPhone 5.

Does JuiceCan(e) support iPad mini and nexus 4?

iPad mini(Lightning port),Nexus 4(Mini USB port). You can use original charging cable connect to JuiceCan; Each JuiceCan set with one mini USB tip; You have choice to order one lightning cable for Apple products.

Any other mobile device JuiceCan(e) support?

JuiceCan(e) support all 5V mobile devices such as GPS, Go Pro, Kindle etc. 

If JuiceCan(e) can get power from 220V AC?

AMP Tech will send 220V AC to 5V DC wall charge adapter if you need.

How much for oversea shipping?

$5 for One can, if order 3+ cans, We will waived shipping fee.

Answer for Chris:

1. Q:What is the self-discharge rate (time to full discharge on shelf)
    A: More than 6 months.
2. Q:What is the battery technology used
    A: 18650 Li battery, like the one in your laptop.
3. Q:What is the recharge time
    A: Around 10 hours.
4. Q:What is the lifetime (#cycles, at a specified discharge depth/profile)
    A: At least 500 cycles.
5. Q:Can the owner replace individual internal cells should one fail after warranty? Is the unit designed for such easy access and replacement?"
    A: For your safe, Please do not replace battery cells yourself.
6. Q:Is there a maximum # of units that can be connected together, stacked (other than the space it needs to fit in) ?
    A: No limit, but we suggest below ten cans for physics reason.
7. Q:Are there more details available on the 12V support? 120V AC support?
    A: Not yet, we develope unility caps first, then plan install some inverter for 12V support.
8. Q:What is the warranty?"
    A: 1 year
9. Q:Time to recharge?
    A: As Q3, 10 hours.
10. Q:Are the various phones/tablets/etc all charged at the maximum charge rate the items can accept, or are some devices limited (ie, will Kindle Fire charge at 2A) ?
      A: You can charge one smartphone and one tablet PC or 2 smartphone at same time.
story_txt:
Anyone has interest in JuiceCan(e), Please email  to wl@allmobilepower.com
 
The Mobile Power System You did not Find in CES 2013
Modern life has forced us to accept mobile devices as one of the most important accessory of our daily life.  Everywhere you go, you will find people staring at cell phone or tablet PC.  Even down at the beach, smart phone and tablet PC are a must besides beer and chips nowadays.
As we depend on mobile devices more and more, portable backup power source becomes indispensable more and more too.  Mobile devices runs on battery power.  It always runs out when you just need that little bit more.
JuiceCan(e) now comes to the rescue. Unlike most of the standard backup batteries which only serve its basic function of providing extra power when needed, JuiceCan(e) is colorful and fashionable by design; simply add more cans to become the cane for extending usage time; and replaceable utility cap to create application flexibility.
Aesthetic Design
JuiceCan(e) is not only colorful, but also fashionable.  A single JuiceCan is small in size, 7.5 fl oz can size, 7 oz. weight; easy to hold in your hand.  Easy to carry in handbag for all occasions. JuiceCan comes in 7 natural fruit colors: milk-white/ blackberry-black/ cherry-red/ strawberry-pink/ blueberry-blue/ aloe-green/ lemon-yellow.  Each standalone JuiceCan is noticeable by color.  Turning single JuiceCan into JuiceCane can be as easy as making a twist.  When multiple units connected, it becomes a very visible JuiceCane like sugarcane.

 

Functional Design
Each JuiceCan carries 7800mAh capacity;  enough to support 3 charges of iPhone5, or 2 charges of iPad.
Simply connect multiple JuiceCans will create a larger capacity power source to meet the longer capacity needs.



The standard removable Utility cap equips with two USB output ports, one micro USB charging port, and a 2.3W LED flashlight.  It can charge 2 mobile devices at the same time.  And also good to provide 200 hours of LED lighting.
 
Fun and Easy Technology
AMP design team has made this product with more fun and easy to use.  By adding more JuiceCans, not only it builds the fun of color match, but also increases the usage capacity of the battery.  Buy a few of the JuiceCans for all your family members.  Each JuiceCan will provide the simple function of the personal mobile backup power source.  When family get together, combine all units and create a JuiceCane to meet the large capacity demand.

story:
The UCP WORK, Inc.

SANTA BARBARA HARBOR CREW

The Santa Barbara Harbor Crew is a diverse group of 30-35 men and women with a wide range of developmental and mental health disabilities. Since 1992, we have been working 365 days a year to make sure Santa Barbara has one of the prettiest and cleanest harbors in the world. Every day, rain or shine, we empty about 200 trash and recycling cans, scrub two dozen showers and almost fifty toilet stalls. We sweep the sidewalks, dust the storefronts, and polish the railings. As we provide these janitorial services to the City of Santa Barbara Waterfront Department, we get to work outside, among our friends and neighbors, and alongside individuals without disabilities. Our program is partly funded by Tri-Counties Regional Center and the California Department of Rehabilitation. We are a Group Supported Employment program of UCP WORK, Inc., a 501 (c)(3) non-profit agency.

Due to a change in the economy, funding for employment programs like ours has been drastically reduced.  This is tragic because supported employment is a springboard to independence. Our program provides meaningful  jobs while building competitive work skills. The more independence we can foster, the less government subsidy is needed. So in order to take responsibility for our own future as a crew, we are mounting a seven part campaign to tell the world who we are and what we do and why programs like ours are essential to the communities they serve. We want to start by improving our image with new uniforms and new safety gear.

T-SHIRTS and HATS

Because we work in the public eye, it's important to us to present a proud team image.Wearing uniform shirts and hats not only identifies us to the public as crew members, it also builds our team spirit. We want to look clean and sharp and professional while we represent our community, not only to our neighbors, but to the thousands of people from all over the world who visit the harbor throughout the year. Our uniforms are old. Our hats are so faded it's hard to tell what color they used to be. We've been wearing the same colors and styles since 1992 and it's high time for an update. Please help us have the same kind of pride in our appearance that we have in our work.

HOODIES and SAFETY GEAR

Santa Barbara is known for it's awesome weather but winter mornings can be cold and damp. Squalls and storms can be pretty fierce at the harbor and it's important for us to stay warm and dry in bad weather. We'd like to include warm hooded sweatshirts as part of our regular uniform. We work out on the docks 365 days a year in the rain and the wind and we also need to replace our threadbare collection of rain gear, boots, and life jackets. Please help us stay safe and warm and dry in the coming winter.

THE REST OF THE CAMPAIGN

In our effort to let the world know about us, we're also developing a social media presence, beginning with a Facebook page where we'll post news, photos, videos, and crew profiles, and where we'll help promote some of our special friends (that's you!) and their enterprises. We're designing a new sign for our harbor office that will let passers-by know who we are and what we do. We want to create an informative brochure to distribute to the public and an annual calendar with photos of crew members working on the beautiful Santa Barbara waterfront. This year, we hope to provide at least one internship for a local college student interested in working with people with disabilities. We also plan to implement a volunteer program so that community members can work alongside us and get to know what we do, firsthand. Please help us share our unique program with the world.

WHY IT MATTERS

For a person with a developmental disability or a mental health disability, having a job can make the difference between a life of isolation and struggle and one of making and maintaining friendships and successfully participating in the community we choose to live in. We are proud of our jobs and proud of the work we do. Almost all of us live independently in the Santa Barbara area. While many crew members move on to work in more mainstream jobs, more than half of us have been on the crew for more than five years. A few of us have been here almost twenty. We think it's time to let the world know who we are. Please help us get started with new uniforms and new safety gear.

100% of your tax-deductible donation will go to the Santa Barbara Harbor Crew.

THANK YOU!


(If we should exceed our current campaign's goal of $7000, all excess funds will be used to create our brochure and calendar and to produce a new video for the next indiegogo campaign.)


Here is our budget for uniforms and safety gear for 2013-2014:

(We get a clean shirt for every shift. UCP WORK, Inc. does our laundry)

(Shirts  and sweatshirts will be printed front and back. Hats are embroidered.)

50 Full Zip Hooded Sweatshirts @ $35 each                               $1750

12 Small T-shirts (crew) @ $10 each                                           $120

12 Medium T-shirts (crew) @ $10 each                                        $120

24 Large T-shirts (crew) @ $10 each                                           $240

36 XL T-shirts (crew) @ $10 each                                                $360

36 XXL T-shirts (crew) @ $12 each                                              $432

12 XXXL T-shirts (crew) @ $12 each                                            $144

24 Medium T-shirts (coach) @ $10 each                                      $240

24 Large T-shirts (coach) @ $10 each                                         $240

24 XL T-shirts (coach @ $10 each                                               $240

48 Hats (baseball) @ $8 each                                                     $384

24 Hats (boonies) @ $12 each                                                    $288

12 XL Life Vests @ $32 each                                                      $768

12 XXL Life Vests @ $32 each                                                    $768

8 Rain Jackets (L & XL) @ $25 each                                           $200

8 Rain Pants (L & XL) @ $25 each                                              $200

6 Long Raincoats (L & XL) @ $20                                                $120

Subtotal                                                                                    $6614

indiegogo 4% charge                                                                  $265

Total                                                                                          $6879

Goal                                                                                          $7000

story:
Hi everyone! My name is Jacque and I am a senior at the University of Kansas. I created LIONESS http://www.shoplioness.com/ last November for a couple of reasons:

  • I was in college, lost, and completely broke. 
  • I taught myself graphic design, html, and photography for my fashion blog (http://www.the-lion-kingdom.com/) and was spending hours on end sprucing it up and thrifting for my own closet.
  • I decided to take what I loved to do anyway and find a way to continue while making money for school!

 My campaign goal is to continue expanding LIONESS with new clothing, along with more vintage pieces. I will always love the 90's for it's pioneering spirit and presence of color in entertainment, so I will always keep the vintage pieces 90s, but I want LIONESS to be more than just that. I want it to be an affordable shop for girls who are a little bit on the quirky side and don't quite fit the Forever21 mold.  Girls who are fierce, fashionable, and fearless! Oh and money conscious because I definitely am haha.

And to be quite honest, LIONESS is doing as well as it can right now, but it's becoming too expensive for me to run in general let alone expand...but I have hope! Here's some items I would love to add:

I feel as if I need $700 for this project. While I know that's not a lot for an e-commerce site, I feel like it's enough for the steps I want to take. The money from this campaign will go to buying new merchandise, both new and vintage, along with buying some Google ad space. If the campaign doesn't reach it's goal then you guys get all your money back!

Prizes and perks:

If you help me reach my goal you will be rewarded! Whether it be with a personalized thank you letter, or hand drawn stickers, or 25% off item in my shop for the rest of your life what you get will come straight from my heart and may or may not be tear-stained from me being overwhelmed with joy!

If you want to help out but can't give any funds at this moment don't worry! You can help by spreading the word about my message and campaign. Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to make some noise about LIONESS or like me on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShopLioness and twitter: https://twitter.com/Shop_Lioness !
